'bao'yu'zhi'wen'de'dai'yu 宝玉只问得黛玉
'bao'yu'zhi'yong'cha'pao'le'ban'wan'fan 宝玉只用茶泡了半碗饭
'bao'yu'zhi'yuan'zhong 宝玉至院中
'bao'yu'zhong'shi'bu'an'ben'fen'zhi'ren 宝玉终是不安本分之人
'bao'yu'zhu'le'xiang 宝玉炷了香
'bao'yu'zi'ji'mei'ri'ye'jia'gong 宝玉自己每日也加工
'bao'yu'zi'ji'ying'le 宝玉自己应了
'bao'yu'zi'jue'qing'xiang'wei'yi 宝玉自觉清香味异
'bao'yu'zi'neng'bian'fa'yao'tang'yao'geng'tiao'ting 宝玉自能变法要汤要羹调停
'bao'yu'zi'qu'dai'yu'fang'zhong'lai'kan'shi 宝玉自去黛玉房中来看视
'bao'yu'zi'shi'huan'xi 宝玉自是欢喜
'bao'yu'zong'wei'ting'jian'zhe'xie'hua 宝玉总未听见这些话
'bao'yu'zuo'yi'bu'die 宝玉作揖不迭
'bao'yu'zuo'zai'jia'mu'huai'qian 宝玉坐在贾母怀前
'bao'yuan'mei'ge'chai'shi 抱怨没个差使
'bao'zai'huai'nei'zuo'shen 抱在怀内作甚
'bao'zhe'yi'ping'hong'mei 抱着一瓶红梅
'bao'zhu'li'li'qin'shi'xiang'ban 宝珠理里寝室相伴
'bao'zhu'zhi'yi'bu'ken'hui'jia 宝珠执意不肯回家
'bao'zhu'zi'ji'de'ming'yu 保住自己的名誉
'bao'zhu'zi'xing'wei'jia'nv'zhi'li'wai 宝珠自行未嫁女之礼外
'bao'zhu'zuo'you'shou 抱住左右手
'bei'bian'li'zhe'yi'ge'fen'you'da'ying'bi 北边立着一个粉油大影壁
'bei'di'li'de'hua 背地里的话
'bei'di'li'duo'shao'you'qi'mi'yue 背地里多少幽期密约
'bei'di'li'jiu'zhi'bu'hui'tiao'suo'zhu'zi 背地里就只不会调唆主子
'bei'di'li'na'zhe'ta'de'liang'ge'xiao'yao'er'chu'qi 背地里拿着他的两个小幺儿出气
'bei'di'li'ni'yan'wo'yu 背地里你言我语
'bei'di'li'suo'yi'cai'zong'ta'yi'dian'zi 背地里所以才纵他一点子
'bei'di'li'yan'san'yu'si'de 背地里言三语四的
'bei'di'li'you'bu'zhi'gan'shen'me'qu'le 背地里又不知干什么去了
'bei'di'li'zhou'er'nai'nai'he'wo'zao'si'le 背地里咒二奶奶和我早死了
'bei'feng'hun'zhui'suo'yi'si 被冯魂追索已死
'bei'feng'jie'da'nao'le'yi'zhen 被凤姐打闹了一阵
'bei'fu'shui'wang'ye'song'le'zi'lian 北府水王爷送了字联
'bei'hou'jia'jian'xie'yan'yu 背后加减些言语
'bei'jia'qiang'yi'ba'jiu'zhu'dao 被贾蔷一把揪住道
'bei'jing'jun'wang'si'jia'wang'ye 北静郡王四家王爷
'bei'jing'wang'de'yi'ge'ai'qie'zuo'ri'mei'le 北静王的一个爱妾昨日没了
'bei'jing'wang'fei'bing'ji'wei'shi'jiao'gong'hou'gao'ming 北静王妃并几位世交公侯诰命
'bei'jing'wang'fei'ye'dian'le'yi'chu 北静王妃也点了一出
'bei'jing'wang'fei'ye'you'wu'yang'li'wu 北静王妃也有五样礼物
'bei'jing'wang'fu'bian'lin'le'xi'yuan 北静王府便赁了西院

'bei'kong'meng'zhi'dao 背孔孟之道
'bei'lao'tai'tai'de'ya'tou'shi'zhe 被老太太的丫头拾着

'bei'qing'wen'deng'xiu'ru 悲晴雯等羞辱

'bei'ta'hong'shang'shou'de 被他哄上手的

'bei'wo'men'zhi'dao'le 被我们知道了
'bei'wo'ting'jian'le 被我听见了
'bei'wo'yi'ma'kan'jian'le 被我姨妈看见了

'bei'xia'liang'pi'ma 备下两匹马
'bei'xiang'gong'men'kan'jian'le 被相公们看见了
'bei'xiao'hai'zi'de'le'hai'hao 被小孩子得了还好

'bei'yu'chuan'er'chao'chu 被玉钏儿吵出

'bei'zhe'zhu'zi'tao'chu'ming'lai'guo'de'ren'bu'cheng 背着主子逃出命来过的人不成
'ben'bu'gan'dang'ci'zhong'jian 本不敢当此重荐
'ben'chao'jie'xi'qian'gu'wei'you'zhi'kuang'dian'long'en 本朝皆系千古未有之旷典隆恩
'ben'chu'shi'na'li'ren 本处是哪里人
'ben'chu'you'ren'he'yuan'zhong'bu'mu'de 本处有人和园中不睦的

'ben'fu'tai'ye'chai'ren'lai'chuan'ren'wen'hua 本府太爷差人来传人问话

'ben'gai'tian'tian'guo'lai'qing'an'cai'shi 本该天天过来请安才是

'ben'lai'su'xi'ai'ku 本来素昔爱哭
'ben'lai'wo'yao'qiao'qiao'ta'qu 本来我要瞧瞧她去

'bi'bai'ri'geng'zeng'le'yan'se 比白日更增了颜色
'bi'bie'chu'bu'zhi'dao'de'ren'jia'shuo'le'lai'de'hao 比别处不知道的人家说了来的好
'bi'bie'de'li'xi'geng'da 比别的利息更大
'bi'bie'de'zi'mei'duo'teng'ta'xie 比别的姊妹多疼她些
'bi'bie'de'zi'mei'geng'bu'tong 比别的姊妹更不同
'bi'bie'ren'geng'ke'wu 比别人更可恶
'bi'bu'de'jia'li'you'ren'zhao'kan 比不得家里有人照看

'bi'bu'de'ni'men 比不得你们

'bi'bu'de'nian'qing 比不得年轻
'bi'bu'de'wang'chang 比不得往常
'bi'bu'de'wo'men'de'hai'zi 比不得我们的孩子
'bi'bu'de'wo'men'mei'zhe'qing'fu 比不得我们没这清福
'bi'bu'de'zan'men'jia'de'hai'zi'men 比不得咱们家的孩子们
'bi'bu'de'zuo'nv'er'shi'mian'tian'wen'rou 比不得作女儿时腼腆温柔
'bi'bu'neng'shou'zu'fu'zhi'gen'ji 必不能守祖父之根基
'bi'bu'zhuan'da'guan'yuan'ji'bing'xing'qin'song'deng'wen 必补撰大观园记并省亲颂等文
'bi'cai'xia'hao'de'duo'zhe'ne 比彩霞好的多着呢

'bi'cong'meng'zhong'jing'xing 必从梦中惊醒

'bi'de'zi'juan'an'wei'yi'fan'fang'ba 必得紫鹃安慰一番方罢
'bi'deng'tian'hai'nan'ne 比登天还难呢
'bi'ding'hai'yao'dai'chu'huang'zi'lai 必定还要带出幌子来
'bi'ding'pao'dao'jiang'bian'zi'shang'lai'zuo'shen'me 必定跑到江边子上来作什么
'bi'ding'shi'long'wang'ye'ye'ai'shang'ni'feng'liu 必定是龙王爷也爱上你风流
'bi'ding'shi'nu'cai'bu'cheng 必定是奴才不成

'bi'ding'yi'ma'zhe'li'shi'wai'ren 必定姨妈这里是外人

'bi'ding'you'ren'lai'wen'ta'de 必定有人来问她的
'bi'feng'jie'er'qian'geng'xie'dai'le'xu'duo 比凤姐儿前更懈怠了许多

'bi'shi'liang'kou'zi'xiang'da 必是两口子相打

'bi'shi'zheng'yue'nei 彼时正月内
'bi'su'ren'qu'ling'qian'ji'diao 比俗人去灵前祭吊
'bi'ta'men'de'bao'yu'ru'he 比他们的宝玉如何
'bi'ta'su'zhou'dai'lai'de'hai'hao'shi'bei 比她苏州带来的还好十倍
'bi'ta'yu'er'jie'tui'hun 逼他与二姐退婚
'bi'wai'tou'de'yin'xiao'qiang 比外头的银硝强
'bi'wang'chang'geng'jue'ke'lian'ke'ai 比往常更觉可怜可爱
'bi'wang'ri'geng'mang 比往日更忙

'bi'wei'qi'you'ming'chang 必为奇优名倡
'bi'wen'bao'yu'de'gong'ke 必问宝玉的功课
'bi'wo'geng'nian'qing'de'you'bu'zhi'yi'ge'ren'le 比我更年轻的又不止一个人了
'bi'wo'men'de'yao'hai'cu'ni 比我们的腰还粗呢
'bi'wo'men'duo'liang'bei'zi 比我们多两倍子
'bi'wo'men'hai'geng'hui'liu'ne 比我们还更会溜呢
'bi'wo'qiang'de'you'er'qie'duo 比我强的有而且多
'bi'wo'xiang'de'zhou'dao 比我想得周到
'bi'wo'you'hui'nian 比我又会念
'bi'xi'chao'guang'tou 赑屃朝光透
'bi'xian'dao'bu'xiang'le 比先倒不像了
'bi'xian'du'qi'ti'ge'yi'yu'bu'yi 必先度其体格宜与不宜
'bi'xian'fang'si'le'xu'duo 比先放肆了许多
'bi'xian'geng'jue'liang'sa'qi'lai 比先更觉凉飒起来
'bi'xian'geng're'nao'le'duo'shao 比先更热闹了多少
'bi'xian'jing'zhang'le'hao'xie 比先竟长了好些
'bi'xian'shi'ye'pang'le 比先时也胖了
'bi'xian'xiao'chao'yi'zhen 必先笑嘲一阵
'bi'xian'yue'fa'jing'cai'ke'ai 比先越发精彩可爱
'bi'xu'li'ge'fa'yue 必须立个罚约
'bi'xu'song'sheng'fang'ke 必须颂圣方可
'bi'xu'xian'cong'jia'li'zi'sha'zi'mie'qi'lai 必须先从家里自杀自灭起来
'bi'xu'xian'gao'su'wo'yi'sheng 必须先告诉我一声
'bi'xu'xian'yong'qing'shui'xiang'cha'shu'le'kou'cai'ke 必须先用清水香茶漱了口才可
'bi'xu'you'yi'er'zhi'ji'wei'ban 必须有一二知己为伴
'bi'xue'pan'hai'ji'shi'bei 比薛蟠还急十倍
'bi'xue'pan'xiao'liang'sui 比薛蟠小两岁
'bi'yan'deng'wu'sa'le'yi'zhuo 笔砚等物撒了一桌
'bi'yao'da'ji'ge'cai'hao 必要打几个才好
'bi'yao'fen'chu'deng'li 必要分出等例
'bi'yao'ge'se'song'xie'zhe'zhi'qu 必要各色送些折枝去
'bi'yao'guo'liang'san'ge'yue'xun'chu'you'tou'lai 必要过两三个月寻出由头来
'bi'ye'zhe'bian'duo'zhe'ji'bei 比爷这边多着几倍
'bi'yi'bi'ni'men'de 比一比你们的
'bi'yi'bu'shu'hai're'nao 比一部书还热闹
'bi'yi'gui'shi'ya'ren 必以贵势压人
'bi'yi'qie'de'ling'dou'nan 比一切的令都难
'bi'ying'ying'zheng'de'lv'qi'xiang'dao'jing'mi'fan 碧荧荧蒸的绿畦香稻粳米饭
'bi'you'bie'de'yuan'gu 必有别的原故
'bi'you'bu'tian'ji'shi'zhi'cai 必有补天济世之材
'bi'you'liang'chang'qi'sheng 必有两场气生
'bi'you'si'zi'de'qing'li 必有私自的情理
'bi'yue'jian'ta'si'ren'luan'gun 碧月见他四人乱滚
'bi'zai'feng'jie'er'fang'li'shang'yi'qu'le 必在凤姐儿房里商议去了
'bi'zai'shu'jia'zhi'hou 避在书架之后
'bi'zai'wu'li'men'zuo'zhe'dao'di'hao'xie 比在屋里闷坐着到底好些
'bi'zan'men'de'yao'hai'cu'ni 比咱们的腰还粗呢
'bi'zan'men'zhe'ge'ru'he 比咱们这个如何
'bi'zhang'hua'sheng'qiang'shi'bei 比张华胜强十倍
'bi'zhe'ge'geng'ru'he 比这个更如何
'bi'zhi'bo'ji'xian'fa'hou'shi'jin 必至搏击掀发后始尽
'bi'zhi'er'wu'han 敝之而无憾
'bi'zhi'hou'shou'bu'jie 必致后手不接
'bi'zhi'xing'jin'le 必至兴尽了
'bi'zi'ji'du'qu 比自己独去
'bian'an'fang'jian'yi'ji'chi 便按方煎一剂吃
'bian'ba'fang'cai'de'shi'hui'le'feng'jie 便把方才的事回了凤姐

'bian'bing'bu'zhao'bo'zi 便冰不着脖子
'bian'bu'gan'yi'wang'ri'xi'le'zhi'shi'xiang'dai 便不敢以往日喜乐之时相待

'bian'jiang'ta'bing'zhong'kuang'tai'xing'rong'le'yu'ta'qiao 便将他病中狂态形容了与他瞧
'bian'jiang'ta'ji'mu'jie'lai 便将她继母接来
'bian'jiang'xie'mo'li'fen'bao'le'yi'bao'na'lai 便将些茉莉粉包了一包拿来

'bian'jiang'zi'ji'qu'you'shi 便将自己娶尤氏

'bian'jiao'jin'qian'lai 便叫进前来
'bian'jiao'le'ta'liang'kou'er'dao'xin'fang'zi'li'lai 便叫了他两口儿到新房子里来
'bian'jiao'ping'er'na'chu'yu'xia'ji'lai'zhe'cai'ming'nian 便叫平儿拿出玉匣记来着彩明念
'bian'jiao'ta'men'xing'qu 便叫她们行去
'bian'jiao'ta'si'ge'miao'pei 便叫他四个描赔
'bian'jiao'xiao'luo'lai 便叫小螺来
'bian'jiao'xiao'ya'tou'zi 便叫小丫头子
'bian'jiao'zi'ji'shi'de'ya'tou'lai'fen'fu 便叫自己使的丫头来吩咐
'bian'jie'le'er'yi'jin'qu'zuo'zheng'shi 便接了二姨进去做正室
'bian'jie'li'nei'zhong'xie'zhu 便竭力内中协助
'bian'jie'ta'jin'qu 便接她进去
'bian'jie'zhong'sao'zi'zhuan'zhi'yi'ba'le 便借重嫂子转致意罢了
'bian'jin'cheng'lai'liao'li'chu'bin'zhi'shi 便进城来料理出殡之事
'bian'jin'jia'mu'fang'zhong'qu'le 便进贾母房中去了
'bian'jiu'liang'liu'qing'li 编就两溜青篱
'bian'ju'zhe'jiu'fu'xi'gui'xia 便举着酒俯膝跪下
'bian'jue'leng'qing'le'hao'xie 便觉冷清了好些
'bian'jue'shen'ti'fa'chong 便觉身体发重
'bian'jue'shen'ti'shi'fen'ruan'ruo 便觉身体十分软弱
'bian'jue'tou'men'shen'suan 便觉头闷身酸
'bian'jue'xue'pan'de'qi'gai'jian'ci'di'ai'le'xia'qu 便觉薛蟠的气概渐次低矮了下去
'bian'jue'zhuo'chou'bi'ren 便觉浊臭逼人
'bian'kai'le'fang'men 便开了房门
'bian'kai'sang'po'xiao 便开丧破孝
'bian'kan'na'tie'zi'shi'da'hong'shuang'xi'jian'tie 便看那帖子是大红双喜笺帖
'bian'kan'shang'le'qin'zhong'ren'wu'feng'liu 便看上了秦钟人物风流
'bian'ke'ru'shu'du'shu 便可入塾读书
'bian'ke'se'yi'chang 便克啬异常
'bian'ke'ta'er'ren'qi'zuo 便可她二人起坐
'bian'ke'tiao'chu'huo'keng'yi 便可跳出火坑矣
'bian'kong'le'ji'she 便空了几社
'bian'kou'tu'ren'yan 便口吐人言
'bian'ku'zhe'wang'jia'mu'na'bian'pao 便哭着往贾母那边跑
'bian'kuang'xi'bu'jin 便狂喜不尽
'bian'la'bao'chai'qiao'shuo'dao 便拉宝钗悄说道
'bian'la'le'qin'zhong 便拉了秦钟
'bian'la'le'xiu'zi'long'zai'mian'shang 便拉了袖子笼在面上
'bian'la'ping'er'xiao'dao 便拉平儿笑道
'bian'la'ta'dao'bi'ren'zhi'chu 便拉他到避人之处
'bian'la'ta'dao'feng'shu'di'xia 便拉他到枫树底下
'bian'la'zhu'su'wei'qu 便拉住诉委屈
'bian'lai'zuo'jian'ru'ma 便来作践辱骂
'bian'lan'jin'yin'shi 便懒进饮食
'bian'lao'tai'tai'fang'qu 便老太太放去
'bian'li'shen'dai'ta'jin'qu 便立身待他进去
'bian'li'zai'ting'bian 便立在亭边
'bian'lian'jiao'jie'mei'qi'lai'le 便连叫姐妹起来了
'bian'lian'le'yi'ju'dao 便联了一句道
'bian'lian'mang'qu'le 便连忙去了
'bian'lian'mang'ti'jia'huan'yan'shi 便连忙替贾环掩饰
'bian'lian'mang'yi'xiao 便连忙一笑

'bian'liang'shou'wu'qi'lian'lai 便两手捂起脸来
'bian'liao'ding'qing'wen'ye'bao'bu'zhu'le 便料定晴雯也保不住了

'bian'ling'chu'ji'yi 便另出己意

'bian'luo'zai'ta'zhuo'shang 便落在他桌上

'bian'shi'na'xie'xiao'ya'tou'zi'men 便是那些小丫头子们
'bian'shi'ni'de'qin'nv'er 便是你的亲女儿
'bian'shi'ou'xiang'xie'de'zhu'qiao'le 便是藕香榭的竹桥了

'bian'shi'qin'zhi'er 便是亲侄儿
'bian'shi'qing'dai'fu 便是请大夫
'bian'shi'qing'shen'yi'zhong'le 便是情深意重了

'bian'shi'san'wan'liang 便是三万两
'bian'shi'shang'hui'jia'lian'suo'jie'jian'de'duo'hun'chong 便是上回贾琏所接见的多浑虫
'bian'shi'shen'me'zi'yang'hao 便是什么字样好
'bian'shi'ta'men'zuo 便是她们作
'bian'shi'tai'tai'men'wen'shi 便是太太们问时
'bian'shi'tan'chun'chu'dang'yi'de 便是探春处当役的
'bian'shi'tie'da'de 便是铁打的
'bian'shi'wang'fu'ren'zheng'fang'de'dong'yuan'le 便是王夫人正房的东院了
'bian'shi'wo'men'de'ya'tou 便是我们的丫头
'bian'shi'wo'men'de'zao'hua 便是我们的造化
'bian'shi'wo'you'bu'zhi'dao'de 便是我有不知道的
'bian'shi'xi'chun'wo'fang 便是惜春卧房
'bian'shi'xi'fu'he'sun'zi'xi'fu'you'xiang'bu'dao'de 便是媳妇和孙子媳妇有想不到的
'bian'shi'yan'xiao'huo'mie'shi 便是烟消火灭时
'bian'shi'yao'hui'su'zhou'qu'le 便是要回苏州去了
'bian'shi'yi'zuo'gong'men 便是一座宫门
'bian'shi'you'le'zui 便是有了罪
'bian'shi'you'ren'lai'jie 便是有人来接
'bian'shi'you'shen'me'shuo'de 便是有什么说的
'bian'shi'yu'cun'de'hao'you'leng'zi'xing 便是雨村的好友冷子兴
'bian'shi'yuan'li'zuo'geng'shang'ye'de'ren 便是园里坐更上夜的人
'bian'shi'zhe'hai'tang 便是这海棠
'bian'shi'zhe'zuo'chang'ting 便是这座敞厅
'bian'shi'zhi'shi'ye'bu'duo 便是执事也不多
'bian'shi'zhong'gong'hou'de'gao'ming 便是众公侯的诰命
'bian'shou'le'tie'zi 便收了帖子
'bian'shou'lei'shuo'dao 便收泪说道
'bian'shuai'lian'zi'chu'qu'le 便摔帘子出去了

'bian'zhi'shi'yu'tiao'yang 便知失于调养

'bian'zi'yi'de'zuo'wei'qi'lai 便恣意的作为起来
'bian'zou'dao'yuan'yang'fang'zhong'he'yuan'yang'shang'yi 便走到鸳鸯房中和鸳鸯商议
'bian'zou'jin'lai'pei'xiao'xiang'jia'mu'dao 便走进来陪笑向贾母道
'bian'zou'kai'ge'chu'xian'shua 便走开各处闲耍

'bian'zou'zhi'li'jian 便走至里间
'bian'zuo'che'hui'jia 便坐车回家
'bian'zuo'ci'er'qu 便作辞而去
'bian'zuo'ci'hui'lai 便作辞回来
'bian'zuo'le'zhu'yi 便作了主意
'bian'zuo'shi'pian'bai'pian 便作十篇百篇
'bian'zuo'zai'jia'mu'xia'shou 便坐在贾母下手
'bian'zuo'zai'kang'yan'shang 便坐在炕沿上
'bian'zuo'zai'yi'shang 便坐在椅上
'biao'di'pan'you'an'bai'ju 表弟潘又安拜具
'biao'zhuang'bu'ru'li'zhuang 表壮不如里壮
'bie'an'zhe'mei'liang'xin'de'zhu'yi 别安着没良心的主意
'bie'ba'zhe'dian'zi'dong'xi'xia'de'cun'zai'xin'li 别把这点子东西吓得存在心里
'bie'bai'zao'ta'le'xiao'ming'er 别白糟踏了小命儿
'bie'chui'shang'tuo'mo'xing'er 别吹上唾沫星儿
'bie'da'hu'xiao'jiao 别大呼小叫
'bie'dai'lei'wo'men'shou'qi 别带累我们受气
'bie'de'cao'chong'bu'hua'ba'le 别的草虫不画罢了
'bie'de'dong'xi'bu'suan 别的东西不算
'bie'de'dou'ba'le 别的都罢了
'bie'de'dou'hai'ba'le 别的都还罢了
'bie'de'dou'ming'bai 别的都明白
'bie'de'dou'rong'yi 别的都容易

'bie'de'kao'bu'de 别的靠不得
'bie'de'lian'zi'zhang 憋得脸紫涨
'bie'de'ma'ma'men'yue'bu'gan'shuo'ni'men'le 别的妈妈们越不敢说你们了
'bie'de'reng'bu'jian'zen'me'yang'da'jian'xiao 别的仍不见怎么样大见效
'bie'de'shi'nu'cai'bu'zhi'dao 别的事奴才不知道

'bie'de'shi'ye'bu'yong'ta'men'guan 别的事也不用她们管

'bie'deng'lao'tai'tai'wen'chu'lai 别等老太太问出来
'bie'dong'shou'dong'jiao'de 别动手动脚的

'bie'fang'ni'niang'de'pi 别放你娘的屁
'bie'fang'ni'niang'de'pi'le 别放你娘的屁了
'bie'feng'feng'dian'dian'de 别疯疯颠颠的

'bie'gu'fu'le'ta'de'xin 别辜负了她的心

'bing'ye'bi'ren'jia'ling'yi'yang 病也比人家另一样
'bing'yi'da'wan're'teng'teng 并一大碗热腾腾
'bing'yi'pian'zhang'mu 并一篇帐目

'bing'yu'le'ta'xiao 并与了她硝
'bing'zhe'zai'dong'nan'fang'de'yu'hua'shen 病者在东南方得遇花神
'bing'zhen'guo'gong'niu'fu'deng'liu'jia 并镇国公牛府等六家
'bing'zhi'jia'dou'yu'bao'yu'dao 并指甲都与宝玉道
'bo'dao'er'ren'xie'lai'dao'ci 跛道二人携来到此
'bo'de'chang'e'ying'jie'wen 博得嫦蛾应借问
'bo'de'ge'di'jiu'tian'chang 博得个地久天长
'bo'de'xu'ming'zai 博得虚名在
'bo'di'ye'ke'tian'ji'mu'le 薄地也可添几亩了
'bo'ge'yang'ye'wei 瓟各样野味
'bo'le'yi'wan'fan 拨了一碗饭
'bo'ming'nv'pian'feng'bo'ming'lang 薄命女偏逢薄命郎
'bo'ming'wu'er'zhi 薄命无二致
'bo'ru'qing'ce'hang'nei 拨入圊厕行内
'bo'shu'de'you'ying'chun 伯叔的有迎春
'bo'si'se'shou'li'yu'bao'yu 帛四色寿礼与宝玉
'bo'zhi'xie'xu'fang'di 薄置些须房地
'bo'zi'wu'shi'zhi 瓟子五十只
'bu'bi'bi'ta'men'cai'shi 不必比她们才是
'bu'bi'bie'ren'you'qiang'xie 不比别人又强些
'bu'bi'chi'jian'yao 不必吃煎药
'bu'bi'dai'yu'gu'gao'zi'xu 不比黛玉孤高自许
'bu'bi'ding'yao'zhou'bei 不必定要周备
'bu'bi'dong'guan'zhong'qian'liang 不必动官中钱粮
'bu'bi'guo'lai'le 不必过来了
'bu'bi'jing'dong'xiao'jie 不必惊动小姐
'bu'bi'la'che'shang'ren 不必拉扯上人
'bu'bi'na'xie'hu'qian'luan'che 不比那些胡牵乱扯
'bu'bi'na'xie'shi'ci'yan'yi'zhi'ren 不比那些饰词掩意之人
'bu'bi'ni'men'yang'jian'zhan'qing'gu'yi 不比你们阳间瞻情顾意
'bu'bi'qian'san'che'si'luan'rang 不必牵三扯四乱嚷
'bu'bi'ren'zhen'da'zhi'da'geng 不必认真大治大耕
'bu'bi'tang're'le 不必烫热了
'bu'bi'xian'ding'le 不必限定了
'bu'bi'xian'qian'zheng'bai'cha 不比先前正摆茶
'bu'bi'xian'shi'de'guang'jing 不比先时的光景
'bu'bi'zai'wang'xia'lian 不必再往下联
'bu'bi'zan'men'shuo 不必咱们说
'bu'bian'du'rao'jia'rong'yi'ren'zhi'yi 不便独扰贾蓉一人之意
'bu'bian'qian'tou'lai 不便前头来
'bu'bian'shi'he'di'fang 不辨是何地方
'bu'bian'wei'zhe'dian'xiao'shi'lai'guo'xu'de 不便为这点小事来聒絮的
'bu'bian'wei'zhe'dian'zi'xiao'shi'qu'xu'dao 不便为这点子小事去絮叨
'bu'bian'zi'ji'kua'zhang'zhi'yi 不便自己夸张之意
'bu'bu'shang'san'wu'zhen 补不上三五针
'bu'ceng'liu'xin'jin'chu 不曾留心近处
'bu'ceng'ying'jie'yuan'ke 不曾迎接远客
'bu'chang'guo'lai'de 不常过来的
'bu'cheng'le'da'guan'yuan'de'fan'pan'le 不成了大观园的反叛了
'bu'cheng'wang'lao'ye'yu'jin'ye'shou'geng'shen'shi 不承望老爷于今夜守庚申时
'bu'cheng'wang'nai'nai'zhe'hui'zi'jiu'lai'le 不承望奶奶这会子就来了
'bu'cheng'wang'ni'bu'dan'bu'xi'du'shu 不承望你不但不喜读书
'bu'cheng'wang'ta'shi'zhe'zhong'wei'ren 不承望她是这种为人
'bu'cheng'wang'wang'fu'ren'fang'le'chu'qu 不承望王夫人放了出去
'bu'cheng'wang'zi'dao'yu'cun'shen'bian 不承望自到雨村身边
'bu'chou'bu'shi'shi'weng'le 不愁不是诗翁了
'bu'da'de'zui'ren 不大得罪人
'bu'da'jin'yin'shi 不大进饮食
'bu'da'po'gu'san'qian 不打破鼓三千
'bu'da'sui'he'ci'shi'you'de 不大随和此是有的
'bu'da'zai'xin'shang 不大在心上
'bu'dai'wen'er'ke'zhi'jiao'qie'zhi'xing'de'le 不待问而可知娇怯之形的了
'bu'dan'bao'chai'zi'mei'zai'ci 不但宝钗姊妹在此
'bu'dan'bu'diu'chou 不但不丢丑
'bu'dan'bu'neng'bao'xiao'chao'ting 不但不能报效朝廷
'bu'dan'bu'neng'shuo 不但不能说
'bu'dan'bu'neng'zhang'jin 不但不能长进
'bu'dan'bu'wei'fu 不但不畏服
'bu'dan'bu'wei'guai 不但不为怪
'bu'dan'bu'yao'ru'hua 不但不要入画
'bu'dan'duan'wu'jin'ri'zhi'huan 不但断无今日之患
'bu'dan'gu'niang'men'wei'qu'fan'nao 不但姑娘们委屈烦恼
'bu'dan'hua'you'yi'ge'shen 不但花有一个神
'bu'dan'jia'fu'zhong'ren'xie'en 不但贾府中人谢恩
'bu'dan'mei'le'qi 不但没了气
'bu'dan'mei'shu'chi'bu'de 不但没熟吃不得
'bu'dan'na'qi'xiao'ren'jian'le 不但那起小人见了
'bu'dan'neng'gan'zhi'bu'jiang'ren 不但能干织补匠人
'bu'dan'ni'wo'bu'neng'chen'xin 不但你我不能趁心
'bu'dan'wo'ting'de'zhen'qie 不但我听得真切
'bu'dan'yang'shi'hao 不但样式好
'bu'dan'yi'ma'hao'le'hai'lai'de 不但姨妈好了还来的
'bu'dan'you'wu'zun'xiong'zhi'qing'cao 不但有污尊兄之清操
'bu'dan'yu'wo'xin'bu'ren 不但于我心不忍
'bu'dan'zai'xi'de'zhu'ren'xi'huan 不但在席的诸人喜欢
'bu'dan'zai'zi'mei'qian 不但在姊妹前
'bu'dan'zhe'xiong'fan'duo'de'fang'xiang'wo'zhi'dao 不但这凶犯躲的方向我知道
'bu'dang'zai'zhe'li'de'ye'wei'ke'zhi 不当在这里的也未可知
'bu'dao'ban'yue'gong'fu 不到半月工夫
'bu'dao'er'shi'sui'jiu'qu'le'qi 不到二十岁就娶了妻
'bu'de'bu'sui'de 不得不随的
'bu'de'bu'zhu'fu 不得不嘱咐
'bu'de'chu'lai'hui'ni 不得出来回你
'bu'de'he'ni'shuo'hua'er 不得和你说话儿
'bu'de'qin'zi'lai 不得亲自来
'bu'du'bu'neng'xing'qin 不独不能省亲
'bu'du'jiang'ta'er'zi'ya'dao 不独将她二姊压倒
'bu'du'shu'de'shi'jie'xiang'zhe'jia'li'xie 不读书的时节想着家里些
'bu'du'si'zhe'xiang'ji 不独死者享祭
'bu'du'yuan'nei'ren'you 不独园内人有
'bu'fan'xian'mang'zhe'ba'ge'lu'bai'chu'lai 不犯先忙着把个炉摆出来
'bu'fan'zhe'dai'lei'bie'ren 不犯着带累别人
'bu'fan'zhe'qian'san'gua'si'de 不犯着牵三挂四的
'bu'fan'zhe'you'yong 不犯着又用
'bu'fan'zhe'zhe'yang'gan'huo'sheng 不犯着这样肝火盛
'bu'fang'chang'dao'han'di 不妨常到寒第
'bu'fang'dao'hu'de'de'yi'zhan'yan 不防倒唬的得一展眼
'bu'fang'jiao'xia'bei'qing'tai'hua'dao 不防脚下被青苔滑倒
'bu'fang'lian'er'ye'zai'jia'he'ren'shuo'hua 不防琏二爷在家和人说话
'bu'fang'ni'ye'nan 不放你也难
'bu'fang'qi'qing'nei'ting'luan'yu'ru'qi'si'di 不妨启请内廷鸾舆入其私第
'bu'fang'ren'chu'ru 不放人出入
'bu'fang'ying'tou'zhuang'jian'xing'fu'ren 不防迎头撞见邢夫人
'bu'fang'zai'fan'yi'bian 不妨再翻一遍
'bu'fang'zan'men'duo'shi'ji'liang'yin'zi 不妨咱们多使几两银子
'bu'fen'yu'ta'men'xie 不分与她们些
'bu'fu'jia'ren'de'hua 不服家人的话
'bu'fu'si'jing'er'yi 不负斯景而已
'bu'fu'tan'chun'deng'yue'shu 不服探春等约束
'bu'gai'hang'zhe'ling 不该行这令
'bu'gai'jiao'ta'men'chu'cai'shi 不该叫她们出才是
'bu'gai'ling'ta'min'shang'bin'qu 不该令她抿上鬓去
'bu'gai'zuo'ci'guo'yu'qi'qing'qi'jue'zhi'yu 不该作此过于凄清奇谲之语
'bu'gai'zuo'zhe'mei'xing'zhi'zhi'shi 不该做这没行止之事
'bu'gan'bu'jing'de'dong'xi'ji'hui 不干不净的东西忌讳
'bu'gan'chong'zhuang'ta'ba'le 不敢冲撞他罢了
'bu'gan'chu'qi'er 不敢出气儿
'bu'gan'duo'po'fei'le 不敢多破费了
'bu'gan'hai'yi'yan 不敢还一言
'bu'gan'ji'shi'bu'zhang'kou 不干己事不张口
'bu'gan'jue'jiang'le 不敢倔强了
'bu'gan'lai'si'qin 不敢来厮侵
'bu'gan'lai'zhan're 不敢来沾惹
'bu'gan'qian'lai'zai'jia'chu'fan 不敢前来再加触犯
'bu'gan'quan'ta'shuo'ta 不敢劝他说他
'bu'gan'ru'xian'qian'qing'man'shu'hu'le 不敢如先前轻慢疏忽了
'bu'gan'shao'jia'chuan'zao 不敢稍加穿凿
'bu'gan'shi'cai'zi'zhuan 不敢恃才自专
'bu'gan'shui'zhong'jiao 不敢睡中觉
'bu'gan'shuo'bie'de 不敢说别的
'bu'gan'ti'ping'er 不敢提平儿
'bu'gan'zhou'ran'ru'dou'gan'du 不敢骤然入都干渎
'bu'gao'deng'qing'bu'cheng 不告等请不成
'bu'gei'lao'ye'gei'shui 不给老爷给谁

'bu'gei'ta'ge'li'hai 不给他个利害
'bu'gei'ye'mei'fang'ai 不给也没妨碍
'bu'gou'fu'shi'de 不够服侍的
'bu'gu'fu'ni'zhe'hua 不辜负你这话
'bu'gu'he'xiao'si'shuo'hua 不顾和小厮说话
'bu'gu'lao'tai'tai 不顾老太太
'bu'gu'xia'ren'de 不顾下人的
'bu'gu'xiu'liang'ge'qing'ke'xiang'gong 卜固修两个清客相公
'bu'guan'bie'ren'si'huo 不管别人死活
'bu'guan'da'fa'liang'ge'nv'ren'qu'jiu'wan'le 不管打发两个女人去就完了
'bu'guan'de'bu'guan'le 不管的不管了
'bu'guan'na'li'xian'zhi'er'bai'liang'lai 不管哪里先支二百两来
'bu'guan'qing'hong'zao'bai 不管青红皂白
'bu'guan'sheng'li'jia'se'deng'shi 不惯生理稼穑等事
'bu'guan'shi'qin'shi'you 不管是亲是友
'bu'guan'shui'qu'shuo'yi'sheng'qu 不管谁去说一声去
'bu'guan'zai'jia'chu'wai 不管在家出外

'bu'guan'zen'me'shui'ba'le 不管怎么睡罢了
'bu'guan'zen'yang'dou'guo'de'qu 不管怎样都过得去
'bu'guo'ai'shang'lao'ye'yi'dun'ma 不过挨上老爷一顿骂
'bu'guo'ai'yi'ke'shi'yi'ke 不过挨一刻是一刻
'bu'guo'bai'li'lu'cheng 不过百里路程
'bu'guo'bai'shuo'yi'ju 不过白说一句
'bu'guo'bai'yu'bu 不过百余步
'bu'guo'bai'zhu'fu'ni 不过白嘱咐你

'bu'guo'bei'di'li'shuo'wo'xie'xian'hua 不过背地里说我些闲话
'bu'guo'bi'bie'ren'lue'ming'bai'xie 不过比别人略明白些
'bu'guo'bi'ren'jia'de'ya'tou'lue'qiang'xie'ba'le 不过比人家的丫头略强些罢了
'bu'guo'cai'liang'ci'ba'le 不过才两次罢了
'bu'guo'chao'jian'chu'xie'duo'yu'zan'xia'la'zhu 不过抄检出些多余攒下蜡烛
'bu'guo'chu'le'er'men 不过出了二门
'bu'guo'chuan'qi'da'gai 不过传其大概

'bu'guo'dou'shi'jia'chang'dong'xi 不过都是家常东西

'bu'guo'ge'chu'kan'wang'kan'wang 不过各处看望看望

'bu'guo'gong'yi'shi'zhi'xing'qu 不过供一时之兴趣

'bu'guo'hai'shi'zhe'yang 不过还是这样
'bu'guo'he'ping'er'shuo'xiao'yi'hui 不过和平儿说笑一回
'bu'guo'ji'shi'pian 不过几十篇
'bu'guo'jia'chong'yang'zi'zhi'yi 不过假充养子之意
'bu'guo'jian'na'zheng'jing'de'kan'ye'ba'le 不过拣那正经的看也罢了
'bu'guo'jian'shi'xie'da'shi'tou 不过见是些大石头
'bu'guo'jiao'ni'xin'li'liu'shen 不过叫你心里留神
'bu'guo'jiao'xi'fu'chu'lai'wen'wen 不过叫媳妇出来问问

'bu'guo'jie'shi'ning 不过皆是宁

'bu'guo'ke'ge'tou 不过磕个头
'bu'guo'lai'ci'yu'duo'de'xie'shao'mai'zhi'fei 不过赖此欲多得些烧埋之费
'bu'guo'lai'zu'fu'jiu'ri'de'qing'fen 不过赖祖父旧日的情分

'bu'guo'ling'qi'yu'ta'men'jiang'xi 不过令其与她们浆洗
'bu'guo'ling'ren'zhao'zhao'zhang'jia 不过令人找着张家
'bu'guo'ling'xing'za'xiang 不过零星杂项

'bu'guo'lue'dong'le'ji'yang 不过略动了几样

'bu'guo'lue'shi'ji'zi 不过略识几字
'bu'guo'lue'xie'yi'yu 不过略谢一语

'bu'guo'mei'nian'si'jie'da'dun'song'li 不过每年四节大趸送礼
'bu'guo'ni'shi'ge'zheng'jing'ren 不过你是个正经人
'bu'guo'ou'gan'feng'han 不过偶感风寒
'bu'guo'ou'gan'yi'dian'feng'han 不过偶感一点风寒

'bu'guo'ou'ran'xiu'yi'liang'jian'zhen'xian'zuo'shua 不过偶然绣一两件针线作耍
'bu'guo'ou'yin'jian'qi'zhong'huo'yi'er'gu'nei 不过偶因见其中或一二股内

'bu'guo'pa'qi'zheng'duan 不过怕起争端
'bu'guo'pei'shang'ge'xiao'zi 不过配上个小子
'bu'guo'qiu'yi'qiu 不过求一求
'bu'guo'san'wu'ri'jiu'qi'shen 不过三五日就起身
'bu'guo'se'ze'er'yi 不过塞责而已
'bu'guo'shang'yi'shang'yi 不过商议商议
'bu'guo'shao'xie'zhi'qian 不过烧些纸钱
'bu'guo'shi'an'li'er'xing 不过是按例而行
'bu'guo'shi'chun'lian'shang'huo'you'zhi 不过是春联上或有之
'bu'guo'shi'da'jia'wan'xiao 不过是大家玩笑
'bu'guo'shi'ge'jiu'ri'de'kong'jia'zi 不过是个旧日的空架子
'bu'guo'shi'ge'li 不过是个礼
'bu'guo'shi'ge'ming'er 不过是个名儿
'bu'guo'shi'ge'ya'tou 不过是个丫头
'bu'guo'shi'gei'da'fa'shuo'qu'de'xiao'si'zuo'pan'chan 不过是给打发说去的小厮做盘缠
'bu'guo'shi'gui'zhong'you'xi 不过是闺中游戏
'bu'guo'shi'hong'ni'wan'de 不过是哄你玩的
'bu'guo'shi'ji'bi'xie'yi 不过是几笔写意
'bu'guo'shi'jia'li'de'ren 不过是家里的人
'bu'guo'shi'jie'jie'shuo'de'zai'xian 不过是姐姐说的在先
'bu'guo'shi'jie'ta'yi'nao 不过是借他一闹
'bu'guo'shi'ju'wan'hua 不过是句玩话
'bu'guo'shi'lai'qiao'qiao'gu'tai'tai 不过是来瞧瞧姑太太
'bu'guo'shi'lao'fa'le 不过是劳乏了
'bu'guo'shi'li'tou'zhao'guan'zhao'guan 不过是里头照管照管
'bu'guo'shi'lian'ruan'xin'ci 不过是脸软心慈
'bu'guo'shi'liang'zhi'zhuo'se'bi'jiu'wan'le 不过是两支着色笔就完了
'bu'guo'shi'na'lai'yu'bei'zhe 不过是拿来预备着
'bu'guo'shi'ping'chang'dong'yong'zhi'wu 不过是平常动用之物
'bu'guo'shi'ren'de'liang'ge'zi 不过是认得两个字
'bu'guo'shi'ren'shen 不过是人参
'bu'guo'shi'san'ri'da'yu 不过是三日打鱼
'bu'guo'shi'shi'ni'de'qing'zhuo 不过是试你的清浊
'bu'guo'shi'shuo'le'ji'ju'wan'hua 不过是说了几句玩话
'bu'guo'shi'ta'zi'ji'zhi'dao 不过使她自己知道
'bu'guo'shi'tan'jing'yi'jin'bu'er 不过是探景一进步耳
'bu'guo'shi'tian'ban'ge'yue'zhi'nei 不过十天半个月之内
'bu'guo'shi'tou'you 不过是头油
'bu'guo'shi'wan'er'ba'le 不过是玩儿罢了
'bu'guo'shi'wo'bai'cun'duo 不过是我白忖度
'bu'guo'shi'wu'da'wu'zhuang'de'yu'jian'le 不过是误打误撞的遇见了
'bu'guo'shi'xian'cheng'de'dian 不过是现成的典
'bu'guo'shi'xie'cai'duan 不过是些彩缎
'bu'guo'shi'xuan'tian're'nao'fei'chang'er'yi 不过是喧阗热闹非常而已
'bu'guo'shi'xue'qi'yuan'ruo 不过是血气原弱
'bu'guo'shi'yan'yu'jin'shen 不过是言语谨慎
'bu'guo'shi'yi'nian'de'fei'yong 不过是一年的费用
'bu'guo'shi'yuan'li'de'ren'de'dong'yong'de'dong'xi 不过是园里的人的动用的东西
'bu'guo'shi'yuan'lu'dai'lai'de'tu'wu'er 不过是远路带来的土物儿
'bu'guo'shi'zhe'ji'ge'peng'you'xin'zhu'le 不过是这几个朋友新筑了
'bu'guo'shi'zhe'wu'li'ren'yi'shi'duan'le'shi'le 不过是这屋里人一时短了使了
'bu'guo'shou'le'yi'ge'yue'de'an'qi 不过受了一个月的暗气
'bu'guo'shuo'le'ji'ju'wan'hua 不过说了几句玩话
'bu'guo'shuo'ta'yi'ge'cu'cao'jiu'wan'le 不过说她一个粗糙就完了
'bu'guo'shuo'xie'dai'yu'zhi'mu'ru'he'de'bing 不过说些黛玉之母如何得病
'bu'guo'sui'bian'he'le'ji'bei'jiu 不过随便喝了几杯酒
'bu'guo'sui'chang'de'dong'xi 不过随常的东西
'bu'guo'sui'shou'xie'zi'de'bi'hua'hua'ba'le 不过随手写字的笔画画罢了
'bu'guo'ta'hu'zhou'ru'ci 不过他胡诌如此
'bu'guo'ta'men'yi'chu'chi'jiu 不过他们一处吃酒
'bu'guo'tai'tai'ou'ran'xin'le'ren'de'fei'yan 不过太太偶然信了人的诽言
'bu'guo'ting'wo'men'yi'ge'fa'tuo'kou'chi 不过听我们一个发脱口齿
'bu'guo'tou'xiang'qie'yu 不过偷香窃玉
'bu'guo'wan'de'shi'hou'jiao'yi'sheng'ban'sheng'ming'zi 不过玩的时候叫一声半声名字
'bu'guo'wan'jian'xun'geng 不过晚间巡更
'bu'guo'wei'ao'kun 不过为熬困
'bu'guo'wei'de'shi'na'zai'shou'zhong'kan'zhe'bian'yi 不过为的是拿在手中看着便易
'bu'guo'wei'de'shi'qian 不过为的是钱
'bu'guo'wei'de'shi'ri'yong 不过为的是日用
'bu'guo'wei'jin'ge'li 不过为尽个礼
'bu'guo'wo'dai'qu'qu'xin'er 不过我带去取信耳
'bu'guo'wo'qi'ji'le 不过我气急了
'bu'guo'wo'xiang'zhe'bao'jie'jie'ye'shi'ke'zhong 不过我想着宝姐姐也是客中
'bu'guo'wu'ren'chu'ou'ran'qu'ge'xiao'er 不过无人处偶然取个笑儿
'bu'guo'xie'zhi'xue'pan 不过挟制薛蟠
'bu'guo'yao'dong'xi'zhi'shuo'de'yi'sheng'er 不过要东西只说得一声儿
'bu'guo'yi'bai'liang'jin'zi 不过一百两金子
'bu'guo'yi'gai'shi'shi'su'qu'xiao 不过一概是市俗取笑
'bu'guo'yi'li'zhi'yao 不过一里之遥
'bu'guo'yi'shi'ban'shang 不过一时半晌
'bu'guo'yi'shi'yong'bi 不过一时壅蔽
'bu'guo'yi'shi'zhi'xing 不过一时之兴
'bu'guo'yi'yi'zhi'chong'shi'yong 不过以一知充十用
'bu'guo'yin'chu'yi'xing 不过因出一姓
'bu'guo'yong'wo'shuo'yi'ju'hua'ba'le 不过用我说一句话罢了
'bu'guo'you'ji'ge'gai'ban'shang'ye'de'lao'yu 不过有几个该班上夜的老妪
'bu'guo'yu'bei'gu'niang'men'shi'yong'jiu'ba'le 不过预备姑娘们使用就罢了
'bu'guo'yue'rong'mao 不过悦容貌
'bu'guo'yue'zhong'jiu'jin'jing'de 不过月中就进京的
'bu'guo'zan'lai'xie'zu'er'yi 不过暂来歇足而已
'bu'guo'ze'qi'jin'yao'zhe'lu'zhi 不过择其紧要者录之
'bu'guo'zhang'zhe'zhe'xie'gong'lao'qing'fen 不过仗着这些功劳情分
'bu'guo'zhe'ji'yang 不过这几样
'bu'guo'zhi'qu'qi'shi'ti'qing'li'ba'le 不过只取其事体情理罢了
'bu'guo'zhi'wan'an'xie'er'yi 不过至晚安歇而已
'bu'guo'zhi'you'xiao'cha'die'da 不过只有小茶碟大
'bu'guo'zuo'hou'ren'er'ming'diao'lu'zhi'jie 不过作后人饵名钓禄之阶
'bu'hao'le'heng'shu'you'jiao'dao'ta'de'ren 不好了横竖有教导他的人
'bu'hao'le'zai'zuo 不好了再作
'bu'hao'pie'xia'jiu'hui'lai 不好撇下就回来
'bu'hao'yin'man'ta'liang'ge 不好隐瞒他两个
'bu'hao'yin'sheng'qian'ling'ren'qu'jian'guan 不好因省钱令人去监管
'bu'hao'yu'bao'chai'zi'mei'gong'chu'xian'yu 不好与宝钗姊妹共处闲语
'bu'he'lao'tai'tai'de'yi'si 不合老太太的意思
'bu'he'ni'men'yao 不和你们要
'bu'he'wo'shuo'bie'de'hai'ke 不和我说别的还可
'bu'he'ye'bian'he'le 不和也变和了
'bu'hui'qu'ye'ba 不回去也罢
'bu'hui'qu'ye'ba'le 不回去也罢了
'bu'hui'shuo'hua'ye'wu'yong 不会说话也无用
'bu'huo'hui'sheng'zhi'yao 不获回生之药
'bu'ji'bao'yu'kong'ling'juan'yi 不及宝玉空灵娟逸
'bu'ji'dang'nian'hu'lu'miao'li'zhi'shi'le 不记当年葫芦庙里之事了
'bu'ji'gui'zhong'lin'si'niang 不及闺中林四娘
'bu'ji'mian'ci'le 不及面辞了
'bu'ji'ni'jiao'ta'dao'de'shi'you'qing'yi'de 不及你叫她倒的是有情意的
'bu'jian'chen'sha'qi 不见尘沙起
'bu'jian'de'hao'chu 不见得好处
'bu'jian'di'xia'de 不见底下的
'bu'jian'yi'ban'ba'le 不见一半罢了
'bu'jian'yuan'yang'dong'shou 不见鸳鸯动手
'bu'jiao'he'ni'shuo'xiao 不叫和你说笑
'bu'jiao'ta'zai'zhe'wu'li 不叫他在这屋里
'bu'jin'die'zu'xiao'dao 不禁跌足笑道
'bu'jin'dong'le'chui'xian'zhi'yi 不禁动了垂涎之意
'bu'jin'hong'le'lian 不禁红了脸
'bu'jin'mao'gu'sen'ran 不禁毛骨森然
'bu'jin'qu'zhao'ta'yi'zhao 不禁去招她一招
'bu'jin'ren'qing'zhi'tai 不近人情之态
'bu'jin'shen'shou'na'qi 不禁伸手拿起
'bu'jin'ye'qi'shen'jiao'miao 不禁也起身叫妙

'bu'jin'you'shang'xin'ku'le'qi'lai 不禁又伤心哭了起来
'bu'jin'zhun'zhun'zhi'wen 不禁谆谆之问
'bu'jiu'dou'yao'san'de'le 不久都要散的了
'bu'ju'na'li'de'shui'yao'yi'wan'kan'zhe'ku'qu 不拘那里的水舀一碗看着哭去
'bu'ju'na'li'sheng'yi'min'zi'ye'jiu'gou'le 不拘哪里省一抿子也就够了
'bu'ju'na'liang'chu'jiu'shi'le 不拘哪两出就是了
'bu'ju'shen'me'dou'hao 不拘什么都好
'bu'ju'shi'ci'ya'xue 不拘诗词雅谑
'bu'ju'ting'jian'ge'shen'me'hua'er 不拘听见个什么话儿
'bu'ju'zen'me'yang 不拘怎么样
'bu'jue'chang'tan'yi'sheng 不觉长叹一声
'bu'jue'chi'yi'da'jing 不觉吃一大惊
'bu'jue'chi'yi'jing 不觉吃一惊
'bu'jue'da'dong'fan'xin 不觉打动凡心
'bu'jue'da'le'liang'ge'pen'ti 不觉打了两个喷嚏
'bu'jue'da'xiao'qi'lai 不觉大笑起来
'bu'jue'dao'le'xing'ye'zhu 不觉到了杏叶渚
'bu'jue'de'hong'le'lian 不觉的红了脸
'bu'jue'de'hui'xin'zhuan'bei 不觉的灰心转悲
'bu'jue'de'yin'duo'fa'le'liang'bei'jiu 不觉的因多罚了两杯酒
'bu'jue'de'you'shang'qi'xin'lai'le 不觉的又伤起心来了
'bu'jue'de'you'yan'quan'er'yi'hong 不觉得又眼圈儿一红
'bu'jue'di'xia'lei'lai 不觉滴下泪来
'bu'jue'dong'kai'xin'yi 不觉洞开心臆
'bu'jue'dui'jing'gan'huai 不觉对景感怀
'bu'jue'fei'gong'xian'jia'qi'lai 不觉飞觥限斝起来
'bu'jue'geng'ku'qi'lai'le 不觉更哭起来了
'bu'jue'gou'qi'fang'cai'de'huo'lai 不觉勾起方才的火来
'bu'jue'hong'le'lian 不觉红了脸
'bu'jue'jing'dao'le'yi'zuo'hua'yuan'zhi'nei 不觉竟到了一座花园之内
'bu'jue'jiu'de'le'yi'bing 不觉就得了一病
'bu'jue'jiu'hu'hu'de'shui'qu 不觉就忽忽的睡去
'bu'jue'jiu'yi'ba'jiu'fen'le 不觉酒已八九分了
'bu'jue'leng'ran'ru'han'bing'qin'gu 不觉冷然如寒冰侵骨
'bu'jue'liu'xia'lei'lai 不觉流下泪来
'bu'jue'meng'long'shui'qu 不觉朦胧睡去
'bu'jue'qi'le'juan'ce 不觉弃了卷册

'bu'jue'ru'sang'hun'po'yi'ban 不觉如丧魂魄一般
'bu'jue'shen'shou'zhi'da'tui'chu 不觉伸手至大腿处
'bu'jue'xiang'qi'zai'zhe'li'shui'shang'jiao 不觉想起在这里睡晌觉
'bu'jue'ye'xiu'de'hong'zhang'le'lian'mian 不觉也羞得红涨了脸面
'bu'jue'yi'qi'shi'sheng'dou'da'xiao'qi'lai 不觉一齐失声都大笑起来
'bu'jue'you'di'xia'lei'lai 不觉又滴下泪来
'bu'jue'you'shi'huan'xi 不觉又是欢喜
'bu'jue'you'shi'qian'tou'chi'wan'fan'zhi'shi 不觉又是前头吃晚饭之时

'bu'jue'you'xi'huan'qi'lai 不觉又喜欢起来
'bu'kan'ni'su'ri'xiao'jing'wo 不看你素日孝敬我
'bu'kan'ni'su'ri'zhi'qing 不看你素日之情
'bu'kan'wo'de'lian 不看我的脸
'bu'ke'bu'wen'di 不可不闻笛

'bu'mian'you'ku'le 不免又哭了

'bu'mian'you'wen'xie'hua 不免又问些话

'bu'neng'bao'qi'wan'yi 不能报其万一

'bu'nian'le'zuo'shen'me 不撵了作什么
'bu'nian'su'ri'zhi'qing 不念素日之情
'bu'nu'er'fan'le 不怒而反乐
'bu'pa'lao'tai'tai'bu'he'ni'mu'qin'shuo 不怕老太太不和你母亲说
'bu'pa'mei'ba'ren'jiao'ni'zuo 不怕没八人轿你坐
'bu'pa'na'shou'bei'bu'yi 不怕那守备不依
'bu'pa'ni'lao'ren'jia'nao'wo 不怕你老人家恼我
'bu'pa'ni'men'xiao'hua 不怕你们笑话
'bu'pa'ni'xian'wo 不怕你嫌我
'bu'pa'ta'duo'xin 不怕他多心
'bu'pa'xiu'sao'de'cai'na'ta'hun'bi'ne 不怕羞臊的才拿它混比呢
'bu'pa'zhang'hua'bu'yi 不怕张华不依
'bu'qi'jun'guo'leng'xin'leng'mian 不期君果冷心冷面
'bu'qi'liu'jia'de'zai'nei 不期柳家的在内

'bu'qi'zhong'yi'ming'gui'ge 不期忠义明闺阁
'bu'qiu'da'shi'ping'zhong'lu 不求大士瓶中露
'bu'quan'er'zi'zhi'le 不劝而自止了
'bu'ran'bian'jue'xiao'suo 不然便觉萧索
'bu'ran'da'jia'jiu'fen'qi'lai 不然大家就奋起来
'bu'ran'dao'shi'yi'men'hao'qin 不然倒是一门好亲
'bu'ran'dao'xiang'shi'he'feng'jie'jie'du'qi'le'shi'de 不然倒像是和凤姐姐赌气了似的
'bu'ran'feng'shan'le'shi'da 不然风扇了事大
'bu'ran'jin'lai'le 不然进来了
'bu'ran'jiu'shi'lao'le'shen'si 不然就是劳了神思
'bu'ran'lian'xiao'yi'er 不然连小衣儿
'bu'ran'qi'xu'nu'cai'lai'wo'shen'shang'fan'zei'zang'ne 不然岂许奴才来我身上翻贼赃呢
'bu'ran'ren'jia'jiu'yi'huo'le 不然人家就疑惑了
'bu'ran'shi'zou'le'lai'hui'nai'nai 不然时走了来回奶奶
'bu'ran'ta'ye'ai'chi 不然他也爱吃
'bu'ran'wo'jiu'qu'le 不然我就去了
'bu'ran'wo'men'hai'qu'ba 不然我们还去罢
'bu'ran'wo'zi'ji'xin'li'hu'tu 不然我自己心里胡涂
'bu'ran'xiong'di'ning'neng'ke'jue'hou 不然兄弟宁能可绝后
'bu'ran'yao'deng'zhe'wang'wai'pin 不然要等着往外聘
'bu'ran'ye'shi'na'chu'bing'fang'ma 不然也是那出兵放马
'bu'ran'yi'nian'ye'cha'bu'chu'lai 不然一年也查不出来
'bu'ran'zao'jiu'fei'le'lai'le 不然早就飞了来了
'bu'ren'yi'ren'qing'de'jiu'shi'le 不任意任情的就是了
'bu'ri'ke'jie'lv'yu'yun'ni'zhi'shang'yi 不日可接履于云霓之上矣
'bu'ri'yao'dai'le'jia'juan'qu'shang'ren 不日要带了家眷去上任
'bu'rong'feng'su'duo'yan 不容封肃多言
'bu'ru'ba'zhe'shi'jiao'yu'ye'ma 不如把这事交与叶妈
'bu'ru'bu'shuo'ba'le 不如不说罢了
'bu'ru'bu'shuo'de'hao 不如不说的好
'bu'ru'chen'ci'ji'hui 不如趁此机会
'bu'ru'chen'kong'er'liu'xia'zhe'yi'fen 不如趁空儿留下这一份
'bu'ru'chen'shi'lian'wo'men'yi'qi'nian'le 不如趁势连我们一齐撵了
'bu'ru'chuo'lan'le 不如戳烂了
'bu'ru'da'jia'cou'ge'she 不如大家凑个社
'bu'ru'da'jia'dou'nuo'jin'qu 不如大家都挪进去
'bu'ru'da'sao'zi'zhe'yi'fen'wo'ti'ta'chu'le'ba 不如大嫂子这一分我替他出了罢
'bu'ru'deng'leng'yi'leng 不如等冷一冷
'bu'ru'deng'zhe'yun'ya'tou'lai'le 不如等着云丫头来了
'bu'ru'duo'le'zhei'li 不如躲了这里
'bu'ru'fang'ta'qu'ba 不如放他去罢
'bu'ru'ge'ren'qu'ba 不如各人去罢
'bu'ru'gei'ta'men'ji'liang'yin'zi'pan'fei 不如给她们几两银子盘费
'bu'ru'hai'shi'zhao'dai'yu'qu'xiang'ban'yi'ri 不如还是找黛玉去相伴一日
'bu'ru'hai'song'le'qu 不如还送了去
'bu'ru'hou'yuan'men'li'tou'de'wu'jian'da'fang'zi 不如后园门里头的五间大房子
'bu'ru'hui'ge'ye'ju 不如会个夜局
'bu'ru'hui'le'tai'tai 不如回了太太
'bu'ru'jian'ge'kong'ri'hui'ming'lao'tai'tai 不如拣个空日回明老太太
'bu'ru'jiao'ling'jie'jie'he'wo'zuo'ban'qu 不如叫菱姐姐和我作伴去
'bu'ru'jiao'ta'men'ji'gu 不如叫她们击鼓
'bu'ru'jie'le'lai 不如借了来
'bu'ru'jing'ba'mai'ban'de'mei'yue'juan'le'wei'shi 不如竟把买办的每月蠲了为是
'bu'ru'jing'ba'ni'lin'mei'mei'ding'yu'ta 不如竟把你林妹妹定与他
'bu'ru'ju'le'lai'zan'men'le 不如拘了来咱们乐
'bu'ru'kuai'qu'wei'shi 不如快去为是
'bu'ru'ling'ta'zhe'ge'qing 不如领她这个情
'bu'ru'ling'zuo'liang'shou'wei'shi 不如另作两首为是
'bu'ru'ming'er'nuo'jin'chuang'lai'shi'zheng'jing 不如明儿挪进床来是正经
'bu'ru'nao'lin'gu'niang'ban'ye'qu'ba 不如闹林姑娘半夜去罢
'bu'ru'ni'ge'zi'zhu'zhe 不如你各自住着
'bu'ru'ni'ming'bai 不如你明白
'bu'ru'ni'tai'le'qu 不如你抬了去
'bu'ru'pei'le'bu'shi 不如赔了不是
'bu'ru'ping'zhun'yi'qian'er'bai'liang'yin'zi 不如平准一千二百两银子
'bu'ru'qin'fu'mu 不如亲父母
'bu'ru'qu'suo'hui'ding'li 不如去索回定礼
'bu'ru'san'le'ba 不如散了罢
'bu'ru'shui'shu'le 不如谁输了
'bu'ru'shuo'zan'men 不如说咱们
'bu'ru'si'le'gan'jing 不如死了干净
'bu'ru'song'gei'ta'qu 不如送给他去
'bu'ru'tai'tai'xian'qu 不如太太先去
'bu'ru'tong'zhe'yi'qi'guo'qu'le 不如同着一齐过去了
'bu'ru'wang'shu'jin'xie'de'di'fang'qu 不如往熟近些的地方去
'bu'ru'wen'dai'yu'qu 不如问黛玉去
'bu'ru'wen'ta'men'shui'ling'zhe'yi'fen'de 不如问她们谁领这一份的
'bu'ru'wo'dao'ting'shang'sui'bian'tang'tang'qu'dao'hao 不如我到厅上随便躺躺去倒好
'bu'ru'wo'hui'bi'le'dao'hao 不如我回避了倒好
'bu'ru'wo'men'liang'ge'ren'shi'dan'zai'zhe'li 不如我们两个人是单在这里
'bu'ru'wo'qu'po'le'zhe'li 不如我去破了这例
'bu'ru'wo'xian'nian 不如我先撵
'bu'ru'xian'kai'fa'de'hao 不如现开发的好
'bu'ru'ye'da'dian'ji'ge'ben'qian 不如也打点几个本钱
'bu'ru'yi'shi'chang'you 不如意事常有
'bu'ru'zai'hua'yi'gu'yan 不如再化一股烟
'bu'ru'zai'qing'ke'ge'se'chen'she'zhi'nei 不入在请客各色陈设之内
'bu'ru'zai'qing'yi'ge'gao'ming'de'ren'lai'qiao'yi'qiao 不如再请一个高明的人来瞧一瞧
'bu'ru'zai'yuan'zi'li'suo'you'de'lao'ma'ma'zhong 不如在园子里所有的老妈妈中
'bu'ru'zai'zhe'li 不如在这里
'bu'ru'zai'zhuan'jie'ba 不如再转借罢
'bu'ru'zan'men'hui'qu'ba 不如咱们回去罢
'bu'ru'zan'men'yao'yi'kuai 不如咱们要一块
'bu'ru'zei'qing'yi'an'le'bu'cheng 不入贼情一案了不成
'bu'ru'zhe'hui'zi'zuo'le'wo'de'che 不如这会子坐了我的车
'bu'ru'zhi'ba'si'qi'dai'guo'qu 不如直把司棋带过去
'bu'ru'zuo'xie'deng'mi 不如作些灯谜
'bu'ru'zuo'xie'qian'jin'de'wu'er 不如作些浅近的物儿
'bu'ruo'lai'yue'tong'ying'chun'tao'qing 不若来约同迎春讨情
'bu'shang'ban'yue'de'guang'jing 不上半月的光景
'bu'shang'liang'ge'yue 不上两个月
'bu'shang'xin'du'shu 不上心读书
'bu'shang'yi'nian'dou'tian'quan'le 不上一年都添全了
'bu'shang'yi'yue'zhi'gong 不上一月之工
'bu'shi'bei'di'li'yao'she'gen 不是背地里咬舌根
'bu'shi'bu'ren'de 不是不认得
'bu'shi'da'yi'de'de 不是大意得的
'bu'shi'de'le'hao'chu'qu'ne 不是得了好处去呢
'bu'shi'duo'le'wei'ba'qu'de 不是剁了尾巴去的
'bu'shi'feng'jie'zhi'dao 不使凤姐知道
'bu'shi'ge'chang'fa 不是个常法
'bu'shi'gu'ren'de 不是古人的
'bu'shi'gui'jian'shang'fen'bie'de 不是贵贱上分别的
'bu'shi'ji'ge'zi 不识几个字
'bu'shi'jiao'da'yi'ge'ren 不是焦大一个人
'bu'shi'jie'ta'lao'ren'jia 不是接他老人家
'bu'shi'kong'zi'yi'xun 不是孔子遗训
'bu'shi'mai'ban'tuo'le'kong 不是买办脱了空
'bu'shi'mei'le'wo'jiu'cheng'bu'de'de 不是没了我就成不得的
'bu'shi'mei'mei'yao'kai'za'huo'pu'a 不是妹妹要开杂货铺啊
'bu'shi'na'xie'xiang'bing'zi 不是那些香饼子
'bu'shi'nu'cai'duo'hua 不是奴才多话
'bu'shi'pa'diu'le'ta 不是怕丢了他
'bu'shi'shen'me'da'bing 不是什么大病
'bu'shi'shen'me'da'shi 不是什么大事
'bu'shi'shen'me'han'shi 不是什么罕事
'bu'shi'shen'me'qi'gong 不是什么奇功
'bu'shi'shi'da'ni 不时时打你
'bu'shi'tai'ju'de'dong'xi 不识抬举的东西
'bu'shi'tai'tai'men'sheng'qi 不使太太们生气
'bu'shi'wei'pian'yi 不是为便宜
'bu'shi'wo'che'huang 不是我扯谎
'bu'shi'wo'lan'zhe 不是我拦着
'bu'shi'wo'sa'huang 不是我撒谎
'bu'shi'wo'shi'shui 不是我是谁
'bu'shi'wo'shuo'ju'hou'hui'de'hua 不是我说句后悔的话
'bu'shi'wo'shuo'mei'le'neng'nai'de'hua 不是我说没了能奈的话
'bu'shi'wo'wang'kou'zhou'ta 不是我妄口咒他
'bu'shi'wo'zhao'ji 不是我着急
'bu'shi'xiang'wo'de'dong'xi 不是想我的东西
'bu'shi'xiao'de'chi'le'jiu 不是小的吃了酒
'bu'shi'yin'ni'zai'na'li'nian'shu 不是因你在那里念书
'bu'shi'you'ni'ni'de 不是油腻腻的
'bu'shi'yuan'li'de'ren 不是园里的人
'bu'shi'zai'jia'mu'yang 不是在家模样
'bu'shi'zan'men'zhe'yang'ren'jia'de'shi 不是咱们这样人家的事
'bu'shi'zhe'ge'lan 不是这个拦
'bu'shi'zhe'ge'zuo'fa 不是这个作法
'bu'shi'zhe'yang'shuo 不是这样说
'bu'shi'zheng'yan'de'xia'zi'ba'le 不是睁眼的瞎子罢了
'bu'shi'zhi'ning'fu'zhong'lai'gou'da'er'jie 不时至宁府中来勾搭二姐
'bu'shi'zhong'le'shou 不是肿了手
'bu'shi'zhuan'de'ni'de 不是赚的你的
'bu'shou'jin'yin'zhi'xie 不受金银之谢
'bu'shou'you'gu'fu'le'gu'niang'de'xin 不收又辜负了姑娘的心
'bu'shuang'bu'cuo'de 不爽不错的
'bu'shuo'an'fen'shou'ji'de'ting'shi'qu 不说安分守己的挺尸去
'bu'shuo'bian'fa'er'ya'xi'le'cai'shi 不说变法儿压息了才是
'bu'shuo'gui'gui'ju'ju'zhan'zhu 不说规规矩矩站住
'bu'shuo'mei'ting'jian 不说没听见
'bu'shuo'ni'men'cu'xin 不说你们粗心
'bu'shuo'ni'wu'yi'wu'kao 不说你无依无靠
'bu'shuo'shuo'xiao'xiao 不说说笑笑
'bu'shuo'ta'zhu'zi'dai'wo'hao 不说他主子待我好
'bu'shuo'wei'zhe'ge 不说为这个
'bu'shuo'ya'tou'men'tai'xiao'xin'guo'yu 不说丫头们太小心过余
'bu'shuo'you'bu'shi 不说又不是
'bu'shuo'zan'men'bu'liu'xin 不说咱们不留心
'bu'shuo'zan'men'bu'shi'deng'zi 不说咱们不识戥子
'bu'shuo'zan'men'shi'wan'yi'er 不说咱们是玩意儿
'bu'si'bie'de'fen'qing'zhong'se'zhi 不似别的粉青重涩滞
'bu'si'bie'jia'ling'wai'yong'zhe'xie 不似别家另外用这些
'bu'si'dang'nian're'nao 不似当年热闹
'bu'si'fang'cai'na'bian'xuan'jun'zhuang'li 不似方才那边轩峻壮丽
'bu'si'wang'ri'he'ai'ke'qin 不似往日和蔼可亲
'bu'si'wang'ri'huan'tian'xi'di'de 不似往日欢天喜地的
'bu'si'wang'ri'yi'yang 不似往日一样
'bu'si'wo'men'du'fu'le'shu'de 不似我们读腐了书的
'bu'si'xian'shi'zhi'jian'pian'yi'de'zuo 不似先时只拣便宜的做
'bu'song'guo'ning'fu 补送过宁府
'bu'tiao'shu'zheng'de'de'le'qu 不挑庶正的得了去
'bu'ting'shen'zi'de'hua'le 不听婶子的话了
'bu'tong'ci'deng'de'le 不同此等的了
'bu'wang'le'su'ri'lao'tai'tai'teng'ta 不枉了素日老太太疼他
'bu'wang'nian'ri'zi'zai'yuan'zhong'xin'ku 不枉年日子在园中辛苦
'bu'wang'xu'sheng'yi'shi 不枉虚生一世
'bu'wei'lao'tai'tai'de'qian'qiu 不为老太太的千秋
'bu'wei'shi'ren'guan'yue'cheng'zan 不为世人观阅称赞
'bu'wen'ni'men'de'fei'yu'xing 不问你们的废与兴
'bu'wen'yong'zhou'qiao'qi'sheng 不闻永昼敲棋声
'bu'wu'ji'mo'zhi'gan 不无寂寞之感
'bu'xi'han'ta'de'xie'li 不希罕他的谢礼
'bu'xi'huan'bian'ke'yi'bu'li'ta 不喜欢便可以不理她
'bu'xi'ming'zhu'xi'bao'dao 不系明珠系宝刀
'bu'xia'bai'shi'yu'cheng 不下百十余乘
'bu'xian'gao'su'wo'men 不先告诉我们
'bu'xiang'ba'hua'lai'shuo'zao'ci'le 不想把话来说造次了
'bu'xiang'bei'yuan'yang'qiang'bai'yi'dun 不想被鸳鸯抢白一顿
'bu'xiang'chi'zui'le 不想吃醉了
'bu'xiang'chu'tou'de 不想出头的
'bu'xiang'dao'shi'da'ye'dao'zhe'li'lai 不想到是大爷到这里来
'bu'xiang'er'ye'fan'yi'nu'wei'na'deng'ji'du'zhi'fu 不想二爷反以奴为那等嫉妒之妇
'bu'xiang'er'ye'lai'le 不想二爷来了
'bu'xiang'fan'na'zhu'le'ta'wai'sun'nv'er 不想反拿住了她外孙女儿
'bu'xiang'feng'jie'jin'lai'le 不想凤姐进来了
'bu'xiang'ge'cha'wan 不像个茶碗
'bu'xiang'hou'lai'you'sheng'le'yi'wei'gong'zi 不想后来又生了一位公子
'bu'xiang'jia'fei'zhi'ming'yi'bian'yi'yong 不想贾妃只命一匾一咏
'bu'xiang'jin'ri'fan'bei'zhe'gui'nv'yi'xi'hua'shuo'zhu 不想今日反被这闺女一席话说住
'bu'xiang'jiu'hou'bie'ren'you'ke 不想酒后别人犹可
'bu'xiang'jiu'yu'jian'sao'zi'ye'cong'zhe'li'lai 不想就遇见嫂子也从这里来
'bu'xiang'liu'er'di'cong'na'bian'lai'le 不想柳二弟从那边来了
'bu'xiang'luo'hou'nao'chu'zhe'jian'shi'lai 不想落后闹出这件事来
'bu'xiang'ni'lai'le 不想你来了
'bu'xiang'pian'yu'jian'le'guai'zi'zhong'mai'ying'lian 不想偏遇见了拐子重卖英莲
'bu'xiang'ping'kong'li'sheng'chu'zhe'yi'jie'hua'lai 不想平空里生出这一节话来
'bu'xiang'qia'hao'ni'dao'lai'le 不想恰好你倒来了
'bu'xiang'ri'wei'luo'shi'tian'jiu'bian'le 不想日未落时天就变了
'bu'xiang'ru'jin'hou'bei'ren'kou'fan'sheng 不想如今后辈人口繁盛
'bu'xiang'ru'jin'hu'ran'lai'le'yi'ge'xue'bao'chai 不想如今忽然来了一个薛宝钗
'bu'xiang'shi'guai'zi'guai'lai'mai'de 不想是拐子拐来卖的
'bu'xiang'shou'bei'jia'ting'le'ci'xin 不想守备家听了此信
'bu'xiang'ta'duo'shi'cheng'cai 不像她多事逞才
'bu'xiang'tian'ke'lian 不想天可怜
'bu'xiang'wang'ri'gao'xing 不象往日高兴
'bu'xiang'wo'na'da'tai'tai'yi'wei'pa'lao'ye 不像我那大太太一味怕老爷
'bu'xiang'yi'hui'tou'jian'le'xiang'lian 不想一回头见了湘莲
'bu'xiang'yin'yue'le 不像吟月了
'bu'xiang'zhe'ri'san'yue'shi'wu 不想这日三月十五
'bu'xiang'zheng'yu'jian'ping'er 不想正遇见平儿
'bu'xiao'zhong'zhong'da'cheng'chi'ta 不肖种种大承笞挞
'bu'xin'zhai'yi'ge'gu'niang'chang'chang 不信摘一个姑娘尝尝
'bu'xu'bai'xing'dian'deng 不许百姓点灯
'bu'xu'duo'chi'jiu 不许多吃酒
'bu'xu'duo'dan'ge'le 不许多耽搁了
'bu'xu'fang'jin'qu 不许放进去
'bu'xu'gei'ta'qian 不许给他钱
'bu'xu'jia'rui'duo'zou'yi'bu 不许贾瑞多走一步
'bu'xu'jiao'ren'guan'zhe'wo 不许教人管着我
'bu'xu'ni'men'fan'le 不许你们翻了
'bu'xu'ni'men'li'wo 不许你们理我
'bu'xu'niu'le'ta 不许扭了他
'bu'xu'ren'kou'zhong'dai'chu 不许人口中带出
'bu'xu'ta'hu'nao 不许她胡闹
'bu'xu'ta'zai'bao'yu'fang'li'shui'jiao 不许她在宝玉房里睡觉
'bu'xu'wo'guan'hai'zi'bu'cheng 不许我管孩子不成
'bu'xu'wo'ye'guang'guang'me 不许我也逛逛么
'bu'xu'zai'chu'lai'le 不许再出来了
'bu'xu'zhao'ta'sheng'qi 不许招她生气
'bu'yan'bu'neng'cheng'qi 不严不能成器
'bu'yan'lao'ni'pei'zhe'feng'jie 不言老尼陪着凤姐
'bu'yao'ba'lao'lian'diu'le 不要把老脸丢了
'bu'yao'bie'yi'ge'gen'zhe 不要别一个跟着
'bu'yao'chao'nao'le 不要吵闹了
'bu'yao'cun'xin'pa'ren'bao'yuan 不要存心怕人抱怨
'bu'yao'le'bu'cheng 不要了不成
'bu'yao'li'na'chu'sheng 不要理那畜生
'bu'yao'pai'ta'chai'shi 不要派他差事
'bu'yao're'ni'er'ye'sheng'qi 不要惹你二爷生气
'bu'yao'shi'jing'da'guai 不要失惊打怪
'bu'yao'ti'qi'le 不要提起了
'bu'yao'wai'dao'cai'shi 不要外道才是
'bu'yao'wu'ta'de'shi 不要误她的事
'bu'yao'zhe'xie'zhong'kan'bu'zhong'chi'de 不要这些中看不中吃的
'bu'yi'bei'qin'ye'zhi'jue 不意被秦业知觉
'bu'yi'chu'xing 不宜出行
'bu'yi'ci'hai'yi 不以词害意
'bu'yi'gong'ming'wei'nian 不以功名为念
'bu'yi'pian'you'you'ji'ge'hua'zei 不意偏又有几个滑贼
'bu'yi'su'wu'wei'yao 不以俗务为要
'bu'yi'zei'zhong'po'you'gui'jue'zhi'shu 不意贼众颇有诡谲智术
'bu'yin'jun'qiao'nan'wei'you 不因俊俏难为友
'bu'yin'zhe'ze'bu'qu'qin'jin 不饮者则不去亲近
'bu'yong'chu'lai'ye'shi'de 不用出来也使得
'bu'yong'duo'zhe'le 不用躲着了
'bu'yong'fang'man'zi 不用放幔子
'bu'yong'fang'zai'wo'gen'qian 不用放在我跟前
'bu'yong'fei'shi'jiu'wan'le 不用费事就完了
'bu'yong'guo'lai'wen'hou'ma'le 不用过来问候妈了
'bu'yong'guo'wo'men'na'bian'qu 不用过我们那边去
'bu'yong'jie'jie'kai'kou 不用姐姐开口
'bu'yong'la'bie'ren 不用拉别人
'bu'yong'ni'fei'yi'dian'xin'de 不用你费一点心的
'bu'yong'ni'men'lao'niang'cao'yi'dian'er'xin 不用你们老娘操一点儿心
'bu'yong'ni'xie'xie'zhe'zhe'de 不用你蝎蝎螫螫的
'bu'yong'ren'dai'xin 不用人带信
'bu'yong'shi'fen'xiu'shi 不用十分修饰
'bu'yong'wo'men'shuo'hua 不用我们说话
'bu'yong'yi'nian'de'gong'fu 不用一年的工夫
'bu'yong'zai'chi'le 不用再吃了
'bu'yong'zhang'fang'qu'ling'qian 不用账房去领钱
'bu'yong'zhe'fang'er'hai'hao 不用这方儿还好
'bu'yong'zuo'liang'ci 不用做两次
'bu'you'de'di'tou'xi'xiang 不由得低头细想
'bu'you'de'man'yan'you'gun'xia'lei'lai 不由的满眼又滚下泪来
'bu'you'de'you'lao'niang'bu'ken 不由得尤老娘不肯
'bu'you'wo'bu'sheng'qi 不由我不生气

'chu'le'zhe'liang'san'gen'you'zhe'hua'de 除了这两三根有这话的
'chu'le'zhe'yuan'zi 出了这园子
'chu'le'zi'ji'liu'yong'zhi'wai 除了自己留用之外
'chu'li'wan'nian'ji'zui'chang 除李纨年纪最长
'chu'li'ying'can'wan'gu'xiu 樗栎应惭万古羞
'chu'ling'tai'jian'chuan'yu'wai'xiang 出令太监传与外厢
'chu'men'wu'suo'zhi 出门无所之
'chu'mo'hua'jian'xi 出没花间兮
'chu'pin'xuan'fei'pin'wai 除聘选妃嫔外
'chu'qi'bu'bei'zhi'miao'ce'ye 出其不备之妙策也
'chu'qu'chuan'qing'dai'fu 出去传请大夫
'chu'qu'da'yi'ge'bao'bu'ping'er 出去打一个报不平儿
'chu'qu'gei'ta'xiong'di'ban'su'zuo'ye 出去给她兄弟伴宿坐夜
'chu'qu'guan'shui'hua'xiao 除去关税花销
'chu'qu'le'leng'qing'qing'mei'you'ke'wan'de 出去了冷清清没有可玩的
'chu'qu'le'yi'ge'xiang'ling 出去了一个香菱
'chu'qu'qing'da'ge'ge'lai 出去请大哥哥来
'chu'qu'shuo'yu'lai'sheng 出去说与来升
'chu'qu'tan'sang'qu'le 出去探丧去了
'chu'qu'ze'shi'hou'yuan 出去则是后院
'chu'ru'de'ren'you'za 出入的人又杂
'chu'ru'sui'yi'de 出入随意的
'chu'san'ri'shi'jia'zhen 初三日是贾珍
'chu'si'shu'wai 除四书外
'chu'ta'men'dai'de'hua 除他们戴的花
'chu'tie'shen'zhang'guan'chai'chuan'guan'mu'liang'ge'ya'huan'wai 除贴身掌管钗钏盥沐两个丫鬟外
'chu'wai'tou'wo'zi'ji'dou'hui'tiao'ting'de 出外头我自己都会调停的
'chu'wu'ri'shi'lai'da 初五日是赖大
'chu'xi'jiao'men'jin'ru'feng'jie'yuan'zhong 出西角门进入凤姐院中
'chu'yao'shou'zhong'dou'shi'ma'bian'zi 锄药手中都是马鞭子
'chu'yi'ri'shi'jia'she'de'jia'yan 初一日是贾赦的家宴
'chu'you'lao'niang'dai'ling'er'jie 除尤老娘带领二姐
'chu'yun'chou'zhi'jie'zhe 处运筹之界者
'chu'zai'huang'hai'tie'wang'shan'shang 出在潢海铁网山上
'chu'zan'men'zhe'yang'yi'er'jia'zhi'wai 除咱们这样一二家之外
'chu'zhe'ge'zai'mei'you'le 除这个再没有了
'chu'zhi'yue'tai'shang 出至月台上
'chuai'mo'ci'wu'cong'he'er'zhi 揣摩此物从何而至
'chuan'de'tai'bu'qi'tou'lai 喘得抬不起头来
'chuan'guo'le'chuan'tang 穿过了穿堂
'chuan'guo'yi'ceng'zhu'li'hua'zhang'bian'jiu'de'yue'dong'men 穿过一层竹篱花障编就的月洞门
'chuan'guo'yi'ge'dong'xi'de'chuan'tang 穿过一个东西的穿堂
'chuan'hua'gu'lan'xuan 传花鼓滥喧
'chuan'ji'ge'tuo'dang'ren'lai'tai'qu 传几个妥当人来抬去
'chuan'le'yi'ban'zai'na'bian'ting'shang 传了一班在那边厅上
'chuan'lian'ai'ding'xiang 穿帘碍鼎香
'chuan'lian'bu'du'han'zhen 穿帘不度寒砧
'chuan'na'yi'tao'zhan'de'ba 穿那一套毡的罢
'chuan'qi'jia'ren'xi'fu'jin'lai'ting'chai'deng'yu 传齐家人媳妇进来听差等语
'chuan'qi'le'ci'hou'zhe 传齐了伺候着
'chuan'ru'yi'tiao'jia'dao 穿入一条夹道
'chuan'shang'yi'xi'ge'zhong'jing'zhi'pen'jing'zhu'deng 船上亦系各种精致盆景诸灯
'chuan'yi'ge'dai'fu 传一个大夫
'chuan'yi'jian'er'se'jin'bai'die'chuan'hua'da'hong'jian'xiu 穿一件二色金百蝶穿花大红箭袖
'chuan'zhe'yang'dan'bo 穿这样单薄
'chuan'zhong'you'yi'nv'zi'yan'mian'qi'ti'zhi'zhuang 船中有一女子掩面泣涕之状
'chuan'zhu'bai'mang'jian'xiu 穿著白蟒箭袖
'chuan'zhu'jiang'ya'hai'shui'wu'zhao'zuo'long'bai'mang'pao 穿著江牙海水五爪坐龙白蟒袍
'chuan'zhu'sa'hua'jin'shen'er 穿著撒花紧身儿
'chuan'zhu'tao'hong'sa'hua'ao 穿著桃红撒花袄
'chuang'deng'yan'yi'hun 窗灯焰已昏
'chuang'di'xia'dui'zhe'na'me'xie 床底下堆着那么些
'chuang'wai'ting'le'yi'ting 窗外听了一听
'chuang'wai'zhong'ren'ting'shuo 窗外众人听说
'chui'chu'di'sheng'lai 吹出笛声来
'chui'cuan'yin'shi'yi'bian 炊爨饮食亦便
'chui'dao'jiu'jiu'er'duo'li 吹到舅舅耳朵里
'chui'dao'le'xing'lin'de 吹倒了姓林的
'chui'gu'jin'wei'you'zhi'kuang'en 垂古今未有之旷恩
'chui'hua'le'xing'xue'de 吹化了姓薛的
'chui'san'ji'he'hong'yu'ying 吹散芰荷红玉影
'chui'tou'xiang'le'yi'xiang 垂头想了一想
'chui'tou'zhan'zai'pang'bian 垂头站在旁边
'chun'bu'dian'er'hong 唇不点而红
'chun'han'yu'xing'yi'shan'zhen 春酣欲醒移珊枕
'chun'hen'qiu'bei'jie'zi're 春恨秋悲皆自惹
'chun'meng'sui'yun'san 春梦随云散
'chun'qiu'jian'qi'shi'shi 春秋荐其时食
'chun'rong'qiu'xie'hua'zhe'mo 春荣秋谢花折磨
'chun'tian'fan'you'can'ji'de'ren'dou'fan'bing 春天凡有残疾的人都犯病
'chun'tian'jiu'zhi'dao'le 春天就知道了
'chun'tian'zai'yu'ta'men'shou'shi'fang'wu 春天再与他们收拾房屋
'chun'xi'shang'mei'shao 春喜上眉梢
'chun'yan'bian'he'ta'ma'yi'jing'dao'ying'er'qian 春燕便和她妈一径到莺儿前
'chun'yan'bian'xiang'ou'guan'dao 春燕便向藕官道
'chun'yan'bian'xiang'ta'niang'shuo 春燕便向她娘说
'chun'yan'bian'yi'ba'bao'zhu'xi'ren'shuo 春燕便一把抱住袭人说
'chun'yan'da'ying'le 春燕答应了
'chun'yan'deng'mang'rang'zuo 春燕等忙让坐
'chun'yan'fang'qiao'qiao'de'shuo'yu'ta'rui'guan'zhi'shi 春燕方悄悄的说与她蕊官之事
'chun'yan'hui'tou'kan'jian 春燕回头看见
'chun'yan'na'li'ken'hui'lai 春燕哪里肯回来
'chun'yan'yin'xiang'ta'niang'dao 春燕因向她娘道
'chun'yan'you'yi'hang'ku 春燕又一行哭
'chun'yan'zhi'de'jie'le 春燕只得接了
'chun'zhan'ying'ke'xi 唇绽樱颗兮
'chun'zhuang'er'nv'jing'she'hua 春妆儿女竞奢华
'ci'bi'shi'chang'pian'ge'xing 此必是长篇歌行
'ci'bing'shi'you'lv'shang'pi 此病是忧虑伤脾
'ci'bu'de'huan'er 此不得环儿
'ci'cha'chu'zai'fang'chun'shan'qian'xiang'dong 此茶出在放春山遣香洞
'ci'chu'bing'mei'you'shen'me 此处并没有什么
'ci'chu'de'bian'gai'ti'si'ge'zi 此处的匾该题四个字
'ci'chu'dou'miao'ji 此处都妙极
'ci'chu'gu'ren'yi'dao'jin'yi 此处古人已道尽矣
'ci'chu'jing'hai'bu'ke'yang'bie'de'que'niao 此处竟还不可养别的雀鸟
'ci'chu'ruo'xuan'bian'dai'ti 此处若悬匾待题
'ci'chu'shu'yi'he'wen 此处书以何文
'ci'chu'ti'yi'he'ming'fang'miao 此处题以何名方妙
'ci'chu'zhe'suo'fang'zi 此处这所房子
'ci'chu'zhi'yi'tian'zhuang 此处置一田庄
'ci'da'yi'jin'wei'zhi 辞达意尽为止
'ci'dian'he'wu'bian'e 此殿何无匾额
'ci'er'xiang'you'he'chu'chu 此二项有何出处
'ci'fang'ren'jia'duo'yong'zhu'li'mu'bi'zhe 此方人家多用竹篱木壁者
'ci'hou'ai'bu'zhu 次后捱不住
'ci'hou'chu'men'qu'hou 伺候出门去后
'ci'hou'de'ya'huan'yin'dao'cha'qu 伺候的丫鬟因倒茶去
'ci'hou'fang'ming'zhou'rui'jia'de'hui'qu'dao'xie 次后方命周瑞家的回去道谢
'ci'hou'feng'jie'er'bu'shi'qin'zi'lai'kan'qin'shi 此后凤姐儿不时亲自来看秦氏
'ci'hou'guo'zao'fan 伺候过早饭
'ci'hou'xiang'qi'zhong'ren'jie'you'qin'juan 次后想起众人皆有亲眷
'ci'hou'xing'fu'ren 次后邢夫人
'ci'hou'yan'le'zong'ci 伺候掩了宗祠
'ci'hou'zuo'le'da'jiao 次后坐了大轿
'ci'hua'ye'xu'de'zhe'yang'yi'ge'ren'qu'si'zhang 此花也须得这样一个人去司掌
'ci'hua'zheng'zhong'bao'yu'xin'huai 此话正中宝玉心怀
'ci'hui'ze'zan'bu'neng'xie'yi 此回则暂不能写矣
'ci'huo'yong'tan'yi'ren 此或咏叹一人
'ci'ji'leng'zi'xing'suo'yun'zhi'shi'tai'jun'ye 此即冷子兴所云之史太君也
'ci'ji'mi'jin'ye 此即迷津也
'ci'jian'tan'zhi'xing'nong 次渐谈至兴浓
'ci'jie'guo'fen'zhi'ji 此皆过分之极

'ci'jie'shi'fei'yan'chou'zhi'yu'ye 此皆饰非掩丑之语也

'ci'jie'yi'di'ze'tong'zhi'ren'ye 此皆易地则同之人也
'ci'jiu'nai'yi'bai'hua'zhi'rui 此酒乃以百花之蕊

'ci'ke'bu'gan'ba'ni'zen'me'yang 此刻不敢把你怎么样

'ci'ke'ye'bu'gan'shuo 此刻也不敢说
'ci'ke'ye'bu'zhi'zai'yan'qian 此刻也不知在眼前

'ci'lai'hou'bu'jing'que 此来后补京缺
'ci'lao'ai'you'zhi'en 慈老爱幼之恩
'ci'li'wu'jing'bu'yuan 此离吾境不远
'ci'ming'ke'bao'yi 此命可保矣
'ci'nai'qin'fang'quan'zhi'zheng'yuan 此乃沁芳泉之正源
'ci'nai'xuan'ji'bu'ke'yu'xie'zhe 此乃玄机不可预泄者
'ci'nian'zheng'yue'shi'wu'shang'yuan'zhi'ri 次年正月十五上元之日
'ci'qing'da'you'yi'qu 此卿大有意趣
'ci'qiu'lian'fu'shu 赐裘怜抚戍
'ci'qu'bu'bi'chen'shi'zhong'suo'tian'chuan'qi'zhi'qu 此曲不比尘世中所填传奇之曲
'ci'qu'guan'bi'ta'men'tou'de'hai'qiao'ne 此去管比它们偷得还巧呢
'ci'ren'ming'huan'sun'shao'zu 此人名唤孙绍祖
'ci'ri'bian'bu'hui'ren 次日便不会人

'ci'ri'lian'mang'qu'lu'hui'jia 次日连忙取路回家

'ci'ri'qian'ren'bei'che'jiao'qu'jie'deng'hou'hua 次日遣人备车轿去接等后话

'ci'ri'yi'gai'dou'juan'le 次日一概都蠲了
'ci'ri'yi'qin'shang'you'xiang 此日衣衾尚有香

'ci'shi'bao'yu'sui'xing 此时宝玉虽醒

'ci'shi'tan'chun'yin'pan'xi'zuo'zai'ai'ban'ta'shang 此时探春因盘膝坐在矮板榻上

'ci'shi'wen'wu'jie'chui'shou 此时文武皆垂首
'ci'shi'xi'nan'quan'ji 此时悉难全记
'ci'shi'xi'yi'san'chu 此时戏已散出
'ci'shi'xia'shu 次是下书
'ci'shi'xian'qu'le 此时先去了
'ci'shi'xiang'ye'kuai'tian'ming'le 此时想也快天明了

'ci'shi'yi'bu'mian'wu'yan'dui'qi 此时亦不免无言对泣
'ci'shi'yi'cai'jin'lai 此时亦才进来
'ci'shi'yi'jian'shi 此是一件事
'ci'shi'yi'jing'dian'deng 此时已经点灯
'ci'shi'you'shi'jia'zhen'zuo'zhu'ti'pin 此时又是贾珍作主替聘
'ci'shi'yuan'nei'wu'ren'lai'wang 此时园内无人来往

'ci'shi'zi'ji'hui'xiang'dang'chu'zai'da'huang'shan'zhong 此时自己回想当初在大荒山中
'ci'shi'zong'bu'guo'wei'de'shi'zi'si'jian'nan'qi'jian 此时总不过为的是子嗣艰难起见
'ci'shu'chu'bu'neng'you'le 此数处不能游了
'ci'ta'men'zuo'shen'me 辞她们作什么
'ci'wei'qun'fang'zhi'guan 此为群芳之冠
'ci'wu'jian'shi'shi'ning'guo'fu'zhong'feng'su 此五件实是宁国府中风俗
'ci'wu'kong'fei'chang'ren'ke'xiang'zhe 此物恐非常人可享者
'ci'xi'bao'yu'bian'bu'ming'qing'wen'nuo'chu'nuan'ge'lai 此夕宝玉便不命晴雯挪出暖阁来
'ci'xi'shen'qian'shen'hou'shi 此系身前身后事

'ci'xue'pan'ji'jia'fu'zhi'qin 此薛蟠即贾府之亲
'ci'yi'bian'yi'lian'shu'yu'zheng'dian 此一匾一联书于正殿
'ci'yi'er'ri'jian'wu'hua 此一二日间无话
'ci'yi'guan'ren'zhi'qi'shu'er'you 此亦关人之气数而有
'ci'yi'jing'ji'si'dong 此亦静极思动
'ci'yi'ma'ai'yu'wei'chi'pin 慈姨妈爱语慰痴颦
'ci'yi'tan'mi'zhi'zheng 此亦痰迷之症
'ci'yi'xi'li'shu'ying'ran 此亦系理数应然
'ci'yu'bao'yu'bing'jia'lan 赐与宝玉并贾兰
'ci'zao'jia'lian'qi'lai 次早贾琏起来
'ci'zao'shu'xi'le'jiu'yao'gao'ci 次早梳洗了就要告辞
'ci'zao'yi'chu'yi'wai 此造已出意外
'ci'ze'fu'yao'tiao'yang 次则服药调养
'ci'ze'lan'qu'cai'huo'wei'zi'de 次则婪取财货为自得
'cong'bo'li'chuang'nei'wang'wai'yi'kan 从玻璃窗内往外一看
'cong'bu'ba'zhe'yi'jian'shi'fang'zai'xin'shang 从不把这一件事放在心上
'cong'bu'da'shang'jing 从不大上京
'cong'bu'gan'duo'zou'yi'bu 从不敢多走一步
'cong'bu'jian'yi'dian'er'xiao 从不见一点儿效
'cong'ci'bu'neng'xiang'jian 从此不能相见
'cong'ci'dao'yao'yuan'bi'ta'xie'cai'hao 从此倒要远避他些才好

'er'zhe'zhe'dong'xi'ye'bu'shi'chang'dai'zhao'de 二者这东西也不是常带着的
'er'zi'bing'wu'chu'chu 二字并无出处

'er'zi'jing'bu'neng'gan'zhe'da'shi 儿子竟不能干这大事

'gu'niang'zhan'le'ban'tian'fa'le 姑娘站了半天乏了
'gu'niang'zhe'liang'tian'hao 姑娘这两天好
'gu'niang'zhei'li'shuo'hua 姑娘这里说话
'gu'niang'zhi'dao'er'nai'nai'ben'lai'shi'duo 姑娘知道二奶奶本来事多
'gu'niang'zhi'dao'le 姑娘知道了
'gu'niang'zhi'guan'liu'xia'ba 姑娘只管留下罢
'gu'niang'zi'qu'gui'gan 姑娘自去贵干
'gu'niang'zuo'le'yi'tiao 姑娘做了一条
'gu'niang'zuo'ri'shou'le'qu'le 姑娘昨日受了屈了
'gu'niang'zuo'shen'me 姑娘作什么
'gu'nu'jia'qin'zi'bai'jian'guo 故奴家亲自拜见过
'gu'qi'ge'shi'pei'se'jie'cong'ya 故其格式配色皆从雅
'gu'qi'jia'gui'lian 故乞假归殓
'gu'qi'qi'yi'bi'fu'ren 故其气亦必赋人
'gu'qi'sun'shi'guang'zhu'shou'xiao'bu'ceng'lai'de 故其孙石光珠守孝不曾来得
'gu'qi'zou'tai'shang'huang 故启奏太上皇
'gu'qian'nv'ren'lai'tao'qing'fen 故遣女人来讨情分
'gu'qian'ren'lai'gao'su'zhe'bian 故遣人来告诉这边
'gu'qing'wen'bu'gan'chu'tou 故晴雯不敢出头
'gu'qing'xin'tu'dan 故倾心吐胆
'gu'ran'ru'ci'shuo 固然如此说
'gu'ran'shi'ji'hao'de 固然是极好的
'gu'ran'shi'shang'hao'de 固然是上好的
'gu'ran'shi'tuo'lan'lai'hun 固然是托懒来混
'gu'ran'xi'ren'li'chuan'zao 固然系人力穿凿
'gu'ren'ceng'ye'shuo'de 古人曾也说的
'gu'ren'le'liang'ri 故忍了两日
'gu'ren'shuo'de'hao 古人说得好
'gu'ren'xi'bie'lian'peng'you 古人惜别怜朋友
'gu'ren'yi'xing'mo'lu 古人异姓陌路
'gu'ren'zhong'yong'zhe'tai'duo 古人中用者太多
'gu'ren'zhong'zi'han 古人中自汉
'gu'ri'jian'bu'da'de'xian 故日间不大得闲
'gu'rong'fu'jin'sui'yuan'xiao'yi'wu'deng'mi'zhi'ji 故荣府今岁元宵亦无灯谜之集
'gu'ru'jin'yao'song'ta'dao'na'li'qu'ying'ming'er 故如今要送她到那里去应名儿
'gu'shang'gu'zhi'feng'yi'xi'jie'jin 故尚古之风一洗皆尽
'gu'shang'wei'ji'ci 故尚未及此
'gu'shang'yi'liang'che'la'jin'qu 雇上一辆车拉进去
'gu'she'chu'zhe'huang'hua'lai'wen'ni 故设出这谎话来问你
'gu'she'le'ming'qu'gao'zan'men 故舍了命去告咱们
'gu'sheng'li'shi'shi 故生李氏时
'gu'shi'cong'lai'wei'you'de 古时从来未有的
'gu'shi'fen'sheng'li 故十分省力
'gu'shi'yin'chang'yu'ta'jiao'jie 故士隐常与他交接
'gu'shu'yuan'qi'lai 故疏远起来
'gu'shun'lu'xian'dao'zhe'liang'chu 故顺路先到这两处
'gu'sui'xi'xiao'yue 故虽系小月
'gu'ta'jin'ri'qing'lai'zuo'pei 故他今日请来坐陪
'gu'ta'shi'qi'ru'mu 故他视妻如母
'gu'te'ju'xiao'zhuo 故特具小酌
'gu'tong'lu'zuo'ban'er'lai 故同路作伴而来
'gu'wei'gan'qing'ju'wang'dong 故未敢轻举妄动
'gu'wei'zhi'zi'sun'sui'duo 故遗之子孙虽多
'gu'wen'wo'you'ye'wu 故问我有也无
'gu'wo'deng'jiu'dai 故我等久待
'gu'xia'mian'fang'shi'xing'fu'ren 故下面方是邢夫人
'gu'xian'jiu'si'le'ban'bian 故先就死了半边
'gu'xian'yong'pian'ci 故先用骗词

'gu'xiang'wu'yi'pei'cai 故相物以配才
'gu'xin'zhong'zhi'yao'mai'zhuan'ta'men 故心中只要买转他们

'gu'yan'qi'e'yue 故颜其额曰
'gu'yan'wei'ao'ju'mo'duo 古砚微凹聚墨多
'gu'ye'bu'ken'dai'man 故也不肯怠慢
'gu'ye'wan'yi'ying'cha'shui 故夜晚一应茶水
'gu'ye'zai'qi'zhong 故也在其中
'gu'yi'cang'duo'kong'he'zhe'shua 故意藏躲恐吓着耍
'gu'yi'de'biao'bai'biao'bai 故意的表白表白
'gu'yi'de'hai'shuo 故意的还说
'gu'yi'de'yao'xue'na'xiao'jia'zi'cou'fen'zi 故意的要学那小家子凑份子
'gu'yi'lai'ci'wo'de'yan 故意来刺我的眼
'gu'yi'nao'de'zhong'ren'jie'zhi'bao'yu'xia'zhe'le 故意闹的众人皆知宝玉吓着了
'gu'yi'pan'che'xiao'de'zai'nei 故意攀扯小的在内
'gu'yi're'ren'xiao 故意惹人笑
'gu'yi'ri'bu'le 故一日不乐

'gu'yin'bi'zai'zhi'ci'chu 故引彼再至此处
'gu'you'huo'cheng'wei 故又或称为
'gu'you'jiang'ta'gu'jiu'ge'ge'shou'mai'jin'lai 故又将她姑舅哥哥收买进来
'gu'you'jiang'ta'liu'xia 故又将他留下
'gu'you'jiao'wu'tang'bu'ke 固有蕉无棠不可
'gu'you'qiu'le'lai'jia'de'shou'mai'jin'lai'chi'gong'shi 故又求了赖家的收买进来吃工食
'gu'you'shi'fang'qian'zhi'chuang'wai'tou'kan 故尤氏方潜至窗外偷看
'gu'you'shi'huo'zuo'yang'kuang'zhi'tai 故有时或作佯狂之态
'gu'you'yong'zhe'xie'dui'qi'huo'lai'tang'se 故又用这些堆砌货来搪塞
'gu'you'yue'ta'dao 故又约他道
'gu'yu'qian'ri'yi'bing'shi 故于前日一病时
'gu'zhe'qian'tou'yong'fan 估着前头用饭
'gu'zhe'you'hao'shi 估着有好事
'gu'zhe'zhe'shi'tuo'bu'qu'de 估着这事脱不去的

'gu'zhi'you'liang'ge'lao'po'zi'shang'ye 故只有两个老婆子上夜

'gu'zi'song'le'gong'jian'er 姑子送了供尖儿

'gua'feng'xia'xue'dao'pian'yi 刮风下雪倒便宜

'guai'bu'de'bu'zhi'wo'men'li'tou'de'gui'ju 怪不得不知我们里头的规矩

'guai'bu'de'ren'shuo'ni'shi 怪不得人说你是
'guai'dao'chuan'shang'bu'xiang'na'ci'wei'shi'de 怪道穿上不像那刺猬似的
'guai'dao'gu'ren'shi'shang'shuo 怪道古人诗上说

'guai'dao'lao'tai'tai'chang'zhu'fu'shuo 怪道老太太常嘱咐说
'guai'dao'ni'men'chuan'tong'yi'qi'lai'suan'ji'wo 怪道你们串通一气来算计我
'guai'dao'ni'zhe'sao'zi'bu'zhi'gui'ju 怪道你这嫂子不知规矩
'guai'dao'ren'ren'dou'shuo'zhe'si'ya'tou'nian'qing'hu'tu 怪道人人都说这四丫头年轻胡涂
'guai'dao'ren'shuo're'shen'zi'bu'ke'bei'feng'chui 怪道人说热身子不可被风吹
'guai'dao'ren'zan'ni'de'shou'qiao 怪道人赞你的手巧
'guai'dao'shao'le'liang'ge'ren 怪道少了两个人
'guai'dao'su'yu'shuo'de 怪道俗语说的
'guai'dao'ta'chu'zhe'ge'ling 怪道她出这个令

'guai'dao'wo'men'jia'miao'shuo'shi 怪道我们家庙说是
'guai'dao'ya'tou'shuo'bu'zhi'zai'na'li 怪道丫头说不知在哪里

'guai'dao'zhe'me'hao'kan 怪道这么好看

'guai'dao'zuo'ri'wan'shang'deng'hua'bao'le'you'bao 怪道昨日晚上灯花爆了又爆
'guai'guai'de'ti'ni'xi'fu'pei'ge'bu'shi 乖乖的替你媳妇赔个不是
'guai'guai'er'de'zai'wo'shou'li'he'yi'kou 乖乖儿的在我手里喝一口

'guai'zhen'yu'ta'kao'zhe 拐枕与他靠着
'guai'zhi'ren'yuan'xi'mou'xiang'mou'xing'ren'shi 拐之人原系某乡某姓人氏
'guai'zi'bu'zai'jia 拐子不在家

'guo'er'san'nian'zai'qu'le'qin 过二三年再娶了亲
'guo'ge'yi'nian'ban'zai 过个一年半载
'guo'hou'da'fa'ta'jiu'wan'le 过后打发她就完了
'guo'hou'er'you'shuo 过后儿又说
'guo'hou'zai'xie'zhe 过后再歇着
'guo'hui'zi'wo'kai'le'lou'fang 过会子我开了楼房
'guo'jia'mu'zhe'bian'shui'le'yi'ye 过贾母这边睡了一夜
'guo'jian'bao'yu'chu'lai'le 果见宝玉出来了
'guo'jian'da'jie'er'an'wen'shui'le 果见大姐儿安稳睡了
'guo'jian'fang'guan'mian'xiang'li'shui'zai'chuang'shang 果见芳官面向里睡在床上

'guo'jian'pang'bian'you'yi'wang'ji'yu 果见旁边有一汪积雨

'guo'jian'zhong'ren'dou'zai'na'li 果见众人都在那里
'guo'jie'shi'tong'xian 过洁世同嫌
'guo'jiu'lao'ye'da'xi 国舅老爷大喜

'guo'lai'you'qian'en'wan'xie'de'ci'le'feng'jie'er 过来又千恩万谢的辞了凤姐儿
'guo'lai'zuo'shen'me 过来做什么
'guo'le'mei'ban'yue 过了没半月
'guo'le'ou'xiang'xie 过了藕香榭

'guo'liang'ri'wo'bu'gao'su'jia'li 过两日我不告诉家里
'guo'mi'qian'song'ma'song'qu 果密遣宋妈送去
'guo'na'bian'da'men'kou'deng'zhe'qu'le 过那边大门口等着去了
'guo'na'le'ban'jie'lai 果拿了半节来
'guo'pin'bing'kao'shang'de'jiu'shi'lai 果品并犒赏的酒食来
'guo'pin'deng'lei'dou'jiao'ban'xia'qu 果品等类都叫搬下去
'guo'pin'you'wu'zhong 果品有五种
'guo'qu'he'can'xing'shang'yi'shuo'ming 过去和参行商议说明
'guo'ran'an'shu'yi'dian 果然按数一点
'guo'ran'bao'chai'shuo 果然宝钗说
'guo'ran'bei'le'liang'pi'ma'zai'yuan'hou'men'deng'zhe 果然备了两匹马在园后门等着
'guo'ran'bi'xian'de'dai'xie'hong'se 果然比先的带些红色
'guo'ran'bu'luo'fu'li'su'tao 果然不落富丽俗套
'guo'ran'chu'qu'dai'jin'yi'ge'xiao'hou'sheng'lai 果然出去带进一个小后生来
'guo'ran'cong'hou'men'chu'qu 果然从后门出去
'guo'ran'ding'xia'le'ta 果然定下了她
'guo'ran'dou'san'le 果然都散了
'guo'ran'fan'de'hao'qi'li 果然翻得好气力
'guo'ran'feng'jin'li'da 果然风紧力大
'guo'ran'gai'de'hao 果然改得好
'guo'ran'hao'yan'li 果然好眼力
'guo'ran'hao'yue'se 果然好月色
'guo'ran'hei'di'li'mo'ru'rong'fu 果然黑地里摸入荣府
'guo'ran'hua'bu'xu'chuan 果然话不虚传
'guo'ran'jia'rong'fu'jin'cheng'lai'jian'ta'lao'niang 果然贾蓉复进城来见他老娘
'guo'ran'jia'zhen'zhu'le'yi'kou'zhu 果然贾珍煮了一口猪
'guo'ran'jia'zheng'zai'na'li'chi'cha 果然贾政在那里吃茶
'guo'ran'jiang'ta'san'ren'dai'lai 果然将她三人带来
'guo'ran'jin'ri'zhen'chao'le 果然今日真抄了
'guo'ran'jin'yi'le 果然进益了
'guo'ran'jiu'chao'qi'lai 果然就吵起来
'guo'ran'ke'ting'me 果然可听么
'guo'ran'liu'xia'hao'de 果然留下好的
'guo'ran'mei'you'shen'me 果然没有什么
'guo'ran'na'gu'zi'shou'shi'le'yi'zhuo'su'cai 果然那姑子收拾了一桌素菜
'guo'ran'na'le'si'bai'liang'yin'zi'lai 果然拿了四百两银子来
'guo'ran'na'le'yi'ge'jin'he'zi'lai 果然拿了一个锦盒子来

'guo'ran'ying'zai'ta'shen'shang 果然应在她身上

'hou'mian'bian'shi'yi'suo'gu'miao 后面便是一所古庙
'hou'mian'de'po'zi'men'yi'dou'xia'le'jiao 后面的婆子们已都下了轿
'hou'mian'hai'you'ji'hang'xiao'zi 后面还有几行小字
'hou'mian'hu'jian'hua'zhe'ge'e'lang 后面忽见画着个恶狼
'hou'mian'la'zhe'bao'yu'de'ma 后面拉着宝玉的马

'hou'mian'you'you'yi'shou'ji'yun 后面又有一首偈云
'hou'mian'you'you'zhi'shi 后面又有枳实
'hou'nian'cai'jin'lai 后年才进来
'hou'ren'ceng'you'shi'chao'yun 后人曾有诗嘲云
'hou'ren'you'xi'jiang'yue'er'ci 后人有西江月二词
'hou'ri'de'liu'shi 后日的六十
'hou'ri'shi'tai'ye'de'shou'ri 后日是太爷的寿日
'hou'ri'wo'shi'zai'bu'gan'qu'de'le 后日我是再不敢去的了

'ji'ru'xi'xiang'ji'de'ting'qin 即如西厢记的听琴
'ji'shang'fang'zhe'cha'diao 几上放着茶吊
'ji'shang'lai'dang'zhe'wo'bai'le'shi'fu'qu'ba 即上来当着我拜了师父去罢
'ji'shang'liang'ge'ren'de'ming'zi 记上两个人的名字
'ji'shang'ming'wan'ping'hua'ju'bei 几上茗碗瓶花俱备
'ji'shang'ming'zi'le 记上名字了
'ji'shang'she'lu'ping'san'shi 几上设炉瓶三事
'ji'she'bu'de'ta 既舍不得她
'ji'shi'de'le'xin'gan'dao'de 几时得了信赶到的
'ji'shi'er'fang'yi'chang 既是二房一场
'ji'shi'ge'tao'qi'bu'pa'ren'de 极是个淘气不怕人的
'ji'shi'hou'ri'cai'yong 既是后日才用
'ji'shi'jiao'ta'si'zai'wo'de'shou'li 几时叫他死在我的手里
'ji'shi'lao'tai'tai'gao'xing 既是老太太高兴
'ji'shi'lao'tai'tai'gei'bao'yu'de 既是老太太给宝玉的
'ji'shi'ling'zhang'zi'xi'guan'wai 即时令长子袭官外
'ji'shi'ni'ma'shi'le'ni'qu 既是你妈使了你去
'ji'shi'ni'mei'zi'cong'xiao'ceng'yu'ren'zhi'fu'wei'hun 既是你妹子从小曾与人指腹为婚
'ji'shi'ni'shen'zhi 既是你深知
'ji'shi'nv'hai'zi'de'dong'xi'quan'zai'zhe'li 既是女孩子的东西全在这里
'ji'shi'yi'jia'zi 既是一家子
'ji'shi'zan'men'de'hai'zi'yao'juan 既是咱们的孩子要蠲
'ji'shi'zhi'ji'zhi'jian 既是知己之间
'ji'shou'shi'wan'bei 及收拾完备
'ji'shuai'ling'jia'ren'qu'le 即率领家人去了
'ji'shuo'le'ban'tian'hua 及说了半天话
'ji'shuo'le'chu'lai 及说了出来
'ji'shuo'shi'shi'huan'shu'xiang'da'jia'xiao'jie 既说是世宦书香大家小姐
'ji'si'you'ke'yong'ji 祭祀又可永继
'ji'sou'zhong'dai'xue 即嗽中带血
'ji'ting'jian'ni'zai'wai'tou 既听见你在外头
'ji'tong'bao'yu'guo'hui'fang'yuan'lai'le 即同宝玉过会芳园来了
'ji'tong'jia'li'yi'yang 即同家里一样
'ji'tui'fang'men'jin'lai'kan'shi 急推房门进来看时
'ji'tun'you'chen'yu'bu'jin 既忳幽沉于不尽
'ji'wei'rui'er'cheng'tan'ji'xi 籍葳蕤而成坛畸兮
'ji'wen'hui'guan'bei'xian 及闻槥棺被燹
'ji'xi'qin'gu'niang'dai'lai'de 既系琴姑娘带来的
'ji'xi'xi'cha'shi 既细细查试
'ji'xia'le'qing'tie 急下了请帖
'ji'xian'wei'er'ruo'tong 既显微而若通
'ji'xing'hui'song'lv'li'zhi'li'bu 即行汇送履历至礼部
'ji'yan'feng'die'man'yi'cai 寄言蜂蝶漫疑猜

'jia'zhen'hai'xiao'shuo 贾珍还笑说
'jia'zhen'hen'bu'neng'dai'qin'shi'zhi'si 贾珍恨不能代秦氏之死
'jia'zhen'hui'qu'zhi'hou 贾珍回去之后
'jia'zhen'ji'ming'qian'mian'zhu'zha 贾珍急命前面驻扎
'jia'zhen'jia'rong'ci'shi'wei'li'fa'suo'ju 贾珍贾蓉此时为礼法所拘
'jia'zhen'jia'xia'ren'shao 贾珍家下人少
'jia'zhen'jian'feng'jie'yun'le 贾珍见凤姐允了
'jia'zhen'jian'fu'qin'bu'guan 贾珍见父亲不管
'jia'zhen'jian'ta'jiu'hou'dao'dao 贾珍见他酒后叨叨
'jia'zhen'jiao'ta'guo'lai 贾珍叫他过来
'jia'zhen'jiu'yi'ba'fen 贾珍酒已八分
'jia'zhen'jiu'yi'xing'le'yi'ban 贾珍酒已醒了一半
'jia'zhen'kan'zhe'shou'shi'wan'bei'gong'qi 贾珍看着收拾完备供器
'jia'zhen'ku'de'lei'ren'yi'ban 贾珍哭得泪人一般
'jia'zhen'leng'xiao'dao 贾珍冷笑道
'jia'zhen'lian'mang'chu'qu'le 贾珍连忙出去了
'jia'zhen'mang'da'ying 贾珍忙答应
'jia'zhen'mang'da'ying'ji'ge 贾珍忙答应几个
'jia'zhen'mang'da'ying'le 贾珍忙答应了
'jia'zhen'mang'jie'zhe 贾珍忙接着
'jia'zhen'mang'li'sheng'chi'zha 贾珍忙厉声叱咤
'jia'zhen'mang'qi'shen'xiao'dao 贾珍忙起身笑道
'jia'zhen'mang'shuo'le'ji'sheng 贾珍忙说了几声
'jia'zhen'mang'xiao'dao 贾珍忙笑道
'jia'zhen'ming'jia'rong'ci'ri'huan'le'ji'fu 贾珍命贾蓉次日换了吉服
'jia'zhen'ming'ren'la'ta'qi'lai 贾珍命人拉他起来
'jia'zhen'ming'ta'hao'sheng'shou'xin'zhi'jia'deng'yu 贾珍命他好生收心治家等语
'jia'zhen'pai'shou'dao 贾珍拍手道
'jia'zhen'pei'zhe'chi 贾珍陪着吃
'jia'zhen'shen'zhi'ta'yu'xing'fu'ren'bu'mu 贾珍深知他与邢夫人不睦
'jia'zhen'shi'fen'kuan'liu'bu'zhu 贾珍十分款留不住
'jia'zhen'shuai'ling'zhong'zi'zhi'dou'zai'che'pang'shi'li 贾珍率领众子侄都在车旁侍立
'jia'zhen'shuo'zhe'hua 贾珍说着话
'jia'zhen'su'ri'qin'mi 贾珍素日亲密
'jia'zhen'sui'yan'ru'da'ting'zuo'xia 贾珍遂延入大厅坐下
'jia'zhen'sui'yi'sun'nv'zhi'li'lian'bin 贾珍遂以孙女之礼敛殡
'jia'zhen'ting'le'xiao'dao 贾珍听了笑道
'jia'zhen'ting'le'zhe'ge 贾珍听了这个
'jia'zhen'xi'zhi'bu'jin 贾珍喜之不禁
'jia'zhen'xia'le'ma 贾珍下了马
'jia'zhen'xian'jiang'shang'deng'ke'chi'de'dong'xi 贾珍先将上等可吃的东西
'jia'zhen'xian'qu'yuan'zhong'zhi'hui'zhong'ren 贾珍先去园中知会众人

'jia'zhen'xiang'le'xiang 贾珍想了想
'jia'zhen'xiang'le'yi'xiang 贾珍想了一想
'jia'zhen'xiang'yi'feng'wen'de'xie'kou'sheng'bu'da'hao 贾珍想亦风闻得些口声不大好
'jia'zhen'xiang'you'shi'shuo'dao 贾珍向尤氏说道
'jia'zhen'xiao'zhe'shuo 贾珍笑着说

'jia'zhen'xiu'de'wu'hua 贾珍羞得无话
'jia'zhen'yao'zhi'dao 贾珍遥指道
'jia'zhen'ye'wu'xin'cha'fan 贾珍也无心茶饭
'jia'zhen'ye'zhi'wei'xiang'lian'suo'da 贾珍也知为湘莲所打
'jia'zhen'yi'bei'de'ye'jiang'yao'shang'ma 贾珍一辈的也将要上马
'jia'zhen'yi'huan'le'chao'fu 贾珍亦换了朝服
'jia'zhen'yi'mian'fu'guai 贾珍一面扶拐
'jia'zhen'yi'yi'gao'su'le 贾珍一一告诉了
'jia'zhen'yin'jia'mu'cai'hui'jia'lai 贾珍因贾母才回家来
'jia'zhen'yin'jin'ri'you'yu'le'xin'you 贾珍因近日又遇了新友
'jia'zhen'yin'wen'you'shi 贾珍因问尤氏
'jia'zhen'yin'xiang'zhe'jia'rong'bu'guo'shi'ge'hong'men'jian 贾珍因想着贾蓉不过是个黉门监
'jia'zhen'yin'xiao'shuo 贾珍因笑说
'jia'zhen'yin'yao'xing'ling 贾珍因要行令
'jia'zhen'you'fen'fu'jia'rong'dao 贾珍又吩咐贾蓉道
'jia'zhen'you'guo'yu'bei'ai 贾珍又过于悲哀
'jia'zhen'you'le'ji'fen'jiu 贾珍有了几分酒
'jia'zhen'zai'tie'kan'si'zuo'wan'fo'shi 贾珍在铁槛寺作完佛事
'jia'zhen'zai'xian'peng'bei 贾珍在先捧杯
'jia'zhen'zhi'de'pai'fu'nv'xiang'ban 贾珍只得派妇女相伴
'jia'zhen'zhi'qi'you'shi'nai'zhi'jiu 贾珍之妻尤氏乃治酒
'jia'zhen'zhi'zhi'bu'zai'ci 贾珍之志不在此
'jia'zhen'zhou'mei'dao 贾珍皱眉道
'jia'zhen'zi'wei'zui'hou'zi'guai 贾珍自为醉后自怪
'jia'zheng'bian'shi'ren'shang'lai'dui'wang'fu'ren'shuo 贾政便使人上来对王夫人说
'jia'zheng'bu'guan'yu'su'wu 贾政不惯于俗务
'jia'zheng'bu'jin'xiao'dao 贾政不禁笑道
'jia'zheng'bu'lai'wen'ta'de'shu 贾政不来问他的书
'jia'zheng'dai'ling'jia'zhen'deng'san'qu'bu'ti 贾政带领贾珍等散去不提
'jia'zheng'deng'kan'le 贾政等看了
'jia'zheng'deng'mang'jie'shang'da'ting 贾政等忙接上大厅
'jia'zheng'deng'yi'gan'ren'bu'zhi'shi'he'xiao'xi 贾政等一干人不知是何消息
'jia'zheng'deng'yu'yue'tai'xia'pai'ban 贾政等于月台下排班
'jia'zheng'deng'zai'qian'dao'yin 贾政等在前导引
'jia'zheng'dian'tou'dao 贾政点头道
'jia'zheng'dou'zai'jia'mu'fang'nei'zuo'zhe'shuo'xian'hua 贾政都在贾母房内坐着说闲话
'jia'zheng'fang'lue'xin'yi'kuan'chang 贾政方略心意宽畅
'jia'zheng'gang'zhi'yuan'men'qian 贾政刚至园门前
'jia'zheng'guan'bu'zhao'zhe'xie'xiao'shi 贾政管不着这些小事
'jia'zheng'hu'xiang'qi'ta'lai 贾政忽想起他来
'jia'zheng'hui'tou'xiao'dao 贾政回头笑道
'jia'zheng'jian'jia'mu'xi'yue 贾政见贾母喜悦
'jia'zheng'jie'bu'ji'jin'qu 贾政皆不及进去
'jia'zheng'leng'xiao'dao 贾政冷笑道

'jia'zheng'mang'pei'xiao'dao 贾政忙陪笑道
'jia'zheng'mang'zhen'le'yi'bei 贾政忙斟了一杯

'jia'zheng'ming'zuo'chi'cha 贾政命坐吃茶
'jia'zheng'nian'ran'chen'yin 贾政拈髯沉音
'jia'zheng'nian'ran'dian'tou'bu'yu 贾政拈髯点头不语
'jia'zheng'nian'ran'xun'si 贾政拈髯寻思
'jia'zheng'qi'de'he'ming 贾政气得喝命
'jia'zheng'san'ren'lian'mang'ying'lai 贾政三人连忙迎来
'jia'zheng'ting'jian'zhe'ban 贾政听见这般
'jia'zheng'ting'le'dao 贾政听了道
'jia'zheng'wen'shu'shi'bei'hou'zan'bao'yu'pian'cai'jin'you 贾政闻塾师背后赞宝玉偏才尽有
'jia'zheng'wen'ta'gong'you'ji'zhong 贾政问他共有几种
'jia'zheng'xian'bing'zheng'kan'men 贾政先秉正看门
'jia'zheng'xie'le'kan'shi 贾政写了看时
'jia'zheng'xin'zhong'ye'pa'jia'mu'bu'fang'xin 贾政心中也怕贾母不放心
'jia'zheng'xin'zhong'zi'shi'xi'huan 贾政心中自是喜欢
'jia'zheng'yao'tou'bu'yu 贾政摇头不语
'jia'zheng'yao'tou'dao 贾政摇头道
'jia'zheng'yao'tou'shuo'dao 贾政摇头说道
'jia'zheng'ye'cheng'bu'zhu'xiao'le 贾政也撑不住笑了
'jia'zheng'yi'han'lei'qi'dao 贾政亦含泪启道
'jia'zheng'yi'sheng'duan'he 贾政一声断喝
'jia'zheng'yi'shi'er'shi'liang 贾政亦是二十两

'jia'zheng'yin'shuo'dao 贾政因说道
'jia'zheng'yin'yu'jia'mu'xi'yue 贾政因欲贾母喜悦

'jia'zheng'yu'zhong'ren'jin'qu 贾政与众人进去

'jia'zhi'deng'bian'jie'le 贾芷等便接了
'jia'zhi'deng'dou'lai'le 贾芝等都来了

'jia'zu'mu'yin'shuo 家祖母因说

'jian'lin'mei'mei'shang'gan 见林妹妹伤感
'jian'mian'shi'bi'ci'bei'xi'jiao'jie 见面时彼此悲喜交接
'jian'mian'shi'jin'you'de 见面是尽有的
'jian'na'da'de'gei'ta'yi'kuai'jiu'shi'le 拣那大的给他一块就是了
'jian'ni'ji'hao'de'chang'lai 拣你极好的唱来
'jian'nian'you'bu'zhi'bao'yang 兼年幼不知保养
'jian'nv'er'yi'ye'bu'gui 见女儿一夜不归
'jian'ping'zhong'yi'bu'duo 见瓶中亦不多
'jian'qi'jia'zhong'xing'jing 见其家中形景
'jian'qi'jiao'qie'wen'qi'xiang'fou 见其娇且闻其香否
'jian'qi'xuan'chuang'ji'mo 见其轩窗寂寞
'jian'qi'yu'shi'dao 见弃于世道
'jian'qin'shi'si'le 见秦氏死了
'jian'qin'zhong'mian'ru'bai'la 见秦钟面如白蜡
'jian'ru'ci'you'qu 见如此有趣
'jian'she'yue'zheng'zai'hai'tang'xia'liang'shou'jin 见麝月正在海棠下晾手巾

'jian'sheng'mi'zuo'cheng'shu'fan 见生米做成熟饭
'jian'shi'gao'jia'lian'de'shi 见是告贾琏的事
'jian'shi'jia'lian'xia'ma 见是贾琏下马

'jian'shui'ru'jing'lian'yi'ban'ben'ru 见水如晶帘一般奔入
'jian'ta'bu'gu'shen'ming 见他不顾身命

'jian'ta'er'ren'gui'xia 见他二人跪下
'jian'ta'er'ren'lai'le 见他二人来了
'jian'ta'hai'zhan'zai'na'li'deng'ne 见她还站在那里等呢
'jian'ta'jia'ye'pin'han 见他家业贫寒

'jian'ta'lai'de'shi'tou'bu'hao 见她来的势头不好
'jian'ta'liang'ge'lai 见他两个来
'jian'ta'liang'ge'lai'le 见她两个来了

'jian'ta'qu'yuan'le 见他去远了

'jian'ta'zhe'ge'guang'jing 见他这个光景

'jian'wo'dai'ta'hao'le 见我待她好了
'jian'wo'lai'ye'bu'li'yi'li 见我来也不理一理

'jiang'zhe'tiao'ji'shang 将这条系上
'jiang'zhe'zhou'song'gei'feng'ge'er'chi'qu 将这粥送给凤哥儿吃去
'jiang'zheng'dan'fang'guan'zhi'yu'bao'yu 将正旦芳官指与宝玉
'jiang'zhi'neng'bao'zai'kang'shang'jiu'yun'yu'qi'lai 将智能抱在炕上就云雨起来
'jiang'zhi'neng'zhu'chu 将智能逐出
'jiang'zhong'ren'ya'dao 将众人压倒
'jiang'zhuan'guo'le'yi'chong'shan'po 将转过了一重山坡
'jiang'zhuo'zi'nuo'zai'wai'jian'dang'di 将桌子挪在外间当地
'jiang'zi'ji'zhe'yi'xi'she'yu'ta'pang 将自己这一席设于榻旁
'jiang'zi'ji'zhen'de'tui'yu'bao'yu 将自己枕的推与宝玉
'jiang'zi'ya'zhan'jiang'feng'shen'deng'lei'de'xi'wen 姜子牙斩将封神等类的戏文
'jiang'zu'ying'fu'jin'duo'zhi'tian'zhuang 将祖茔附近多置田庄
'jiang'zuo'you'yi'gai'xian'qian'hui'qu 将左右一概先遣回去
'jiao'ba'da'mao'yi'fu'dai'ji'jian'qu 叫把大毛衣服带几件去
'jiao'ban'ge'ren'ye'jiao'bu'zhao 叫半个人也叫不着
'jiao'bao'gu'niang'bie'guan'jin'le'qin'gu'niang 叫宝姑娘别管紧了琴姑娘
'jiao'bao'yu'hui'lai'zhua'bu'zhe'ren 叫宝玉回来抓不着人
'jiao'bao'yu'lue'shou'qiao'xie 较宝玉略瘦巧些
'jiao'bei'zhan'hai'mei'chi 交杯盏还没吃

'jiao'chuan'gong'xi'yan'jie'jue 娇喘共细言皆绝
'jiao'da'niang'jian'le'da'nai'nai'jiu'shi'le 叫大娘见了大奶奶就是了
'jiao'da'ren'cao'xin 叫大人操心

'jiao'gai'ban'de'ren'chui'deng'guan'men 叫该班的人吹灯关门

'jie'chi'sui'shang'xia 阶墀随上下

'jie'dao'jia'li'zhu'zhe'shi'zhen 接到家里住着是真
'jie'de'shan'chuan'xiu 借得山川秀
'jie'dong'shi'ning'guo'fu 街东是宁国府
'jie'er'duo'de'xie'yi 姐儿多得些益

'jie'er'men'yao'tian'yi'yang'ban'yang 姐儿们要添一样半样
'jie'fang'de'shi'tang 皆仿的是唐
'jie'fei'bao'yang'shen'ti'zhi'fa 皆非保养身体之法
'jie'guo'yue'zi'lai 接过籰子来
'jie'hu'wei'lin'si'niang 皆呼为林四娘
'jie'ji'ye'li'le'feng 阶矶也离了缝
'jie'jie'bu'rao'wo 姐姐不饶我
'jie'jie'bu'zhi'dao 姐姐不知道
'jie'jie'ci'shi'na'li'qu 姐姐此时哪里去
'jie'jie'de'shi'he'wo'de'ye'shi'yi'ban 姐姐的事和我的也是一般
'jie'jie'de'xiang'long'xi'ruan 姐姐的箱笼细软
'jie'jie'hai'gai'ca'shang'xie'zhi'fen 姐姐还该擦上些脂粉
'jie'jie'hai'yao'bao'zhong'shen'ti 姐姐还要保重身体
'jie'jie'he'bu'deng'yi'deng'ta'hui'lai'jian'yi'mian 姐姐何不等一等他回来见一面
'jie'jie'ji'de'chuan'xiao'shi'zan'men'tong'zai'yi'chu 姐姐记得穿孝时咱们同在一处
'jie'jie'ji'mei'you'he'ta'yao 姐姐既没有和她要
'jie'jie'ji'zhe'yang'shuo 姐姐既这样说
'jie'jie'jin'ri'qing'wo 姐姐今日请我
'jie'jie'jing'dai'le'wo'hui'er'nai'nai'qu 姐姐竟带了我回二奶奶去
'jie'jie'ke'da'yu'le 姐姐可大愈了
'jie'jie'lian'lian'zhi'dao'ba'yue 接接连连直到八月
'jie'jie'liu'zhe'shi'ba 姐姐留着使罢
'jie'jie'men'qing'cai'yi'cai 姐姐们请猜一猜
'jie'jie'men'shuo'de 姐姐们说的
'jie'jie'na'li'qu 姐姐哪里去
'jie'jie'na'wo'zuo'ya'xue 姐姐拿我作雅谑
'jie'jie'nai'he'deng'yang'ren'wu 姐姐乃何等样人物
'jie'jie'ni'ting'xiao'hua'er 姐姐你听笑话儿
'jie'jie'ru'he'fan'bu'jie'zhe'yi'si 姐姐如何反不解这意思
'jie'jie'shuo'de'he'chang'bu'shi 姐姐说的何尝不是
'jie'jie'shuo'shei'tuo'dang 姐姐说谁妥当
'jie'jie'tai'xing'ji'le 姐姐太性急了
'jie'jie'ting'jian'ye'ji'tong'yuan'jie'jie'shi'yi'li 姐姐听见也即同怨姐姐是一理
'jie'jie'xian'zai'zhe'li'deng'wo'le 姐姐先在这里等我了
'jie'jie'xin'ta'hu'shuo 姐姐信他胡说
'jie'jie'xiong'di'zhi'guan'qing 姐姐兄弟只管请

'jie'jie'ye'bu'zhi'shou'le'duo'shao'xian'qi 姐姐也不知受了多少闲气
'jie'jie'yi'kan'jian'le 姐姐已看见了
'jie'jie'yi'nian'dao'tou'xin'ku'fu'shi'lao'tai'tai 姐姐一年到头辛苦服侍老太太
'jie'jie'you'yao'cha 姐姐又要茶
'jie'jie'zhe'hua'cuo'le 姐姐这话错了

'jie'jin'yin'ke'si'ding 皆金银锞四锭
'jie'ke'nuo'jiu'qian'lai 皆可挪就前来
'jie'le'dui'pai'jiu'zou 接了对牌就走
'jie'le'lue'bai'yi'bai'jiu'song'guo'lai'de 借了略摆一摆就送过来的

'jin'er'yin'chi'le'mian 今儿因吃了面

'jin'xian'zi'mang'chang 今嫌紫蟒长
'jin'xiao'hong'deng'zhang'di'wo'yuan'yang 今宵红灯帐底卧鸳鸯
'jin'xiao'shui'guo'yin 今宵水国吟
'jin'xing'ban'le'jin'lai'shou'zhu 尽行搬了进来收贮
'jin'xing'bo'li'deng'ren 金星玻璃等人
'jin'xing'bo'li'gao'su'le'bao'yu 金星玻璃告诉了宝玉
'jin'xiu'cheng'ge'nv'ti 仅修成个女体
'jin'ye'bu'yao'tuan'yuan'tuan'yuan 今夜不要团圆团圆
'jin'ye'liao'yi'se'ze 今夜聊以塞责
'jin'ye'tong'ren'lai'qiao'wang'liu'zhi 今也同人来瞧望柳侄
'jin'yi'an'tu'hua'yu'hou 今亦按图画于后
'jin'yi'bang'wai'zu'mu'ji'jiu'shi'zi'mei'qu 今依傍外祖母及舅氏姊妹去
'jin'yi'cha'shou'wai 今已查收外
'jin'yi'chu'jia'yi'er'nian'le 今已出家一二年了
'jin'yi'er'shi'lai'wang'le 今已二十来往了
'jin'yi'qu'le'er'nian 今已娶了二年
'jin'yi'qun'hua'zhi'rui 谨以群花之蕊
'jin'yi'sheng'le'ben'fu'zhi'fu 今已升了本府知府
'jin'yi'sheng'zhi'lan'tai'si'dai'fu 今已升至兰台寺大夫
'jin'yi'tuo'lai'ta'men'fang'ru'yuan'zhong'sui'nv'gui'fang 今亦托赖她们方入园中随女归房
'jin'yi'wu'fan'zai'yin 今亦无烦再引
'jin'yin'feng'jie'jie'shen'zi'bu'hao'ji'ri 近因凤姐姐身子不好几日
'jin'yin'hai'yao'ru'dou 今因还要入都
'jin'yin'ji'mo'yu'guan'zhong 今因疾殁于观中
'jin'yin'jia'jing'ting'ling'zai'jia 近因贾敬停灵在家
'jin'yin'jin'shang'chong'shi'shang'li 近因今上崇诗尚礼
'jin'yin'ke'er'dui 金银锞二对
'jin'yin'lian'ri'bu'zi'zai 今因连日不自在
'jin'yin'mai'gu'dong'he'ren'da'guan'si 近因卖古董和人打官司
'jin'yin'nv'xue'sheng'ai'tong'guo'shang 近因女学生哀痛过伤
'jin'you'jian'ru'ci 今又见如此
'jin'you'jian'si'qi'yi'zou 今又见司棋亦走
'jin'you'qu'le'bao'chai 今又去了宝钗
'jin'you'ting'jian'ru'ci'shuo'ta'chong'le 今又听见如此说她冲了
'jin'you'ting'le'ru'ci'yi'pian'hua 今又听了如此一篇话
'jin'you'zao'le'ku'da 今又遭了苦打
'jin'you'zheng'zhi'zhong'qiu 今又正值中秋
'jin'you'zi'cai'xian'ming'yi'zhan 仅有自采仙茗一盏
'jin'yu'huan'si'ge 金玉环四个
'jin'yu'jie'zhi'ge'wu'ge 金玉戒指各五个
'jin'yuan'lai'xian'cong 进园来先从
'jin'yuan'qi'wang'lu'xue'an'lai 进园齐往芦雪庵来
'jin'yuan'qiao'gu'niang 进园瞧姑娘
'jin'yuan'yang'san'xuan'ya'pai'ling 金鸳鸯三宣牙牌令
'jin'yue'de'ya'tou'bei 禁约得丫头辈
'jin'zai'jia'fu'zhu'le'liang'ri 今在贾府住了两日
'jin'zan'xue'li'mai 金簪雪里埋
'jin'zhe'bian'lai'deng'hou 进这边来等候
'jin'zhi'neng'jian'le'qin'zhong 今智能见了秦钟
'jin'zhi'wei'rong'fu'zhi'sun 今知为荣府之孙
'jin'zhi'you'di'qi'jia'shi 今只有嫡妻贾氏
'jin'zhu'ming'ci'gu 今注明此故
'jin'zi'wan'qian'shui'zhi'guo 金紫万千谁治国
'jing'ba'feng'jie'ren'wei'zhi'ji 竟把凤姐认为知己
'jing'ba'li'mian'suo'you'fang'wu'xi'jie'zhe'zhu 竟把里面所有房屋悉皆遮住
'jing'ba'ni'xu'le'ta 竟把你许了他
'jing'ba'shang'mian'zan'zhe 镜把上面錾着
'jing'ba'xing'hua'gu'fu'le 竟把杏花辜负了
'jing'ba'yun'ya'tou'qing'le'lai 竟把云丫头请了来
'jing'ba'zhe'ge'dao'xie'song'ge'ren'qu 竟把这个倒些送个人去
'jing'ben'tie'kan'si'da'lu'xing'lai 竟奔铁槛寺大路行来
'jing'bi'da'ren'xing'chu'lai'de'bu'cuo 竟比大人行出来的不错
'jing'bi'jian'le'er'zi'de'hai'sheng 竟比见了儿子的还胜
'jing'bi'wo'men'zhong'guo'ren'hai'qiang 竟比我们中国人还强
'jing'bian'le'yi'wei'zui'biao'zhi'mei'mao'de'xiao'jie 竟变了一位最标致美貌的小姐
'jing'bie'peng'zhe'ge'ding'zi'qu 竟别碰这个钉子去
'jing'bie'ru'ta'men'shou 竟别入他们手
'jing'bu'bian'shi'he'qi'wei 竟不辨是何气味
'jing'bu'ceng'liu'xin 竟不曾留心
'jing'bu'gei'ta'ye'ba'le 竟不给他也罢了
'jing'bu'gu'xu'yi'dian'er 竟不顾恤一点儿
'jing'bu'hao'wang'qian'zai'quan 竟不好往前再劝
'jing'bu'lao'ni'fei'xin 竟不劳你费心
'jing'bu'neng'mu'bu'shi'wu 竟不能目不视物
'jing'bu'neng'yi'jian 竟不能一见
'jing'bu'ru'bao'er'ye'ying'le 竟不如宝二爷应了
'jing'bu'shi'wei'shi'wei'hua'lai'zhao'wo 竟不是为诗为画来找我
'jing'bu'shi'zan'men'hou'men'de'qi'gai 竟不失咱们侯门的气概
'jing'bu'ting'jian'you'dong'jing 竟不听见有动静
'jing'bu'wei'ying'qian 竟不为赢钱
'jing'bu'xiang'lao'zu'zong'de'wai'sun'nv'er 竟不象老祖宗的外孙女儿
'jing'bu'xiang'xing'fu'ren'ji'ta'de'fu'mu'yi'yang 竟不像邢夫人及她的父母一样
'jing'bu'yong'cong'jing'li'dai'xia'qu 竟不用从京里带下去
'jing'bu'yong'yi'gan'yi'ge 竟不用一干一戈
'jing'bu'zhi'na'li'qu'le 竟不知哪里去了
'jing'bu'zhi'qi'suo'fen'he'wu 竟不知其所焚何物
'jing'bu'zhi'tou'ben'he'fang'he'she 竟不知投奔何方何舍
'jing'bu'zhi'xi'he'xiang'qi 竟不知系何香气
'jing'cheng'le'li'le 竟成了例了
'jing'cheng'le'zhen'de'le 竟成了真的了
'jing'chu'qu'rang'wo'guan'men 竟出去让我关门
'jing'da'bu'xiang'xian'le 竟大不像先了
'jing'da'gan'ji'ni 竟大感激你
'jing'da'kai'fang'bian'zhi'en 竟大开方便之恩
'jing'da'xiang'mao'dun'le 竟大相矛盾了
'jing'da'you'qing'li 竟大有情理
'jing'de'zai'ping'er'qian'shao'jin'pian'xin 竟得在平儿前稍尽片心
'jing'dong'zhe'xie'ren 惊动这些人
'jing'dong'zhong'wei'xiong'di'de'shi'fan'le 惊动众位兄弟的事犯了
'jing'du'zhong'ji'chu'sheng'yi 京都中几处生意
'jing'du'zhuan'cheng'yi'pian'chang'wen 竟杜撰成一篇长文
'jing'duo'chi'le'ji'bei 竟多吃了几杯
'jing'duo'wen'zhang'zao'hua'gong 景夺文章造化功
'jing'e'le'liang'san'ri 净饿了两三日
'jing'fang'le'ta'men'ba 竟放了她们罢
'jing'fen'bu'chu'jian'ge'lai'de 竟分不出间隔来的
'jing'gai'le'nan'ming'cai'bie'zhi 竟改了男名才别致
'jing'gei'ta'ban'nian'de'jia 竟给他半年的假
'jing'geng'bi'ta'ren'hao'le'shi'bei 竟更比他人好了十倍
'jing'gui'dao'li'tou'lai'cai'hao 竟归到里头来才好
'jing'guo'qiang'qu'le 竟过墙去了
'jing'hai'you'yi'da'bao 竟还有一大包
'jing'hou'hao'si'tie'chui'za'xia'lai 颈后好似铁锤砸下来
'jing'hua'su'cheng'ya'le 竟化俗成雅了
'jing'hua'yu'yan'liao'ying'nan 精华欲掩料应难
'jing'huan'bian'ming'che'qu'can'xi 警幻便命撤去残席
'jing'huan'bian'shuo'dao 警幻便说道
'jing'huan'jian'bao'yu'shen'wu'qu'wei 警幻见宝玉甚无趣味
'jing'huan'leng'xiao'dao 警幻冷笑道
'jing'huan'mang'xie'zhu'bao'yu'de'shou 警幻忙携住宝玉的手
'jing'huan'xian'zi'suo'zhi 警幻仙子所制
'jing'huan'xie'bao'yu 警幻携宝玉
'jing'huan'yi'ceng'wen'ji 警幻亦曾问及
'jing'jian'jian'lou'chu'na'xia'shi'de'guang'jing'lai 竟渐渐露出那下世的光景来
'jing'jiang'da'ban'tiao'jie'zhan'le 竟将大半条街占了
'jing'jiang'feng'jie'yi'bi'gou'dao 竟将凤姐一笔勾倒
'jing'jiang'shi'she'ge'qi 竟将诗社搁起
'jing'jiao'dao'ni'men'yi'fan 竟教导你们一番
'jing'jiao'yu'na'yi'ge 竟交与那一个
'jing'jiao'yu'ta'shi'yi'shi 竟交与他拭一拭
'jing'jiao'zhe'xiao'hai'zi'xiao'hua'wo'bu'cheng 竟叫这小孩子笑话我不成
'jing'jue'wu'ke'wu'bu'ke 竟觉无可无不可
'jing'kai'le'du'ju 竟开了赌局
'jing'lai'xun'dai'yu 径来寻黛玉
'jing'le'lao'tai'tai'de'jia'le 惊了老太太的驾了
'jing'liu'yan'zhi'tan'mian 警柳眼之贪眠
'jing'mei'gao'su'wan 竟没告诉完
'jing'mei'kan'jian'ji'zi'shu 竟没看见姬子书
'jing'mei'le'zhu'yi 竟没了主意
'jing'mei'yi'dui'shuang'quan'de 竟没一对双全的
'jing'mei'yi'ge'ren'xiang'ni'qian'ri'de'hua'jiao'dao'wo 竟没一个人像你前日的话教导我
'jing'mei'yi'ge'ren'ying'er 竟没一个人影儿
'jing'mei'you'wo'men'zhe'bian'de'ren 竟没有我们这边的人
'jing'mei'you'yi'lian'qing'guo'wu'ri 竟没有一连晴过五日
'jing'meng'er'chu 惊梦二出
'jing'meng'zhong'dao'le'dou'zhong'yi'ge'hua'yuan'zi'li'tou 竟梦中到了都中一个花园子里头
'jing'mi'duan'le'liang'shi 粳米短了两石
'jing'miao'yi'shi'yan'bu'chu 精妙一时言不出
'jing'mo'ruo'gai'zuo 竟莫若改作
'jing'neng'xiao'hun'zui'po 竟能销魂醉魄
'jing'ni'bu'chu'ren'lai 竟拟不出人来
'jing'niang'cheng'ge'dao'zhi'de'xing'qi 竟酿成个盗跖的性气
'jing'po'neng'jie'ci 竟颇能解此
'jing'po'qiu'chuang'qiu'meng'lv 惊破秋窗秋梦绿
'jing'qi'you'liang'ge'duo'yue'mei'lai 经期有两个多月没来
'jing'qi'you'you'liang'ge'yue'mei'lai 经期又有两个月没来
'jing'qiao'wu'ren'ke'sou 静悄无人咳嗽
'jing'ru'gao'mu'si'hui'yi'ban 竟如槁木死灰一般
'jing'ru'luan'ma'yi'ban 竟如乱麻一般
'jing'shen'hai'hao'ne 精神还好呢
'jing'shen'yin'ci'bi'chang'shao'jian 精神因此比常稍减
'jing'shi'bu'zhi'de 竟是不知的
'jing'shi'dou'zi'bie'zhi 竟是豆字别致
'jing'shi'ge'di'qin'de'sun'nv 竟是个嫡亲的孙女
'jing'shi'ge'jue'dai'jia'ren 竟是个绝代佳人
'jing'shi'ge'nan'ren'wan'bu'ji'yi'de 竟是个男人万不及一的
'jing'shi'he'er'nai'nai'shuo'shuo 竟是和二奶奶说说
'jing'shi'he'gai'xi'fu'de'bing'zai'ta'shou'li'chu'zai 竟是合该媳妇的病在他手里除灾
'jing'shi'hen'da'de'yi'ge'zheng'hou 竟是很大的一个症候
'jing'shi'mei'yao'xing'de'pao'zhang 竟是没药性的炮仗
'jing'shi'miao'li'de'xiao'gui 竟是庙里的小鬼
'jing'shi'qian'gu'wei'wen'de'han'shi 竟是千古未闻的罕事
'jing'shi'qiang'ming'ne 竟是抢命呢
'jing'shi'sheng'cheng'zhe'deng'fang'dan'gui'pi'le 竟是生成这等放诞诡僻了
'jing'shi'te'yin'wan'yue'er'she'ci'liang'chu 竟是特因玩月而设此两处
'jing'shi'wo'men'zhei'li'ying'le'qi'lai'de'wei'shi 竟是我们这里应了起来的为是
'jing'shi'xie'bu'chu'lai'de 竟是写不出来的
'jing'shi'xue'dui'chu'lai'de 竟是雪堆出来的
'jing'shi'xue'pan'he'liu'xiang'lian'lai'le 竟是薛蟠和柳湘连来了
'jing'shi'yi'ye'da'xue 竟是一夜大雪
'jing'shi'yi'zuo'po'miao 竟是一座破庙
'jing'shi'you'qu'de'li 竟是有去的理
'jing'shi'yu'yan'jing'le 竟是鱼眼睛了
'jing'si'tao'ci'er'lai 竟似套此而来
'jing'song'le'ni'huan'xia'zhe'ge'lai 竟送了你换下这个来
'jing'suan'shi'ge'xiao'shang'han 竟算是个小伤寒
'jing'suan'shi'ni'lei'ta'de'dao'miao 竟算是你诔她的倒妙
'jing'sui'le'xian'gu 竟随了仙姑
'jing'ti'yi'ma'chu'yin'zi 竟替姨妈出银子
'jing'tian'hou'zhi'sun'wu'cheng'bing'ma'si'qiu'liang 景田侯之孙五城兵马司裘良
'jing'tong'gong'zhe'yi'ge'mei'zi 竟通共这一个妹子
'jing'tou'dao'zhei'li'lai 竟投到这里来
'jing'wang'ji'le'lao'zu'zong 竟忘记了老祖宗
'jing'wei'de'ting'jian 竟未得听见
'jing'wen'ye'bu'yong'xue'le 经文也不用学了
'jing'wu'chu'ke'su 竟无处可诉
'jing'wu'gu'si'le'ban'bian 竟无故死了半边
'jing'wu'ren'zuo'zhu 竟无人作主
'jing'wu'yi'ke'yi'ji'ye 竟无一可以继业
'jing'xian'kan'guo'mai 竟先看过脉
'jing'xiang'tian'shang'diao'xia'ge'huo'long'lai'de'yi'ban 竟像天上掉下个活龙来的一般
'jing'xu'dai'ling'zhi'shan 净虚带领智善
'jing'xu'ta'xie'yin'zi 竟许他些银子
'jing'xue'suo'yi'bu'neng'an'shi'er'zhi 经血所以不能按时而至
'jing'yao'nian'chu'qu'cai'shi 竟要撵出去才是
'jing'yao'qu'tan'wang'tan'wang 竟要去探望探望
'jing'ye'bu'jue'teng 竟也不觉疼
'jing'ye'hai'bie'kai'sheng'mian 竟也还别开生面
'jing'yi'dai'bu'ru'yi'dai'le 竟一代不如一代了
'jing'yi'ri'yi'ri'du'sheng'yu'she'le 竟一日一日赌胜于射了
'jing'ying'zai'ben'chao 竟应在本朝
'jing'yong'ta'zhe'yi'ge 竟用他这一个
'jing'yong'xiao'er'yi'xi'zhi'ci'gou'qie'tang'se 竟用小儿一戏之辞苟且搪塞
'jing'you'bian'le'yi'ge 竟又变了一个
'jing'you'hao'zhu'yi 竟有好主意
'jing'you'liang'xing'chen'su 竟有两星沉速
'jing'you'shi'su'she'li'zhe 竟有世俗射利者
'jing'you'yao'ding'xia'ming'nian'de'dong'xi'lai'le 竟又要定下明年的东西来了
'jing'you'yi'ju'bu'jie 竟有一句不解
'jing'you'yi'ye'cha'ban'guai'wu'cuan'chu 竟有一夜叉般怪物窜出
'jing'you'zheng'dou'xiang'da'zhi'shi 竟有争斗相打之事
'jing'yu'xue'da'sha'zi'zuo'le'fang'li'ren 竟与薛大傻子作了房里人
'jing'zai'zhao'bu'chu'liang'ge'zi'lai 竟再找不出两个字来
'jing'zhe'mei'cuo'le'de 敬着没错了的
'jing'zhe'yin'ruo'gan'liang 净折银若干两
'jing'zhen'shi'ta'piao'le'nan'ren 竟真是她嫖了男人
'jing'zhi'jie'jie'bu'shi'wo'men'yi'liu'de'su'ren 竟知姐姐不是我们一流的俗人
'jing'zhuo'shi'kui'xu'xia'lai 竟着实亏虚下来
'jing'zi'cong'shou'li'diao'guo'lai 镜子从手里掉过来
'jing'zi'ji'dui'mian'shuo'le'zhe'hua 竟自己对面说了这话
'jing'zi'xue'fa'chu'jia 竟自削发出家
'jiong'fei'su'chang'cheng'yan'dou'se'zhi'ke'bi 迥非素常逞妍斗色之可比
'jiong'hu'bu'xiang'heng'wu'zhi'ti 迥乎不像蘅芜之体
'jiu'ba'ge'ren'song'le'lai 就把个人送了来
'jiu'ba'hai'tang'she'gai'zuo'tao'hua'she 就把海棠社改作桃花社
'jiu'ba'lin'da'niang'jiao'le'lai 就把林大娘叫了来
'jiu'ba'na'lv'li'tian'shang 就把那履历填上
'jiu'ba'ta'ju'yue'de'huo'xing'luan'beng 就把他拘约的火星乱迸
'jiu'ba'wo'er'yi'xu'gei'huang'liang'zhuang'tou'zhang'jia 就把我二姨许给皇粮庄头张家
'jiu'ba'wo'men'wang'le 就把我们忘了
'jiu'ba'zhe'xue'ya'de'lu'wei'zi'sai'shang'xie 就把这雪压的芦苇子揌上些
'jiu'ba'zhu'xin'zi'chou'le 就把竹信子抽了
'jiu'bai'bai'de'zou'le 就白白的走了
'jiu'bai'fang'xin'ping'ni'men'gou'yin'huai'le'bu'cheng 就白放心凭你们勾引坏了不成
'jiu'bao'bu'zhu'bu'chi'jiu 就保不住不吃酒
'jiu'ben'ping'an'zhou'da'dao 就奔平安州大道
'jiu'bi'na'mou'xu'zhu'wang 就比那谋虚逐妄
'jiu'bi'ru'fang'cai'wo'men'gu'niang'xia'lai 就比如方才我们姑娘下来
'jiu'bi'ta'ri'ye'fu'shi'wo'jin'le'xiao'de'yi'ban 就比他日夜服侍我尽了孝的一般
'jiu'bian'bu'hao'he'ta'shuo 就便不好和她说
'jiu'bian'duo'fei'xie'shi 就便多费些事
'jiu'bian'hao'le'bu'lai 就便好了不来
'jiu'bian'shi'jie'jie'you'le'hao'di'fang 就便是姐姐有了好地方
'jiu'bu'bi'mang'le 就不必忙了
'jiu'bu'bi'sou'le 就不必搜了
'jiu'bu'ceng'na'qu 就不曾拿去
'jiu'bu'de'zhan'cai'le 就不得展才了
'jiu'bu'he'er'zi'yi'ban'jian'shi'le 就不和儿子一般见识了
'jiu'bu'ke'jiu'le 就不可救了
'jiu'bu'lai'xu'guo'ta'le 就不来絮聒她了
'jiu'bu'neng'zhong'fan'le 就不能重犯了
'jiu'bu'ti'tie'ni'men'zhe'dang'jia'ren'le 就不体贴你们这当家人了
'jiu'bu'xu'wo'zuo'qing'er 就不许我作情儿
'jiu'bu'ying'fa'da 就不应发达
'jiu'cha'ni'lai'shuo'le 就差你来说了
'jiu'chu'ta'lao'ren'jia'lai'cai'hao 救出她老人家来才好
'jiu'chu'zai'ben'chao 就出在本朝
'jiu'chuan'guan'jia'nan'nv 就传管家男女
'jiu'chuan'na'yi'ban 就传哪一班
'jiu'cong'jin'ri'ci'le 就从今日辞了
'jiu'cong'jiu'nian'yi'li'chu'fang'yi'lai 就从旧年一立厨房以来
'jiu'da'fa'ren'ban'qu'de 就打发人办去的
'jiu'da'kou'cui'ta 就大口啐他
'jiu'da'qi'lai'le 就打起来了
'jiu'dai'le'qu'ba 就带了去罢
'jiu'dai'le'xin'er 就带了信儿
'jiu'di'yao'guan'ren'shi'de'guo'cai'ming 酒底要关人事的果菜名
'jiu'ding'le'ming'er'hou'er'xia'tie'er'qing'ba 就定了明儿后儿下帖儿请罢
'jiu'diu'kai'shou'le 就丢开手了
'jiu'fa'qi're'lai 就发起热来
'jiu'fang'zhe'ming'ri'zai'lian'ye'ke 就放着明日再联也可
'jiu'fei'zhe'yang'xin'si 就费这样心思
'jiu'feng'feng'dian'dian'qi'lai 就疯疯颠颠起来
'jiu'gai'hang'xie'zheng'jing'shi 就该行些正经事
'jiu'gai'jia'jin'shuo'le'qu'cai'shi 就该加劲说了去才是
'jiu'gai'ming'huan'jiao 就改名唤叫
'jiu'gai'qi'miao'lai'gong'zhe 就盖起庙来供着
'jiu'gai'shang'chang'le 就该上场了
'jiu'gai'wen'zhe'ta'cai'shi 就该问着他才是
'jiu'gai'zhu'le'lian 酒盖住了脸
'jiu'gan'hui'lai'de 就赶回来的
'jiu'gao'lian'er'ye'guo'xiao'jia'xiao'zhi'zhong 就告琏二爷国孝家孝之中
'jiu'ge'hun'zhuan'deng'yan'wang'jia'dao 九个魂专等阎王驾到
'jiu'ge'ren'dou'zai'gong'zhuo'di'xia'shui'zhao'le 九个人都在供桌底下睡着了
'jiu'ge'ren'mang'xi'xi'de'gao'su'le'ta 九个人忙细细的告诉了他
'jiu'ge'ren'ting'le 九个人听了
'jiu'ge'zai'na'li 就搁在那里
'jiu'gei'le'ni'men'nai'nai 就给了你们奶奶
'jiu'gei'ta'chi'le 就给她吃了
'jiu'gei'wo'men'jian'shi'jian'shi'ye'ba'le 就给我们见识见识也罢了
'jiu'gen'zhe'wo'shui'ba 就跟着我睡罢
'jiu'gong'yi'zhan'shui 就供一盏水
'jiu'gou'ni'men'guo'yi'bei'zi'ne 就够你们过一辈子呢
'jiu'gu'gu'ji'ji'qiu'wo'men'nai'nai'qu'qiu'qin 就咕咕唧唧求我们奶奶去求亲
'jiu'gui'fang'an'xie'qu'le 就归房安歇去了
'jiu'guo'fan'luo'tuo'de 九国贩骆驼的
'jiu'guo'lai'dian'mao'li'shi 就过来点卯理事
'jiu'guo'na'wu'li'le 就过那屋里了
'jiu'hai'shi'wu'yan'pai'lv'ba 就还是五言排律罢
'jiu'he'shou'zhe'chu'de'ren'suan'zhang'miao'pei 就和守这处的人算帐描赔
'jiu'he'ta'shang'liang 就和她商量
'jiu'hen'ming'shuai'qu 就狠命摔去
'jiu'hou'fan'lian'chang'qing 酒后反脸常情
'jiu'hu'luan'shui'le 就胡乱睡了
'jiu'hu'qin'jiao'mao'le 就胡吣嚼毛了
'jiu'hun'guo'qu'le 就混过去了
'jiu'ji'de'ni'zhe'yang'zi 就急得你这样子
'jiu'ji'hui'zhe'xie'ge 就忌讳这些个
'jiu'ji'jing'zuo'yi'shou'shi 就即景作一首诗
'jiu'ji'ke'na'guo'lai'bai'zhe'le 就即刻拿过来摆着了
'jiu'jia'bian'qian'xing 就加鞭前行
'jiu'jian'le'xiang'dai 就剪了香袋
'jiu'jiang'ci'chun'wu'jia'dai'yu'zhong 就将此蠢物夹带于中
'jiu'jiang'fang'guan'fu'zai'bao'yu'zhi'ce 就将芳官扶在宝玉之侧
'jiu'jiang'xin'zhi'hong'lou'meng'shi'er'zhi'yan'shang'lai 就将新制红楼梦十二支演上来
'jiu'jiao'gei'yu'lu'ba 就交给俞禄罢
'jiu'jiao'shui'zai'zhe'li 就叫谁在这里
'jiu'jiao'ta'shi'qiao'ge'er'ba 就叫他是巧哥儿罢
'jiu'jiao'zuo'ao'jing 就叫作凹晶
'jiu'jiao'zuo'tu'bi 就叫作凸碧
'jiu'jiao'zuo'xie'huang'da'jiao'tu 就叫作携蝗大嚼图
'jiu'jie'le'an'le 就接了案了
'jiu'jin'qing'you'zai 酒尽情犹在
'jiu'jing'bu'guo'shi'yao 究竟不过是药
'jiu'jing'bu'shi'wei'ci 究竟不是为此
'jiu'jing'bu'yong'chi'yao 究竟不用吃药
'jiu'jing'gu'niang'he'ceng'he'ta'yao'shen'me'le 究竟姑娘何曾和她要什么了
'jiu'jing'he'ceng'cheng'pian'qian'xin'wan'suo 究竟何曾成篇潜心玩索
'jiu'jing'jia'fu'er'zhai 究竟贾府二宅
'jiu'jing'jia'zhen'deng'he'ceng'sui'yi'le'yi'ri 究竟贾珍等何曾遂意了一日
'jiu'jing'lian'tan'chun'zhi'yu'yi'bu'ceng'wen'de 究竟连探春之语亦不曾闻得
'jiu'jing'lian'wo'ye'bu'zhi'he'gu 究竟连我也不知何故
'jiu'jing'mei'da'cheng'ni 究竟没打成你
'jiu'jing'mei'shuo'dao'yue'shang 究竟没说到月上
'jiu'jing'na'ye'wu'ai 究竟那也无碍
'jiu'jing'na'yu'bu'zhi'shi'zen'me'ge'lai'li 究竟那玉不知是怎么个来历
'jiu'jing'qi'hai'wei'ping 究竟气还未平
'jiu'jing'shi'dao'tou'yi'meng 究竟是到头一梦
'jiu'jing'shi'ge'you'sha'you'dai'de 究竟是个又傻又呆的
'jiu'jing'suan'bu'de'hao'shi 究竟算不得好诗
'jiu'jing'wei'ceng'xi'xi'de'shang'jian 究竟未曾细细的赏鉴
'jiu'jing'wo'ye'bu'zhi'shen'me'shi'beng'bu'beng'de 究竟我也不知什么是崩不崩的
'jiu'jing'ye'bu'ceng'de'zui'ni'men 究竟也不曾得罪你们
'jiu'jing'ye'bu'shi'nan'ren'fen'nei'zhi'shi 究竟也不是男人份内之事
'jiu'jing'ye'wu'ke'guan 究竟也无可管
'jiu'jing'you'he'qu'wei 究竟有何趣味
'jiu'jing'zhe'you'bu'shi'zheng'jing'shi 究竟这又不是正经事
'jiu'jing'zhe'zhuo'zi'neng'duo'chong 究竟这镯子能多重
'jiu'jing'zong'mei'yao'guo'yi'ci 究竟总没要过一次
'jiu'jing'zuo'chu'lai'de'shi'dou'gou'shi'de'le 究竟作出来的事都够使的了
'jiu'jiu'ruo'jiao'ni 舅舅若叫你
'jiu'kai'en'jiao'wo'qu'ne 就开恩叫我去呢
'jiu'ke'gan'ge'le 就可感格了
'jiu'ke'wang'quan'yu'le 就可望全愈了
'jiu'ke'xian'yi'shi'xin 就可闲一时心
'jiu'ke'yi'shao'cao'xie'xin 就可以少操些心
'jiu'lai'bu'zhao'zhe'bian'de'ren'le 就赖不着这边的人了
'jiu'lai'hun'wo'men 就来混我们
'jiu'lai'le'yi'gu'zi 就来了一股子
'jiu'leng'qing'le'duo'shao 就冷清了多少
'jiu'li'yu'xun'xin 就利欲熏心
'jiu'lian'bao'xiong'di'ye'jin'bu'zhu 就连宝兄弟也禁不住
'jiu'lian'gu'niang'ye'mei'le 就连姑娘也没了
'jiu'lian'jin'rong'yi'shi'dang'ri'de'hao'peng'you 就连金荣亦是当日的好朋友

'jiu'lian'ping'er'wo'ye'ke'yi'xia'bao'de 就连平儿我也可以下保的
'jiu'lian'tai'tai'he'wo'ye'guo'bu'qu 就连太太和我也过不去

'jiu'liao'dao'yi'bei'zi 就潦倒一辈子

'jiu'qing'xian'sheng'jin'qu'kan'kan'er'fu 就请先生进去看看儿妇

'jiu'shi'guan'jia'ye'men'kan'zhe'ye'bu'xiang 就是管家爷们看着也不像

'jiu'shi'le'shou'ye'you'xian'de 就失了手也有限的

'jiu'shi'mai'de'bu'shi'zheng'jing'huo 就是买的不是正经货
'jiu'shi'na'ge'quan'de 就是那个劝的
'jiu'shi'na'jian'dong'xi'bu'de'hao'mu'tou 就是那件东西不得好木头
'jiu'shi'na'me'da'de'huo'bao'bei 就是那么大的活宝贝
'jiu'shi'na'san'bai'yin'zi'de'li'yin 就是那三百银子的利银
'jiu'shi'na'xie'zhi'shi'de'da'ya'tou 就是那些执事的大丫头
'jiu'shi'na'yi'fang'de'fu'mu 就是那一方的父母
'jiu'shi'nao'chu'shi'lai 就是闹出事来

'jiu'shi'ni'zhen'qing'le'shen'lai 就是你真请了神来

'jiu'shi'ping'bai'bu'ren'shi'de'miao'li 就是平白不认识的庙里
'jiu'shi'qu'dao'fu'shang 就是去到府上
'jiu'shi'que'le'jiao 就是瘸了脚

'jiu'shi'rong'ge'er 就是蓉哥儿

'jiu'shi'shi'lai'yang 就是十来样
