'wo'sui'zai'zhe'li'ting'ha 我虽在这里听哈
'wo'sui'zhe'lao'tai'tai 我随着老太太
'wo'sui'zhi'ni'ji'ming'bai 我虽知你极明白
'wo'sun'zi'zai'men'shang'chao'shang'ke'le'tou'le 我孙子在门上朝上磕了头了
'wo'suo'ren'de'zi 我所认的字
'wo'suo'yi'chen'bian'chu'qu'le 我所以趁便出去了
'wo'suo'yi'xiang'zhe'zi'ji'shang'xin 我所以想着自己伤心
'wo'tai'ju'qi'ni'lai 我抬举起你来
'wo'tan'tou'wang'qian'kan'le'yi'kan 我探头往前看了一看
'wo'tao'cu'zhi'er'zai'shan'shi'shang'jian'de 我掏促织儿在山石上拣的
'wo'tao'lao'zu'zong'de'shou'ba 我讨老祖宗的寿罢
'wo'te'lai'gei'ni'dao'xi'lai'le 我特来给你道喜来了
'wo'ti'er'wei'tai'tai'sheng'qi 我替二位太太生气
'wo'ti'ni'ba'tou'fa'long'yi'long 我替你把头发拢一拢
'wo'ti'ni'bao'chou 我替你报仇
'wo'ti'ni'bi'tou'ba 我替你篦头罢
'wo'ti'ni'chu'le'ba 我替你出了罢
'wo'ti'ni'da'ta 我替你打他
'wo'ti'ni'jie'men'er 我替你解闷儿
'wo'ti'ni'men'kan're'jiu'qu'ba 我替你们看热酒去罢
'wo'ti'ni'men'suan'chu'lai'le 我替你们算出来了
'wo'ti'ni'shou'shi'tuo'dang'le'jiu'fang'zai'zhei'li 我替你收拾妥当了就放在这里
'wo'ti'ni'tian'shang 我替你添上
'wo'ti'ni'wo'zhe 我替你渥着
'wo'ti'ni'yao'tie'guo'lai'hao'chao'yan'se'chi'de 我替你要铁锅来好炒颜色吃的
'wo'ti'shui'tao'qing'qu 我替谁讨情去
'wo'ti'ta'ji'mo 我替它寂寞
'wo'ti'ta'liang'ge'pei'bu'shi'ba 我替他两个赔不是罢
'wo'ti'ta'pei'ge'bu'shi'ye'shi'ying'gai'de 我替他赔个不是也是应该的
'wo'ti'yi'niang'chu'qi 我替姨娘出气
'wo'tian'tian'fen'xiang'li'bai 我天天焚香礼拜
'wo'tian'tian'zuo'zai'jing'li 我天天坐在井里
'wo'ting'bu'guan'de 我听不惯的
'wo'ting'jian'er'ye'zui'li'dou'huan'le'zi'yan 我听见二爷嘴里都换了字眼
'wo'ting'jian'lao'tai'tai'shuo 我听见老太太说
'wo'ting'jian'le'zhe'xin 我听见了这信
'wo'ting'jian'ming'yan'yi'gan'ren'shuo 我听见茗烟一干人说
'wo'ting'jian'ni'bing'le 我听见你病了
'wo'ting'jian'ni'men'da'jia'shang'yue 我听见你们大家赏月
'wo'ting'jian'ni'ti'ni'lao'ye'shuo'mei'lai'le 我听见你替你老爷说媒来了
'wo'ting'jian'shang'shang'xia'xia'chao'rang'le'zhe'xie'ri'zi 我听见上上下下吵嚷了这些日子
'wo'ting'jian'shi'bu'yi'de 我听见是不依的
'wo'ting'jian'zhe'hua 我听见这话
'wo'ting'jian'zuo'er'wan'shang'er'nai'nai'sheng'qi 我听见昨儿晚上二奶奶生气
'wo'ting'le'zhe'hua 我听了这话
'wo'ting'le'zhe'hua'cai'qu'de 我听了这话才去的
'wo'ting'ting'hai'you'shen'me'she'gen'jiao'le 我听听还有什么舌根嚼了
'wo'ting'ting'shi'shui'de'dong'jia 我听听是谁的东家
'wo'ting'zhe'liang'ju'hua 我听这两句话
'wo'ting'zhe'ye'shi'bu'hao 我听着也是不好
'wo'tong'gong'sheng'le'zhe'me'yi'ge'ke'kao'de'ren 我通共剩了这么一个可靠的人
'wo'tong'huo'ji'fan'le'huo'wu 我同伙计贩了货物
'wo'tong'ni'qu'le 我同你去了
'wo'tuo'le'yi'shang'zai'lai 我脱了衣裳再来
'wo'wang'bei'fu'li'qu'le 我往北府里去了
'wo'wang'da'nai'nai'na'li'qu'de 我往大奶奶那里去的
'wo'wang'na'qu'ne 我往哪去呢
'wo'wang'ri'jian'ta'zan'ni 我往日见她赞你
'wo'wei'ci'ye'dan'xin 我为此也耽心
'wo'wei'de'shi'ma'jin'lai'shen'si'bi'xian'da'jian 我为的是妈近来神思比先大减
'wo'wei'lu'xue'an'yi'da'ku 我为芦雪庵一大哭
'wo'wei'ni'lian'shang'guo'bu'qu 我为你脸上过不去
'wo'wei'shen'me'zhu'zhe'ta 我为什么助着他
'wo'wei'si'niang'chang'tai'xi 我为四娘长太息
'wo'wen'de'nv'er'shuo'lao'tai'tai'xin'xia'bu'da'shuang 我闻得女儿说老太太心下不大爽
'wo'wen'ge'er'yi'sheng 我问哥儿一声
'wo'wen'ta'shi'na'yi'wei'niang'niang 我问他是那一位娘娘
'wo'wu'bu'cong'ming 我无不从命
'wo'wu'bu'ling'ming 我无不领命
'wo'wu'li'jin'er'ye'you'bing'ren'jian'yao'ne 我屋里今儿也有病人煎药呢
'wo'wu'li'que'you'liang'pen 我屋里却有两盆
'wo'xi'xi'de'gao'su'le'ta 我细细的告诉了她
'wo'xi'xi'de'gao'su'ni 我细细的告诉你
'wo'xi'xi'hui'ming 我细细回明
'wo'xian'chang'yi'kuai'er 我先尝一块儿
'wo'xian'da'le'ni 我先打了你
'wo'xian'feng'mao'er'chu'bu'hao'le 我嫌风毛儿出不好了
'wo'xian'gei'lao'tai'tai'qing'an'qu 我先给老太太请安去
'wo'xian'guo'qu'hong'zhe'lao'tai'tai'fa'xiao 我先过去哄着老太太发笑
'wo'xian'guo'qu'le 我先过去了
'wo'xian'hui'guo'lao'tai'tai 我先回过老太太
'wo'xian'jiao'ni'men'si 我先叫你们死
'wo'xian'jin'jing'qu'an'zhi'le'wo'de'shi 我先进京去安置了我的事
'wo'xian'jing'ni'yi'zhong 我先敬你一钟
'wo'xian'na'zhu'le'shi'zhen'de 我现拿住了是真的
'wo'xian'qi'yi'ju'xian'cheng'de'su'yu'ba 我先起一句现成的俗语罢
'wo'xian'qiao'qiao'rong'ge'er'xi'fu 我先瞧瞧蓉哥儿媳妇
'wo'xian'qiao'wan'le'ni'men'de 我先瞧完了你们的
'wo'xian'yuan'yao'rang'ni'de 我先原要让你的
'wo'xian'zai'jia'li 我先在家里
'wo'xian'zhe'hai'yao'zuo'lao'tai'tai'wu'li'de'zhen'xian 我闲着还要作老太太屋里的针线
'wo'xian'zuo'yi'shou 我先作一首
'wo'xiang'bao'jie'jie'song'ni'de'yan'wo 我想宝姐姐送你的燕窝
'wo'xiang'bao'qin'sui'you'le'ren'jia 我想宝琴虽有了人家
'wo'xiang'bi'de'ni'qu'zuo'ge'jian'she'yu'shi 我想必得你去作个监社御史
'wo'xiang'chi'zi'ran'lai'yao 我想吃自然来要

'wo'xu'de'xian'li'chu'yi'ge'tou'xu'lai 我须得先理出一个头绪来
'wo'yao'dao'lian'er'nai'nai'jia'qiao'qiao'qu 我要到琏二奶奶家瞧瞧去

'wo'yao'zou'yi'zou 我要走一走

'wo'zhe'li'zheng'he'zhi'neng'er'shuo 我这里正和智能儿说
'wo'zhe'li'zheng'pei'wan'yao'ne 我这里正配丸药呢
'wo'zhe'li'zheng'yi'huo'shi'chu'yuan'zi'qu'le 我这里正疑惑是出园子去了
'wo'zhe'li'zi'ran'neng'gou'ping'xi'de 我这里自然能够平息的
'wo'zhe'ming'jiu'bu'bao 我这命就不保
'wo'zhe'ru'jin'shi'you'tian'shang'de'shen'xian'lai'zhao'qing 我这如今是有天上的神仙来召请
'wo'zhe'shui'bu'zhao 我这睡不着
'wo'zhe'wai'bian'mei'ge'ren 我这外边没个人
'wo'zhe'wu'li'you'de'mei'de 我这屋里有的没的
'wo'zhe'xia'chu'zai'bei'men'wai'tou 我这下处在北门外头
'wo'zhe'xie'er'nv 我这些儿女
'wo'zhe'yi'bei'zi'mo'shuo'shi 我这一辈子莫说是
'wo'zhe'yi'duan'gu'shi 我这一段故事
'wo'zhe'yi'jin'lai'le 我这一进来了
'wo'zhe'yi'jin'qu 我这一进去
'wo'zhe'yi'she'kai'de'you'bu'qiao'le 我这一社开得又不巧了
'wo'zhe'yi'tao'shi'quan'de 我这一套是全的
'wo'zhe'yi'zhang'pai'ding'zai'yi'ma'shou'li'kou'zhe'ne 我这一张牌定在姨妈手里扣着呢
'wo'zhe'zhi'bing'tou'de 我这枝并头的
'wo'zhen'ge'de'hai'deng'qian'zuo'shen'me 我真个的还等钱作什么
'wo'zheng'chou'mei'ge'bang'bi 我正愁没个膀臂
'wo'zheng'da'fa'ni'jie'jie'shu'tou 我正打发你姐姐梳头
'wo'zheng'hao'ming'jiang'chu'qing'li'lai 我正好明讲出情理来
'wo'zheng'jiao'ta'qu'ne 我正叫他去呢
'wo'zheng'jin'lai'yao'gao'su'ni 我正进来要告诉你
'wo'zheng'xiang'ge'se'dou'qi'le 我正想各色都齐了
'wo'zheng'xiang'yao'da'guan'si'ne 我正想要打官司呢
'wo'zheng'xiang'zhe'wen'ni 我正想着问你
'wo'zheng'yao'chi'wan'fan 我正要吃晚饭
'wo'zheng'yao'da'fa'ren'he'ni'lao'ye'shuo'qu 我正要打发人和你老爷说去
'wo'zheng'yao'gao'su'nai'nai'qu'ne 我正要告诉奶奶去呢
'wo'zheng'yao'gao'su'ta'de 我正要告诉她的
'wo'zheng'yao'he'ta'ta'yao'xie 我正要和他她要些
'wo'zheng'yao'qiao'qu 我正要瞧去
'wo'zheng'yao'shuo'ne 我正要说呢
'wo'zheng'yao'suan'suan'ming'jin'er'gai'shu'duo'shao'ne 我正要算算命今儿该输多少呢
'wo'zheng'yao'zhou'yi'shou 我正要诌一首
'wo'zheng'yao'zuo'ge'mei'ne 我正要作个媒呢
'wo'zheng'you'yi'ju'hua'yao'qing'yi'niang'shang'yi 我正有一句话要请姨娘商议
'wo'zheng'you'yi'men'hao'qin'shi 我正有一门好亲事
'wo'zheng'you'yi'shi 我正有一事
'wo'zheng'zai'zhei'li'quan'jie 我正在这里劝解
'wo'zhi'ai'chi'leng'de 我只爱吃冷的
'wo'zhi'ai'lu'fang'weng'de'shi 我只爱陆放翁的诗
'wo'zhi'bu'qu'jiu'wan'le 我只不去就完了
'wo'zhi'cheng'bao'le 我只呈报了
'wo'zhi'dang'bu'de'jian'ni'le 我只当不得见你了
'wo'zhi'dang'ni'shi'bu'pa'da'di 我只当你是不怕打的
'wo'zhi'dang'shi'shui'de'qin'qi 我只当是谁的亲戚

'wo'zhi'dang'shi'you'ke'lai'le 我只当是有客来了
'wo'zhi'dang'you'shen'me'hua'shuo 我只当有什么话说
'wo'zhi'dao'jin'er'zan'men'li'tou'da'pai'yan'yan 我知道今儿咱们里头大排筵宴
'wo'zhi'dao'mei'you 我知道没有
'wo'zhi'dao'ni'gan'le'shen'me'da'bu'shi 我知道你干了什么大不是
'wo'zhi'dao'ni'men'jin'er'you'you'shi'qing 我知道你们今儿又有事情
'wo'zhi'dao'ni'men'zhe'ji'ge'dou'shi'cai'zhu 我知道你们这几个都是财主
'wo'zhi'dao'ni'shi'lan'dai'gei'wo'dong'xi 我知道你是懒待给我东西
'wo'zhi'dao'ni'shi'zheng'jing'ren 我知道你是正经人
'wo'zhi'dao'ni'xin'li'de'yuan'gu 我知道你心里的缘故
'wo'zhi'dao'ni'ye'bu'ba'wo'men'fang'zai'yan'jing'li 我知道你也不把我们放在眼睛里
'wo'zhi'dao'ni'zhe'yi'lai 我知道你这一来
'wo'zhi'dao'shi'wo'de 我知道是我的
'wo'zhi'dao'ta'shou'le'wei'qu 我知道她受了委曲
'wo'zhi'dao'ta'zui'you'li'de 我知道他最有礼的
'wo'zhi'dao'wo'zhe'bing'bu'guo'shi'ai'ri'zi 我知道我这病不过是挨日子
'wo'zhi'dao'wo'zhe'bing'shi'bu'neng'hao'de'le 我知道我这病是不能好的了
'wo'zhi'dao'zan'men'jia'de'nan'nan'nv'nv'dou'shi 我知道咱们家的男男女女都是

'wo'zhi'dao'zhe'zhuo'zi'de'qu'xiang 我知道这镯子的去向

'wo'zhi'guan'gen'tai'tai 我只管跟太太

'wo'zhi'hua'quan'qu'le 我只划拳去了

'wo'zhi'pa'you'shang'zhe'yi'ge'hao'ren'de'ti'mian 我只怕又伤着一个好人的体面
'wo'zhi'qi'san'ju'ba 我只起三句罢

'wo'zuo'zhe'zhe'ge'wu'fang 我坐着这个无妨

'xia'ci'zai'bu'gan'de 下次再不敢的
'xia'de'bao'yu'han'xia'ru'yu 吓得宝玉汗下如雨
'xia'de'bu'gan'ze'sheng 吓得不敢则声
'xia'de'jia'rong'bao'zhe'tou 吓得贾蓉抱着头
'xia'de'jiang'you'yi'chi'duo'hou 下的将有一尺多厚
'xia'de'li'gui'mang'shuang'xi'gui'xia 吓得李贵忙双膝跪下
'xia'de'lian'mang'si'jin'zuan'zhu 吓得连忙死紧攥住
'xia'de'liang'ye'mei'he'yan'er 吓得两夜没合眼儿
'xia'de'man'wu'zhong'zi'di'dou'zheng'zheng'de'chi'wang 吓得满屋中子弟都怔怔的痴望
'xia'de'mang'pei'xiao'yang'dao 吓得忙陪笑央道
'xia'de'ta'nan'ren'mang'gui'xia'qiu'shuo 吓得她男人忙跪下求说
'xia'de'zhong'po'niang'de'hu'yi'sheng 吓得众婆娘的唿一声
'xia'de'zhong'ren'yi'yong'zheng'qu'shi'yu 吓的众人一拥争去拾玉
'xia'gai'ying'er'zhi'san'dian'jiu'ying'le 下该莺儿掷三点就赢了
'xia'ge'luo'fu'meng'wei'tong 霞隔罗浮梦未通
'xia'gu'su'pin'qing'jiao'xi 下姑苏聘请教习
'xia'hong'ye'jian'jian'zhi'le 下红也渐渐止了
'xia'jie'gui'ru'jia'qin'jie'wei'zhi'shou 下阶归入贾芹阶位之首
'xia'ju'jing'hai'wei'de 下句竟还未得
'xia'ju'ye'bu'hao 下句也不好
'xia'ju'you'liu'le 下句又溜了
'xia'lai'yi'yi'fa'fang 下来一一发放
'xia'lai'zi'qu'gou'si 下来自去构思
'xia'le'wo'yi'tiao 吓了我一跳
'xia'le'xie'hua'zai'wang'fu'ren'er'zhong 下了些话在王夫人耳中
'xia'le'yi'jing'bu'xiao 吓了一惊不小
'xia'le'yi'shen'leng'han 吓了一身冷汗
'xia'le'zhe'ban'ri'xue'zhu'er'le 下了这半日雪珠儿了
'xia'liu'mei'lian'de'dong'xi 下流没脸的东西
'xia'liu'qiu'nang'de 下流囚攮的
'xia'liu'ren'wu'zai'nei 下流人物在内
'xia'ma'bai'le'yin 下马拜了印
'xia'mian'bai'shi'tai'ji 下面白石台矶
'xia'mian'ban'lu'song'hua'sa'hua'lv'ling'ku'tui 下面半露松花撒花绿绫裤腿
'xia'mian'fen'qi'lie'mu 下面分畦列亩
'xia'mian'hai'you'ban'bi'yu'kong 下面还有半壁余空
'xia'mian'heng'tou'bian'shi'jia'rong'zhi'qi 下面横头便是贾蓉之妻
'xia'mian'hu'pi'shi 下面虎皮石
'xia'mian'lin'xue'bu'zhi 下面淋血不止
'xia'mian'lv'ling'dan'mo'jia'ku 下面绿绫弹墨夹裤
'xia'mian'shui'lv'qun'zi 下面水绿裙子
'xia'mian'suo'jie'zhu'zhe'shi'zu'guan'jue'bing'fang'ci 下面所皆注着始祖官爵并房次
'xia'mian'yi'ge'zhu'bi'hua'ya 下面一个朱笔花押
'xia'mian'yi'hang'xiao'zi 下面一行小字
'xia'mian'yi'liu'zuo'xia 下面一溜坐下
'xia'mian'you'yi'chi'zhao 下面有一池沼
'xia'mian'you'you'juan'de'xiao'zi'yi'ju'tang'shi 下面又有镌的小字一句唐诗
'xia'nai'nai'you'shi'mei'er'zi'de 夏奶奶又是没儿子的
'xia'ni'yi'tiao'de 吓你一跳的
'xia'po'zi'bian'jiang'qian'shi'yi'yi'de'shuo'le 夏婆子便将前事一一的说了
'xia'po'zi'ting'le 夏婆子听了
'xia'qian'si'shi'jia 下欠四十架
'xia'qiao'er'li'duo'lu 下桥二里多路
'xia'qu'xiang'pen'nei'xi'shou 下去向盆内洗手
'xia'ren'bu'zhi'hao'dai'ye'shi'chang'qing 下人不知好歹也是常情
'xia'san'deng'nv'zi'zhi'zhong'shen'ce'ji 下三等女子之终身册籍
'xia'sheng'de'san'bai'liang 下剩的三百两
'xia'sheng'de'wo'jiu'bu'zhi'dao'le 下剩的我就不知道了
'xia'sheng'er'wan'cun'zhe 下剩二万存着
'xia'si'jin'cui'le'yi'kou 下死劲啐了一口
'xia'ta'men'yi'tiao 吓他们一跳
'xia'tai'fu'da'fa'le'yi'ge'xiao'nei'jian'lai'shuo'hua 夏太府打发了一个小内监来说话
'xia'tian'kai'de'bai'he'hua'rui'shi'er'liang 夏天开的白荷花蕊十二两
'xia'tuo'zhe'ni'lao'zi'niang 下托着你老子娘
'xia'wu'tong'shi'zhi'qiao 下无通市之桥
'xia'wu'zi'mei'xiong'di'fu'chi 下无姊妹兄弟扶持
'xia'xue'bi'gua'bei'feng 下雪必刮北风
'xia'ye'ye'hai'shuo'le 夏爷爷还说了
'xia'ye'ye'yin'jin'er'ou'jian'yi'suo'fang'zi 夏爷爷因今儿偶见一所房子
'xia'yi'bei'de'xiang'ta'ta'su'ri'ci'ai 下一辈的想他她素日慈爱
'xia'yi'bu'neng'wei'da'xiong'da'e 下亦不能为大凶大恶
'xia'yi'ceng'you'you'xi'ren 下一层又有袭人
'xia'yi'ge'que'shi'ji'chuan'qian 下一格却是几串钱
'xia'yong'chang'mi'yi'qian'shi 下用常米一千石
'xia'you'jia'rong'kuang'zhu 下有贾蓉匡助
'xia'ze'bao'chai'he'tan'chun'dui'le'dian'zi 下则宝钗和探春对了点子
'xia'ze'cong'yu'zhe 下则从玉者
'xia'ze'luo'hua'fu'dang 下则落花浮荡
'xia'ze'shi'tuo'zu'zong'de'fu 下则是托祖宗的福
'xia'zhe'fei'cui'sa'hua'yang'zhou'qun 下着翡翠撒花洋绉裙
'xia'zhi'mai'mai'ren 下至买卖人
'xia'zhi'zhe'lian'er'ye 辖治着琏二爷
'xian'ba'er'jie'jie'zhi'fu 先把二姐姐制伏

'xian'bi'zhi'liang'zhi'xi 羡彼之良质兮

'xian'da'fa'wo'qiao'ni'lao'ren'jia'lai'le 先打发我瞧你老人家来了

'xian'di'yu'hui'shi'de'xi'fu 先递与回事的媳妇

'xian'jie'le'ni'de'pi 先揭了你的皮
'xian'jin'bei'jing'wang'shui'rong'nian'wei'ruo'guan 现今北静王水溶年未弱冠

'xian'jiu'hu'huang'qi'lai 先就唬慌起来

'xian'qian'shuo'ni'mei'jin'yi 先前说你没进益

'xian'qing'nai'nai'yi'ge'shi'xia 先请奶奶一个示下
'xian'qing'ru'da'guan'yuan'nei'jia'yin'tang 先请入大观园内嘉荫堂
'xian'qu'le'ou'cuan'jin'qing'shou 闲取乐偶攒金庆寿
'xian'qu'zhao'pei'fang'zhou'rui 先去找陪房周瑞
'xian'ren'gong'bu'yuan'wai'lang 现任工部员外郎
'xian'ren'ying'shan'lang 现任营缮郎
'xian'ru'xue'yi'ma'shi'zhong'lai 先入薛姨妈室中来
'xian'shan'bao'shui'jian'lai'jing 衔山抱水建来精
'xian'shang'yu'ren'lou 先上玉人楼
'xian'she'chu'zhe'fa'zi'lai 先设出这法子来
'xian'she'yi'lun'lai 先设议论来
'xian'sheng'fang'shen'shou'an'zai'you'shou'mai'shang 先生方伸手按在右手脉上

'xian'sheng'kan'zhe'mai'xi 先生看这脉息
'xian'sheng'shi'zai'gao'ming 先生实在高明
'xian'sheng'ting'le'dao 先生听了道
'xian'shi'ba'shu'li'yi'li'yu'bei'zhe 闲时把书理一理预备着
'xian'shi'hai'you'ren'ti'qi'lai'chen'yuan 闲时还有人提起来趁愿
'xian'shi'hai'zha'zheng'de'zhu 先时还扎挣得住
'xian'shi'jin'nei'qu'he'you'shi'he'ya'huan 先是进内去和尤氏和丫鬟
'xian'shi'kuan'zhen'man'yin 先是款斟漫饮
'xian'shi'la'yue'tian'qi 现是腊月天气
'xian'shi'lao'jie'er'liang'ge'zai'jia 先时老姐儿两个在家
'xian'shi'na'nv'ke'yi'qi'yi'qi'xing'li 先是那女客一起一起行礼
'xian'shi'ni'zhi'yi'wo 先时你只疑我
'xian'shi'qin'zhong'bu'ken 先是秦钟不肯
'xian'shi'ren'kou'duo 先时人口多
'xian'shi'shi'feng'tou'zai'shuo 先试试风头再说
'xian'shi'shuo'xie'yun'shan'wu'hai 先是说些云山雾海
'xian'shi'ta'er'ren'bu'ken 先是他二人不肯
'xian'shi'wo'fa'shi'du'zhou 先是我发誓赌咒
'xian'shi'wo'zuo'de'ne 现是我作的呢
'xian'shi'xian'bao'zai'ren'yan'li 现世现报在人眼里
'xian'shi'xian'ming'fa'hao 仙师仙名法号
'xian'shi'xun'meng 先是寻梦
'xian'shi'yuan'nei'ci'hou'de'ren 现是园内伺候的人
'xian'shi'zai'feng'jie'hui'xia'ban'shi'de'lai'le 现是在凤姐麾下办事的来了
'xian'shi'zhe'po'zi'bai'ban'bu'ken 先是这婆子百般不肯
'xian'shi'zhi'dai'zhe'xiao'ye'men'chu'men'zi'jiu'wan'le 闲时只带着小爷们出门子就完了
'xian'shou'zai'zhang'fang'li'le 先收在帐房里了
'xian'tai'yuan'luo'men'kong'yan 闲苔院落门空掩
'xian'ting'bi'deng'zhi'yu'bu'ken'ting'qi'zi'you'zhe 先听彼等之语不肯听其自由者
'xian'ting'qu'kan'wu'yu'xue 闲庭曲槛无余雪
'xian'tong'kai'huo'dun'cha 现通开火顿茶
'xian'wei'xian'ren'sao'luo'hua 闲为仙人扫落花
'xian'wen'de'shuo'zi 先闻得说字
'xian'wo'jie'jie'bu'shi'hai'zhe'bing'si'le 先我姐姐不是害这病死了
'xian'xi'ren'jiao'chen'zhen'bao'yu 贤袭人娇嗔箴宝玉
'xian'xi'ren'you'xin'sheng'xian'xi 嫌隙人有心生嫌隙
'xian'xi'zhi'hui'zhi'zhi 现袭指挥之职
'xian'xie'le'jia'rong'zhi'qi'er'ren'lai'mian'qing 先携了贾蓉之妻二人来面请
'xian'xing'guo'li'bi 先行国礼毕
'xian'xu'ta'jin'lai 先许她进来
'xian'yan'xian'yu'de'hai'zhi'luan'shuo 涎言涎语的还只乱说
'xian'yan'xian'yu'de'luan'nao 闲言闲语的乱闹
'xian'yao'da'ting'gu'niang'shi'zheng'chu'shu'chu 先要打听姑娘是正出庶出
'xian'yao'jie'wo'men'de'pi'ne 先要揭我们的皮呢
'xian'yao'yi'lun'ren'jia'de'hao'dai 先要议论人家的好歹
'xian'yao'zhi'chu'chu'xi 纤腰之楚楚兮
'xian'ye'you'ya'tou 现也有丫头
'xian'yi'bi'jia'shang 先以彼家上
'xian'yi'ge'zen'me'yang 先一个怎么样
'xian'yi'ping'gan'jian'wei'wei'yao 先以平肝健胃为要
'xian'yin'xian'xiao'cai'de 现因贤孝才德
'xian'yong'wen'shui'shuan'le'yi'shuan 先用温水涮了一涮
'xian'you'de'san'ge'ye'bu'cuo 现有的三个也不错
'xian'you'le'zang'zheng 现有了赃证
'xian'you'yi'ju'shuo 现有一句说
'xian'you'zhe'yang'shi'xian'zai'ci 现有这样诗仙在此
'xian'yu'bao'chai'kan 先与宝钗看
'xian'yu'bu'xiao'zhe 贤愚不肖者
'xian'yu'jia'mu'qing'an 先与贾母请安
'xian'yu'jin'gui'shang'yi 先与金桂商议

'xian'zai'bing'bu'hou'que'ti'sheng 现在兵部候缺题升

'xiang'yun'dou'dian'tou'xiao'dao 湘云都点头笑道

'xiang'yun'er'ren'ye'dou'xiao'quan 湘云二人也都笑劝
'xiang'yun'er'ren'zhen'le'yi'xiao'bei'jiu 湘云二人斟了一小杯酒
'xiang'yun'fang'yu'lian'shi 湘云方欲联时

'xue'yi'ma'yin'dao 薛姨妈因道

'ye'bie'dai'lei'le'wu'gu'zhi'ren'shang'ti'mian 也别带累了无辜之人伤体面
'ye'bie'guai'lao'tai'tai 也别怪老太太
'ye'bie'yuan'le'hao'ren 也别冤了好人
'ye'bie'zi'ji'kan'qing'le 也别自己看轻了
'ye'bing'bu'cun'duo 也并不忖度
'ye'bing'bu'shi'er'ye'you'yi 也并不是二爷有意
'ye'bing'fei'jin'ri'le 也并非今日了
'ye'bing'mei'ge'gei'qian'de 也并没个给钱的

'ye'bing'wu'wei'ju'can'kui'zhi'yi 也并无畏惧惭愧之意
'ye'bu'bai'luo'shen'zhi'xiang 也不拜洛神之像
'ye'bu'bai'yi'bai'jie'fang'lin'she'qu 也不拜一拜街坊邻舍去
'ye'bu'bi'deng'ni'er'ye'hui'lai'zai'shang'liang'le 也不必等你二爷回来再商量了
'ye'bu'bi'duo'shuo 也不必多说
'ye'bu'bi'gei'wo'song'shen'me'dong'xi'lai 也不必给我送什么东西来

'ye'duan'bu'gan'xian'qu'qin'de 也断不敢先娶亲的

'ye'duan'bu'neng'sheng'se 也断不能生色
'ye'duan'bu'rong'ta'diao'zuan'qu'le 也断不容他刁钻去了
'ye'fan'bu'shang'xiang'zhe'ta'dao'zhe'ge'di 也犯不上向着他到这个地
'ye'fang'ai'bu'zhao'ni'shen'me 也妨碍不着你什么
'ye'fang'zai'lao'tai'tai'de'na'yi'chu'ba 也放在老太太的那一处罢

'yi'bu'bi'ru'ci'xian'she'zhuan'ju 亦不必如此先设馔具

'yi'bu'bu'gan'duo'zou 一步不敢多走

'yi'bu'ceng'dui'nu'shuo 亦不曾对奴说
'yi'bu'dang'zi'zhu'jiao'liang 亦不当锱铢较量
'yi'bu'de'ya'dao'zhe'yi'zhong'feng'liu'qu'de 亦不得压倒这一种风流去的
'yi'bu'gan'jiu'li 亦不敢久立
'yi'bu'guo'shi'lu'qi'shi 亦不过实录其事
'yi'bu'guo'xu'yan'yan'mu'er'yi 亦不过虚掩眼目而已
'yi'bu'jin'fa'yu'zhang'ju 亦不禁发于章句
'yi'bu'jin'li'mian'qu 亦不进里面去
'yi'bu'ke'dao'xi'qian'ren'de'tao'tou 亦不可蹈袭前人的套头
'yi'bu'ke'tai'cao'shuai 亦不可太草率
'yi'bu'ke'tai'jian 亦不可太俭

'yi'ying'dou'shi'quan'le'de 一应都是全了的
'yi'ying'dou'shi'xing'fu'ren 一应都是邢夫人
'yi'ying'dou'zan'ling'li'wan'xie'li 一应都暂令李纨协理
'yi'ying'jia'zhong'da'xiao'shi'wu 一应家中大小事务
'yi'ying'jing'ji'shi'shi 一应经济世事
'yi'ying'ri'fei'gong'ji 一应日费供给
'yi'ying'tiao'suo'er'ye'zuo'de 一应调唆二爷做的
'yi'ying'tu'yi'pan'chan 一应土仪盘缠
'yi'ying'wo'men'zhe'xie'ren 一应我们这些人
'yi'ying'xia'mian'nong'cai 一应下面弄菜
'yi'ying'xie'guo'fa 一应谢过乏
'yi'ying'yao'er'yin'shi 一应药饵饮食
'yi'ying'zhang'luo'kuan'dai 一应张罗款待
'yi'ying'zhi'shi'chen'she 一应执事陈设
'yi'you'duo'ren'zai'ci'ci'hou 已有多人在此伺候
'yi'you'er'si'liu'shang'cuo'le'de 亦有二四六上错了的
'yi'you'le'yi'ge'xian'yu'zhi'er 已有了一个衔玉之儿
'yi'you'wu'xian'feng'qing'le 已有无限风情了
'yi'yu'bei'xia'xi'nen'de'ye'ji 已预备下希嫩的野鸡
'yi'yu'chuo'dong'le'feng'jie'he'jia'lian 一语戳动了凤姐和贾琏
'yi'yu'dao'ba'jia'lian'shuo'mei'le'hua 一语倒把贾琏说没了话
'yi'yu'dao'fang'guan 意欲到芳官
'yi'yu'dao'na'cun'si'zhong'gu'yin'san'bei 意欲到那村肆中沽饮三杯
'yi'yu'gao'su'wang'fu'ren 意欲告诉王夫人
'yi'yu'hai'qu'kan'xi'qu'le 意欲还去看戏取乐
'yi'yu'huan'qu'jin'jing'zhi'yi 意欲唤取进京之意
'yi'yu'hui'le'jia'mu'qu'wang'hou'qin'zhong 意欲回了贾母去望候秦钟
'yi'yu'mai'le'jiu'jin'jing'de 意欲买了就进京的
'yi'yu'qu'wang'ta'yi'wang 意欲去望她一望
'yi'yu'shang'jian'na'cun'ye'feng'guang 意欲赏鉴那村野风光
'yi'yu'ti'xing'le'feng'jie'er 一语提醒了凤姐儿
'yi'yu'ti'xing'le'na'ya'tou 一语提醒了那丫头
'yi'yu'ti'xing'le'yi'ge 一语提醒了一个
'yi'yu'ti'xing'le'zhe'guan'jia'huo'de'xi'fu 一语提醒了这管家伙的媳妇
'yi'yu'wen'shi'chuan'qi 意欲问世传奇
'yi'yu'wen'ta'men'lai'li 意欲问他们来历
'yi'yu'xia'fan'zao'li'huan'yuan 意欲下凡造历幻缘
'yi'yu'ye'ti'yi'lian 意欲也题一联
'yi'yu'zai'xie'liang'feng'jian'shu 意欲再写两封荐书
'yi'yu'zan'song'wo'qu 亦欲暂送我去
'yi'yue'de'jia'ye'tai'shao 一月的假也太少
'yi'yue'er'liang'yin'zi'hai'bu'gou'shi 一月二两银子还不够使
'yi'yue'gan'bu'shang'yi'yue 一月赶不上一月
'yi'yue'xu'jin'nei'xing'shi'yi'ci 一月许进内省视一次
'yi'yue'you'you'ni'de'fen'li'wai 一月又有你的分例外
'yi'zai'ci'jing'ju'zhu 亦在此境居住
'yi'zai'dang'you'you 一载荡悠悠
'yi'zai'fu'huang'liang 一载赴黄粱
'yi'zai'jing'huan'xian'zi'an'qian'gua'le'hao 已在警幻仙子案前挂了号
'yi'zai'si'zhong'zhu'su 亦在寺中住宿
'yi'zao'jiu'wang'zhei'li'gan'lie 一早就往这里赶咧
'yi'ze'bao'de'zhu'mei'you'bie'de'shi 一则保得住没有别的事
'yi'ze'bao'yu'nian'ji'shang'xiao 一则宝玉年纪尚小
'yi'ze'feng'pu'le'ye'shi'you'de 一则风扑了也是有的
'yi'ze'gei'wo'ma'zheng'kou'qi 一则给我妈争口气
'yi'ze'jia'huan'xiu'kou'nan'kai 一则贾环羞口难开
'yi'ze'jia'xue'li'zi'di'tai'duo 一则家学里子弟太多
'yi'ze'jie'jie'ni'de'shou 一则借借你的寿
'yi'ze'lao'ye'dao'jia'bu'sheng'qi 一则老爷到家不生气
'yi'ze'le'chu'yue'chu'er'ri 已择了出月初二日
'yi'ze'pa'cheng'le'feng'ya'tou'de'lian 一则怕逞了凤丫头的脸
'yi'ze'quan'xun'zang'zhi'li 一则全殉葬之礼
'yi'ze'shi'le'zan'men'de'gui'ge'mian'mu 一则失了咱们的闺阁面目

'yi'ze'ta'men'dou'hui'xi 一则他们都会戏
'yi'ze'ta'men'ge'you'ying'yun 一则他们各有营运
'yi'ze'ta'xian'wo'bing 一则他现卧病
'yi'ze'tan'duo'jiao'bu'lan 一则贪多嚼不烂
'yi'ze'wei'qing'wen'shi'you'ke 一则为晴雯事犹可
'yi'ze'xian'ta'xian'liang'ming'er 一则显她贤良名儿
'yi'ze'yuan'yang'sui'ying'ming'shi'ta'si'qing 一则鸳鸯虽应名是她私情
'yi'ze'yuan'zi'you'zhuan'ding'zhi'ren'xiu'li'hua'mu 一则园子有专定之人修理花木
'yi'ze'zhang'luo'zhang'luo'mai'mai 一则张罗张罗买卖
'yi'ze'zu'da'ren'duo 一则族大人多
'yi'zha'zheng'guo'lai 亦扎挣过来
'yi'zhan'zai'zhan'bu'cheng'gong 一战再战不成功
'yi'zhe'qin'qi'zhi'shi 倚着亲戚之势
'yi'zhi'dao'le'er'jie'men'qian'kou'men 一直到了二姐门前扣门

'yi'zhi'dao'xiang'cun'zhong 已至稻香村中
'yi'zhi'dao'yi'hong'yuan'zhong 一直到怡红院中
'yi'zhi'ge'jiu'dian 一掷个九点
'yi'zhi'gen'song'wang'fu'ren'dao'qin'fang'ting 一直跟送王夫人到沁芳亭
'yi'zhi'hua'ji'shang'yun 以至画记上云
'yi'zhi'jia'xia'da'da'xiao'xiao 以至家下大大小小
'yi'zhi'jin'ri'zhi'shi 以志今日之事
'yi'zhi'man'zhi'pan'an 以致满纸潘安
'yi'zhi'mian'hua'wo'liu 以至眠花卧柳
'yi'zhi'ning'fu'men'shou 已至宁府门首
'yi'zhi'ou'si'ren'ming 以至殴死人命

'yi'zhi'qi'zhong'yi 以志其忠义
'yi'zhi'ru'ci'xue'li'chao'nao 以致如此学里吵闹
'yi'zhi'shi'ri'dou'zhang'guo 以至十日都长过
'yi'zhi'shi'wo'hao'mian 以致嗜卧好眠
'yi'zhi'shou'que'shen'zai'he'nei 一只手却伸在盒内
'yi'zhi'song'bao'yu'zhi'men'qian 一直送宝玉至门前
'yi'zhi'wang'yuan'zhong'zou'lai 一直往园中走来
'yi'zhi'yu'da'xiao'de'ya'tou'men'gen'qian 以至于大小的丫头们跟前
'yi'zhi'yu'ji'xiao'zuo'cu'huo'de'xiao'ya'tou'men 以至于极小作粗活的小丫头们

'yi'zu'tang'se'le 亦足搪塞了

'yin'ba'shuo'cuo'le'jiu'ling'qi 因把说错了酒令起

'yin'chan'qi'tu'tun 银蟾气吐吞
'yin'chang'gen'lai'mo'mo'jin'lai 因常跟赖嬷嬷进来
'yin'chang'yu'bao'yu 因常与宝玉
'yin'chen'zhe'jiu'xing 因趁着酒兴
'yin'cheng'dou'kou'cai'you'yan 吟成荳蔻才犹艳
'yin'chuan'qi'tong'shi'ren'deng'shuo'dao 因传齐同事人等说道
'yin'ci'bai'ban'qiu'gao'gui'pan 因此百般求告鬼判
'yin'ci'bao'yu'xin'zhong'chang'ran'ru'you'suo'shi 因此宝玉心中怅然如有所失
'yin'ci'bian'da'bu'xi'yue 因此便大不喜悦
'yin'ci'bian'huan'le'ji'ge'xiao'ya'tou'lai'wen 因此便唤了几个小丫头来问
'yin'ci'bian'jiu'ci'yi'jia'shuo'lai 因此便就此一家说来
'yin'ci'bian'ming'xiao'si'lai'huan'ta 因此便命小厮来唤他
'yin'ci'bian'shang'xin 因此便伤心
'yin'ci'bian'zhe'yan'guo'le 因此便遮掩过了
'yin'ci'bing'bu'zai'yi 因此并不在意
'yin'ci'bu'bu'liu'xin 因此步步留心
'yin'ci'bu'ming'ta'qu 因此不命他去
'yin'ci'bu'yi'wang'wei'zi'ju 因此不以王位自居
'yin'ci'cai'you'zhe'ge'hun'hao 因此才有这个浑号
'yin'ci'chu'fang'yu'bu'duo 因此处房宇不多

'yin'ci'de'kong'ye'you'qu'hui'du'de 因此得空也有去会赌的
'yin'ci'dou'bu'zai'yi 因此都不在意
'yin'ci'dou'huan'ta 因此都唤他
'yin'ci'er'ren'geng'jia'qin'hou 因此二人更加亲厚
'yin'ci'er'wei'lao'sheng'ren'you'xia'zhi'yi 因此二位老圣人又下旨意
'yin'ci'fa'yi'hui'hen 因此发一回恨
'yin'ci'fen'fu'ta'lao'zi'lian'bai'san'ri'jiu 因此吩咐他老子连摆三日酒

'yin'ci'liang'chu'xia'ren'wu'le'zheng'jing'tou'xu 因此两处下人无了正经头绪
'yin'ci'liu'lao'lao'kan'bu'guo 因此刘姥姥看不过
'yin'ci'luo'xia'lei 因此落下泪
'yin'ci'mang'de'feng'jie'cha'fan'ye'mei'gong'fu'chi'de 因此忙得凤姐茶饭也没工夫吃得

'yin'ci'pin'ze'le'er'nian 因此品择了二年

'yin'ci'qin'zhong'chen'ci'he'xiang'lian'ji'mei'shi'an'hao 因此秦钟趁此和香怜挤眉使暗号

'yin'ci'shang'wei'yi'ji'zai'yan'shi'yi'shi 因此尚未议及再延师一事
'yin'ci'shi'fen'huan'xi 因此十分欢喜
'yin'ci'shi'she'zhi'ri 因此诗社之日
'yin'ci'shi'tian'qi'shang'chang 因此时天气尚长
'yin'ci'shi'xiang'yun'zhi'zheng'yi'yu 因此时湘云之症已愈
'yin'ci'shi'xue'yi'ma 因此时薛姨妈
'yin'ci'shu'wo'jing'xian'yao'gao'bie'le 因此恕我竟先要告别了
'yin'ci'shuo'yi'you'le'ren'jia 因此说已有了人家
'yin'ci'ta'xin'zhong'pan'guo'men'de'ri'zi 因此她心中盼过门的日子
'yin'ci'ta'zhi'shuo'mei'you'zhe'ge 因此她只说没有这个
'yin'ci'wei'mian'jiao'yang'tai'guo 因此未免娇养太过
'yin'ci'wo'fu'qin'yang'fan'le'yi'wei'tong'shi'guan 因此我父亲央烦了一位通事官
'yin'ci'wo'jiu'ci'le'guan'chu'lai 因此我就辞了馆出来
'yin'ci'wo'xin'zhong'bu'zi'zai 因此我心中不自在

'yin'ci'xin'zhong'bu'zi'zai 因此心中不自在
'yin'ci'xin'zhong'da'bu'le'ye 因此心中大不乐业
'yin'ci'xue'yi'ma'ji'ri'dao'shu'fang 因此薛姨妈即日到书房
'yin'ci'xun'xie'shi'qing'zi'ji'hun'zhe 因此寻些事情自己混着
'yin'ci'ye'bu'ba'zhong'ren'fang'zai'yan'li 因此也不把众人放在眼里
'yin'ci'ye'bu'cha'qi'yuan'wei 因此也不察其原委
'yin'ci'you'dai'yu'cun 因此优待雨村
'yin'ci'you'fa'le'pi'xing 因此又发了癖性
'yin'ci'you'huan'le'zhe'ming 因此又唤了这名
'yin'ci'you'jiao'ta'zuo 因此又叫她作
'yin'ci'you'kui'you'qi 因此又愧又气
'yin'ci'you'zi'hui'mang'zhuang 因此又自悔莽撞
'yin'ci'yue'tian'le'jiao'zao 因此越添了焦燥
'yin'ci'zai'wai'duo'le'ji'ri 因此在外躲了几日
'yin'ci'zhe'shi'di'yi'jian'da'de 因此这是第一件大的
'yin'ci'zhi'gu'wan 因此只顾玩
'yin'ci'zhi'zhuang'bu'zhi'dao 因此只装不知道
'yin'ci'zhong'po'zi'wu'bu'han'yuan 因此众婆子无不含怨
'yin'ci'zhong'ren'chao'ta'yue'fa'dai'le 因此众人嘲他越发呆了
'yin'ci'zhou'ye'ti'ku 因此昼夜啼哭
'yin'ci'zi'ji'zhi'zhuang'zuo'bu'nai'fan 因此自己只装作不耐烦
'yin'ci'zu'ren'shui'gan'lai'chu'ni'yu'ta 因此族人谁敢来触逆于他
'yin'ci'zu'zhong'sui 因此族众虽
'yin'cong'bu'ceng'jian'jia'shuo'guo'xiao'hua 因从不曾见贾说过笑话
'yin'da'jia'hun'lai 因大家混赖
'yin'da'jia'song'le'ta'dao'yi'shi'ting'shang 因大家送了她到议事厅上
'yin'dang'jin'long'en'sheng'de 因当今隆恩盛德
'yin'dang'nian'fu'qin'zai'jing'shi 因当年父亲在京时
'yin'dang'nian'wu'er'nv 因当年无儿女
'yin'dang'zhe'ren'wei'ji'xi'wen'jia'lian 因当着人未及细问贾琏
'yin'dao'xi'nan'shang 引到西南上
'yin'de'he'yuan'zhong'ren'fan'ting'jian'wu'bu'xiao'dao 引得合园中人凡听见无不笑倒
'yin'de'jia'mu'deng'dou'xiao'le 引得贾母等都笑了
'yin'de'jia'mu'wen'shuo 引得贾母问说
'yin'de'jia'mu'xiao'le 引的贾母笑了
'yin'de'jia'mu'zhong'ren'xiao'ge'bu'zhu 引的贾母众人笑个不住
'yin'de'ying'er'san'ge'ren'fan'dou'xiao'le 引得莺儿三个人反都笑了
'yin'de'zhong'ren'xiao'shuo 引得众人笑说
'yin'di'fang'zhai'xia 因地方窄狭
'yin'dian'tou'tan'dao 因点头叹道
'yin'die'xian'xia'lai 银蝶先下来
'yin'die'zuo'zai'che'yan'shang 银蝶坐在车沿上
'yin'ding'le'yi'hui 因定了一会
'yin'diu'le'yi'jian'dong'xi 因丢了一件东西
'yin'dong'bian'ning'fu'zhong'hua'yuan'nei'mei'hua'sheng'kai 因东边宁府中花园内梅花盛开
'yin'dong'duo'ren'lai'kan'wen 引动多人来看问
'yin'dou'xiang'wang'fu'ren'dao 因都向王夫人道
'yin'du'qi'hui'fang'ku'qi 因赌气回房哭泣
'yin'er'bu'ru'men'shi 因而步入门时
'yin'er'cheng'ji'bai'ban'liao'bo 因而乘机百般撩拨
'yin'er'fu'zhi'men'xiang'ge'mei'you'yi'jian'zhi'lu 因二府之门相隔没有一箭之路
'yin'er'he'yi'tang'zai'kang'shang 因而和衣躺在炕上
'yin'er'hui'zhi'fang'zhong 因而回至房中
'yin'er'ji'li'quan'zhi 因而极力劝止
'yin'er'jia'she'yi'bei'de'ge'zi'shang'le'che'jiao 因而贾赦一辈的各自上了车轿
'yin'er'jie'le'cha 因而接了茶
'yin'er'kou'zhan'wu'yan'yi'lv'yun 因而口占五言一律云
'yin'er'li'wai'xia'ren'dou'an'zhong'bao'yuan'shuo 因而里外下人都暗中抱怨说
'yin'er'nai'zu'mu'bian'xian'ai'ru'zhen'bao 因而乃祖母便先爱如珍宝
'yin'er'sui'chuan'qi'shang'ye'ren'deng'lai 因而遂传起上夜人等来
'yin'er'tui'qu'shou'shang'de'zhuo'zi 因而褪去手上的镯子
'yin'er'ye'zhi'de'you'ta'men'nao'qu'le 因而也只得由他们闹去了

'you'meng'zhu'zi'de'en'dian 又蒙主子的恩典
'you'ming'ba'zhe'li'suo'you'de'ya'tou'men'dou'jiao'lai 又命把这里所有的丫头们都叫来
'you'ming'bao'shang'yi'jian'xue'gua'zi 又命包上一件雪褂子
'you'ming'bao'yu'bei'guo'lian'qu 又命宝玉背过脸去
'you'ming'duo'chuan'liang'jian'yi'fu 又命多穿两件衣服
'you'ming'hu'po'zuo'zai'ta'shang 又命琥珀坐在榻上
'you'ming'jia'ren'qu'dui'ci 又命家人去对词
'you'ming'jia'rong'dao 又命贾蓉道
'you'ming'jiang'ge'se'guo'zi 又命将各色果子
'you'ming'jiang'jiu'qu'jing'xing'sha'jiu 又命将酒去敬邢傻舅
'you'ming'jiang'xun'long'tai'zhi'nuan'ge'qian 又命将熏笼抬至暖阁前
'you'ming'jiang'zhou'wei'de'duan'fa'ti'le'qu 又命将周围的短发剃了去
'you'ming'jiu'you'bian'lian'ju'bu'bi'zhai'qu 又命旧有匾联俱不必摘去
'you'ming'le'yi'ge'lao'po'zi 又命了一个老婆子
'you'ming'nei'ren'qu'jie'shi'ta 又命内人去解释她
'you'ming'po'zi'jiang'xie'guo'zi 又命婆子将些果子
'you'ming'ren'che'qu'can'xi 又命人撤去残席
'you'ming'ren'dai'qu'jian'wang'fu'ren'deng 又命人带去见王夫人等
'you'ming'ren'qu'he'wang'zi'teng'shuo'le 又命人去和王子腾说了
'you'ming'ren'qu'jiao'le'ping'er'lai 又命人去叫了平儿来
'you'ming'rui'guan'xian'song'le'xiao'qu'zai'lai 又命蕊官先送了硝去再来
'you'ming'ta'bu'yao'gao'su'ren 又命他不要告诉人
'you'ming'ta'ge'ge'qu 又命她哥哥去
'you'ming'xiang'ling'jiang'ta'wu'li'ye'shou'shi'yan'jin 又命香菱将他屋里也收拾严紧
'you'ming'xiao'si'men'qu'chai'ta'de'fang'zi 又命小厮们去拆他的房子
'you'ming'xiao'yan'ye'bo'le'ban'wan'fan 又命小燕也拨了半碗饭
'you'ming'xing'fu'ren'kuai'qu 又命邢夫人快去
'you'ming'yuan'yang'lai 又命鸳鸯来
'you'ming'zhang'sun'jia'rui'zan'qie'guan'li 又命长孙贾瑞暂且管理
'you'ming'zhen'yi'da'bei're'jiu 又命斟一大杯热酒
'you'ming'zhi'shi'ren'dai'ling'tai'jian'men'qu'chi'jiu'fan 又命执事人带领太监们去吃酒饭
'you'mo'le'yi'mo 又摸了一摸
'you'mo'le'yi'mo'tou 又摸了一摸头
'you'mo'suo'dai'yu 又摩娑黛玉
'you'na'ge'fu'qi 有那个福气
'you'na'ge'kao'bei'dian'zhe'xie 又拿个靠背垫着些
'you'na'hua'tiao'suo'ni'men'liang'ge 又拿话挑唆你们两个
'you'na'jia'ye'jian'nan'an'fen'de 有那家业艰难安分的
'you'na'le'san'bai'yin'zi'yu'ta'qu'da'dian 又拿了三百银子与他去打点
'you'na'shang'pai'chang'you'qian'shi'de 有那尚排场有钱势的
'you'na'wo'dang'ge'ren 又拿我当个人
'you'na'wo'men'lai'xing'pi'le 又拿我们来醒脾了
'you'na'xiao'ya'tou'men'jian'zhao 有那小丫头们拣着
'you'na'xie'shi'jia'zi'di'bai'shou'de 有那些世家子弟拜寿的
'you'na'yi'gan'han'lin'wen'mo'xian'sheng'men 有那一干翰林文魔先生们
'you'na'zhe'ou'zi'xiao'hu 又拿着沤子小壶
'you'na'zhi'lian'pen'zhong'xi'le'liang'shang 又拿至脸盆中洗了晾上
'you'nai'bu'de'qing'liang'jing'kuang 又耐不得清凉景况
'you'nan'wei'liang'wei'yi'niang'shou'wei'qu 又难为两位姨娘受委屈
'you'ni'ai'yong'na'ji'ge'zi'qu 由你爱用那几个字去
'you'ni'ban'qu'ba 由你办去罢
'you'ni'dao'de'yi'ban 有你到的一半
'you'ni'men'yi'ri 有你们一日
'you'ni'zai'zhang'luo'bie'de'qu 由你再张罗别的去
'you'ni'zhe'ge'ge 有你这个哥
'you'nian'le'na'shang'tou'de'zi 又念了那上头的字
'you'nian'le'na'zhi'fu'qi'hui'zai'shou'nei 又拈了那枝夫妻蕙在手内
'you'nian'yu'ta'ting 又念与她听
'you'nian'zi'ji'de'liang'bian 又念自己的两遍
'you'nong'ge'zei'lai'gei'wo'men'kan 又弄个贼来给我们看
'you'nv'er'zhi'feng 有女儿之风
'you'nv'er'zhi'tai 有女儿之态
'you'pa'bao'yu'fan'nao 又怕宝玉烦恼
'you'pa'bao'yu'zhao'ji 又怕宝玉着急
'you'pa'dai'yu'nao'ta 又怕黛玉恼他
'you'pa'gua'wu'zhe'da'dao'qie'de'guan'si 又怕挂误着打盗窃的官司
'you'pa'jia'lian'zou'chu'qu 又怕贾琏走出去
'you'pa'jia'mu'yi'xin 又怕贾母疑心
'you'pa'lao'tai'tai'xin'li'bu'shou'yong 又怕老太太心里不受用
'you'pa'ni'ao'jian'chu'bing'lai 又怕你熬煎出病来
'you'pa'ni'sheng'qi'la'le'ni'qu 又怕你生气拉了你去
'you'pa'shou'bei'bu'yi 又怕守备不依
'you'pa'ta'fan'nao'yu'jie'yu'xin 又怕她烦恼郁结于心
'you'pa'ta'men'wu'le'shu 又怕他们误了书
'you'pa'wu'le'wo'de'chai'shi 又怕误了我的差使
'you'pa'zhong'ren'kan'jian 又怕众人看见
'you'pai'chang'le'wo'men'yi'dun'qu'le 又排场了我们一顿去了
'you'pai'zhuo'shou'xiao'rang'dao 又拍着手笑嚷道
'you'pan'ge'zi'mei'lai'shuo'xie'xian'hua'pai'qian 又盼个姊妹来说些闲话排遣
'you'pao'le'na'ge 又跑了那个
'you'pao'le'zhei'li'lai'dian'yan 又跑了这里来点眼
'you'pei'ru'yuan'zhong'lai'ge'chu'you'wan'yi'bian 又陪入园中来各处游玩一遍
'you'pei'xiao'xiang'tan'chun'dao 又陪笑向探春道
'you'pei'zhe'ni'zou'le'yi'er'qian'li'de'lu'cheng 又陪着你走了一二千里的路程
'you'peng'shang'cha'lai 又捧上茶来
'you'ping'kong'tian'le'yi'ci 又平空添了一刺
'you'po'fei'gu'niang'shang'jiu'chi 又破费姑娘赏酒吃
'you'qi'le'ben'jia 又弃了本家
'you'qi'shen'jiang'zi'ji'de'zai'na'le'yi'ge'lai 又起身将自己的再拿了一个来
'you'qi'xue'kui'rou 有气血亏柔
'you'qi'you'hao'xiao 又气又好笑
'you'qian'bai'gan'cui'zhu'zhe'ying 有千百竿翠竹遮映
'you'qian'ren'qu'qing'xue'yi'ma'yu'dai'yu 又遣人去请薛姨妈与黛玉
'you'qian'ye'bu'gei 有钱也不给
'you'qiao'qiao'de'gao'su'ta 又悄悄的告诉她
'you'qiao'qiao'de'quan'jin'rong'shuo 又悄悄的劝金荣说
'you'qiao'qiao'de'yang'jia'rong 又悄悄的央贾蓉
'you'qiao'qiao'de'yong'shou'zhi'zhe'jia'lian 又悄悄的用手指着贾琏
'you'qiao'qiao'quan'ta 又悄悄劝她
'you'qiao'qiao'xiang'feng'jie'dao 又悄悄向凤姐道
'you'qiao'you'you'chuang'zan'ge 右瞧又有窗暂隔
'you'qin'zi'lai'dao'xie 又亲自来道谢

'you'qing'tai'yi'kan'shi 又请太医看视

'you'quan'tan'chun'xiu'de'sheng'qi 又劝探春休得生气
'you'quan'wo'na'xie'hao'hua 又劝我那些好话
'you'rang'le'hao'zuo'tan 又让了好坐谈
'you'rang'ta'shang'kang 又让他上炕
'you'rang'ta'tong'dao'yi'hong'yuan'qu'chi'cha 又让他同到怡红院去吃茶

'you'rao'shang'yi'ge 又饶上一个
'you're'ta'men'shuo'hua 又惹他们说话

'you'san'guo'zi'le 又散果子了

'you'shi'bing'jia'rong 尤氏并贾蓉
'you'shi'bing'jia'rong'reng'zai'si'zhong'shou'ling 尤氏并贾蓉仍在寺中守灵
'you'shi'bing'wu'bie'hua 尤氏并无别话
'you'shi'bu'neng'hui'jia 尤氏不能回家
'you'shi'chang'dao'ning 又时常到宁
'you'shi'chang'jie'zhe'ti'jia'zhen'liao'li'jia'wu 又时常借着替贾珍料理家务
'you'shi'chi'de'reng'shi'bai'jing'mi'fan 尤氏吃的仍是白粳米饭
'you'shi'chu'shen'wu'yu 尤氏出神无语
'you'shi'da'che'shang'ye'bu'yong'sheng'kou 尤氏大车上也不用牲口

'you'shi'da'ying'le 尤氏答应了
'you'shi'da'ying'zhe 尤氏答应着
'you'shi'de'mu'qin'bing'xing'fu'ren 尤氏的母亲并邢夫人
'you'shi'de'mu'qin'yi'xian'zai'zhe'li'ne 尤氏的母亲已先在这里呢

'you'shi'deng'dou'xiao'dao 尤氏等都笑道

'you'shi'deng'qi'xiao'shuo 尤氏等齐笑说

'you'shi'fang'cai'qi'lai'shu'xi 尤氏方才起来梳洗

'you'shi'ge'qi'tou'gu'shi 又是个齐头故事
'you'shi'guan'mu'yi'bi 尤氏盥沐已毕

'you'shi'hong'le'lian 尤氏红了脸
'you'shi'jian'le'ren'ke 有时见了人客
'you'shi'jian'le'ta 尤氏见了她
'you'shi'jian'le'wo'men 有时见了我们
'you'shi'jian'ta'zhe'ban'de'hao'xin 尤氏见他这般的好心
'you'shi'jian'tan'chun'yi'jing'shuo'le'chu'lai 尤氏见探春已经说了出来
'you'shi'jiao'na'xi'dan'lai 尤氏叫拿戏单来
'you'shi'kan'le'kan 尤氏看了看
'you'shi'li'wan'ye'xiao'dao 尤氏李纨也笑道
'you'shi'lin'zou'shi 尤氏临走时
'you'shi'lv'tong'zhong'ji'qie'bing'jia'xia'po'zi 尤氏率同众姬妾并家下婆子
'you'shi'mang'ca'lian'qi'shen'rang'zuo 尤氏忙擦脸起身让坐
'you'shi'mang'da'ying'le 尤氏忙答应了
'you'shi'mang'xiao'dao 尤氏忙笑道
'you'shi'mang'zhi'dao 尤氏忙止道
'you'shi'mei'shi'dou'hai'bu'zhao'shen'me 有事没事都害不着什么
'you'shi'ming'ta'jiao'ta'shang'zuo'le 尤氏命他脚踏上坐了
'you'shi'na'li'dian'le'chuai'wo'lai'le 又是哪里垫了踹窝来了
'you'shi'nai'shuo'dao 尤氏乃说道
'you'shi'pai'heng'jian 有石牌横建
'you'shi'po'xi'er'yi 尤氏婆媳而已
'you'shi'qian'ren'lai'quan 尤氏遣人来劝
'you'shi'que'zhi'ci'shi'bu'tuo 尤氏却知此事不妥
'you'shi'rang'xing'fu'ren 尤氏让邢夫人
'you'shi'ren'jiang'zhang'hua'fu'zi'jiao'lai 又使人将张华父子叫来
'you'shi'san'ren'chu'qu'yi'shi'ting'xiang'jian 尤氏三人出去议事厅相见
'you'shi'shang'fang'zao'yi'xi'di'pu'man'hong'zhan 尤氏上房早已袭地铺满红毡
'you'shi'shen'me'hao'peng'you 又是什么好朋友
'you'shi'shen'me'hua 又是什么话
'you'shi'shen'me'mian'jin 又是什么面筋
'you'shi'shen'me'shi 又是什么事
'you'shi'shen'zhi'xing'fu'ren'qing'xing 尤氏深知邢夫人情性
'you'shi'shu'shu'zhe'yang'ren'shuo'le'zuo'er'fang 又是叔叔这样人说了做二房
'you'shi'shuai'ling'zhu'ren'song'zhi'da'men'wai'fang'hui 尤氏率领诸人送至大门外方回
'you'shi'shui'qi'zhe'ni'le 又是谁气着你了
'you'shi'si'sha'ru'kuang 有时似傻如狂
'you'shi'sui'dao'le'ta'fang'zhong'lai 尤氏遂到了她房中来
'you'shi'sui'tian'tian'guo'lai 尤氏虽天天过来
'you'shi'ta'ling'zi'de'yuan'jia 又是他令姊的冤家
'you'shi'tai'zu'tai'ye'de'sheng'ri'ming'shou 又是太祖太爷的生日冥寿
'you'shi'ting'le'dao 尤氏听了道
'you'shi'ting'le'fan'guo'yi'bu'qu 尤氏听了反过意不去
'you'shi'ting'le'leng'xiao'dao 尤氏听了冷笑道
'you'shi'tou'yi'ci'jian'wo'zhang'kou 又是头一次见我张口
'you'shi'tou'yi'she'de'zheng'ri'zi 又是头一社的正日子
'you'shi'wan'jian'ye'bu'hui'na'fu'li'qu 尤氏晚间也不回那府里去
'you'shi'wei'le'shen'me'da'ta 又是为了什么打他
'you'shi'xiang'jia'zhen'shuo'dao 尤氏向贾珍说道
'you'shi'xiao'hui'shuo 尤氏笑回说
'you'shi'xiao'ma'dao 尤氏笑骂道
'you'shi'xiao'shuo'dao 尤氏笑说道
'you'shi'xin'nei'yuan'you'bing 尤氏心内原有病
'you'shi'xin'zhong'zao'yi'yao'jin'qu'tong'zhu'fang'hao 尤氏心中早已要进去同住方好
'you'shi'yan'se'yu'xing'fu'ren 又使眼色与邢夫人
'you'shi'ye'bu'da'hua 尤氏也不答话
'you'shi'ye'bu'ting 尤氏也不听
'you'shi'ye'ku'dao 尤氏也哭道
'you'shi'ye'shi'chang'zi'zhu'zi'zhu'ta 尤氏也时常资助资助他
'you'shi'ye'xiao'dao 尤氏也笑道
'you'shi'ye'zhi'kan'zhe'li'wan'xiao 尤氏也只看着李纨笑
'you'shi'yi'fan'kou'she 又是一番口舌
'you'shi'yi'shu'xi'le 尤氏已梳洗了
'you'shi'yi'sui'xing'fu'ren'deng'tong'zhi'rong'fu 尤氏亦随邢夫人等同至荣府
'you'shi'yi'wan'jiu'niang'qing'zheng'ya'zi 又是一碗酒酿清蒸鸭子
'you'shi'yi'wen'ci'yan 尤氏一闻此言
'you'shi'yi'zao'ru'yuan'lai 尤氏已早入园来
'you'shi'yin'jiao'ren'jiao'le'jia'rong'lai 尤氏因叫人叫了贾蓉来
'you'shi'yin'qiao'ma'feng'jie'dao 尤氏因悄骂凤姐道
'you'shi'yin'shuo'e'le 尤氏因说饿了
'you'shi'ying'le'yuan'yang 尤氏赢了鸳鸯
'you'shi'yong'cha'pan'qin'peng'cha'yu'jia'mu 尤氏用茶盘亲捧茶与贾母
'you'shi'you'da'fa'ren'lai'wen'bao'yu 尤氏又打发人来问宝玉
'you'shi'you'dai'de'hen'hao 尤氏又待得很好
'you'shi'you'huang'le 尤氏又慌了
'you'shi'you'shuo'xiao'ya'tou'zi'de'hua 尤氏又说小丫头子的话
'you'shi'you'wo'yu'nei'qin 尤氏犹卧于内寝
'you'shi'zai'wai'mian'qiao'qiao'de'cui'le'yi'kou 尤氏在外面悄悄的啐了一口
'you'shi'zan'jia'de'zheng'ren 又是咱家的正人
'you'shi'zao'peng'guo'yi'wan'lai 尤氏早捧过一碗来
'you'shi'zhan'en'xi'fu'de 又是沾恩锡福的
'you'shi'zhe'jian'yi'shang 又是这件衣裳
'you'shi'zheng'ying'le'chu'lai 尤氏正迎了出来
'you'shi'zhi'de'yi'yi'fen'pai'qian'ren'song'qu 尤氏只得一一分派遣人送去
'you'shi'zhi'han'hu'da'ying 尤氏只含糊答应
'you'shi'zhong'jia'xia'xi'fu 又是众家下媳妇
'you'shi'zi'mei'mang'xiao'wen'he'yi 尤氏姊妹忙笑问何意
'you'shi'zi'mei'ye'dou'lai'le 尤氏姊妹也都来了
'you'shou'hui'zhou'zhi'wang'xiang'shang'yi'heng 右手回肘只往项上一横
'you'shou'le'ta'ge'sao'de'dai'hua 又受了她哥嫂的歹话
'you'shou'le'xie'xian'qi 又受了些闲气
'you'shou'zhen'liao'yi'zhen 右手诊了一诊
'you'shu'nv'bei'ti'wu'mei'yin 幽淑女悲题五美吟
'you'shuo'bing'bu'shi'xi 又说并不是喜
'you'shuo'hai'yao'xie'mei'gui'lu'yu'liu'wu'er'chi'qu 又说还要些玫瑰露与柳五儿吃去

'you'shuo'tou'qi'lai'le 又说偷起来了

'you'shuo'yi'ge'bu'qing 又说一个不清

'you'shuo'zheng'jing'de'bu'hui 又说正经的不会

'you'si'qin'shi'zai'qian 犹似秦氏在前
'you'si'yu'wang'fu'ren'shuo'ming 又私与王夫人说明

'you'yao'xun'si'zhuang'tou 又要寻死撞头

'you'yao'yu'lai'mo'mo'ke'tou 又要与赖嬷嬷磕头

'you'yao'zhao'zhe'zhe'yang'er'man'man'de'hua 又要照着这样儿慢慢的画
'you'yao'zhe'yan'se 又要着颜色
'you'yi'bai'ge'ye'bu'cheng'ge'ti'tong 有一百个也不成个体统
'you'yi'ban'ren'yi'shui'qu 有一半人已睡去
'you'yi'deng'du'ren'jia'fu'gui 有一等妒人家富贵
'you'yi'die'zi'dou'fu'pi'de'bao'zi 有一碟子豆腐皮的包子
'you'yi'ge'mo'mo'shuo'dao 有一个嬷嬷说道
'you'yi'ge'qing'wen'zui'ling'li 有一个晴雯最伶俐
'you'yi'ge'shui'she'yao 有一个水蛇腰
'you'yi'ge'xie'zhe 又一个写着
'you'yi'ge'xing'ji'de'ren'deng'bu'de 有一个性急的人等不得

'yuan'bu'de'fang'guan 怨不得芳官
'yuan'bu'de'jiu'tai'ye'sheng'qi 怨不得舅太爷生气
'yuan'bu'de'lao'zu'zong'tian'tian'kou'tou'xin'tou 怨不得老祖宗天天口头心头
'yuan'bu'de'lin'gu'niang'shi'chang'he'ta'jiao'kou 怨不得林姑娘时常和他角口
'yuan'bu'de'mei'mei'sheng'qi 怨不得妹妹生气
'yuan'bu'de'nai'nai'sheng'qi 怨不得奶奶生气
'yuan'bu'de'ni'ge'ge'shi'chang'ti'ni 怨不得你哥哥时常提你
'yuan'bu'de'ni'gu'yi'bu'gu'er'de 怨不得你顾一不顾二的
'yuan'bu'de'ni'lao'ren'jia'sheng'qi 怨不得你老人家生气
'yuan'bu'de'ta'fu'da 怨不得她福大
'yuan'bu'de'ta'men'shi'qian'ru'ming 怨不得他们视钱如命
'yuan'bu'de'wo'men'bao'gu'niang'bu'gan'qin'jin 怨不得我们宝姑娘不敢亲近
'yuan'bu'de'yun'ya'tou'shuo'ni'hao 怨不得云丫头说你好
'yuan'bu'gan'qing'ta'lao'ren'jia 原不敢请她老人家
'yuan'bu'guo'pei'zhe'fu'mu'jin'xiao'dao 原不过陪着父母尽孝道
'yuan'bu'guo'shi'ge'zuo'dao'qi'er 原不过是个坐纛旗儿
'yuan'bu'guo'shi'wo'yi'shi'de'wan'yi 原不过是我一时的顽意
'yuan'bu'ren'qi'fu'er'wang 原不忍弃父而往
'yuan'bu'shi'ni'wo'fen'nei'zhi'shi 原不是你我份内之事
'yuan'bu'shi'shen'me'da'shi 原不是什么大事
'yuan'bu'shi'shen'me'hao'dong'xi 原不是什么好东西
'yuan'bu'shi'wei'mai'zhe'xie'de 原不是为买这些的
'yuan'bu'xu'yi'ge'ren'zhi'dao'de 原不许一个人知道的
'yuan'bu'yong'xi'shuo 原不用细说
'yuan'bu'yu'zai'jia'zhai'ju'zhu'zhe 原不欲在贾宅居住者
'yuan'bu'zai'wu'zhi'gui'jian 原不在物之贵贱
'yuan'chun'you'ming'tai'jian'song'chu'jin'shou'xing'yi'zun 元春又命太监送出金寿星一尊
'yuan'chun'you'ming'yi'qiong'su'jin'kuai'deng'wu 元春又命以琼酥金脍等物
'yuan'cong'na'zha'qi'liu'zhi'na'dong'kou 原从那闸起流至那洞口
'yuan'cong'wai'bian'ren'de 原从外边认的
'yuan'da'le'ping'er'liang'xia 原打了平儿两下
'yuan'dang'huang'liang'zhuang'tou 原当皇粮庄头
'yuan'fei'deng'qi'shen 元妃等起身
'yuan'fei'ming'kuai'yin'jin'lai 元妃命快引进来
'yuan'fei'ming'ta'jin'qian 元妃命他进前
'yuan'fei'nai'ming'chuan'bi'yan'ci'hou 元妃乃命传笔砚伺候
'yuan'fei'sheng'xian'zhi'zhi'zhuan 原非圣贤之制撰
'yuan'fei'ting'le'bao'yu'neng'ti 元妃听了宝玉能题
'yuan'gai'bu'deng'shang'men'lai'jiu'gai'you'zhao'ying'cai'shi 原该不等上门来就该有照应才是
'yuan'gai'bu'yu'yi'ge'ren'zhi'dao 原该不与一个人知道
'yuan'gai'da'jia'qi'xin'gu'xie'ti'tong 原该大家齐心顾些体统
'yuan'gai'da'jia'wan'yi'wan'cai'shi 原该大家挽一挽才是
'yuan'gai'duo'teng'nv'er'xie'cai'shi'zheng'li 原该多疼女儿些才是正理
'yuan'gai'gen'le'jie'jie'qu 原该跟了姐姐去
'yuan'gai'ji'zhong'san'ren'cai'shi 原该济众散人才是
'yuan'gai'jiao'ta'men'dou'shui'qu'cai'shi 原该叫她们都睡去才是
'yuan'gai'jiao'ta'tong'ni'qu'cai'shi 原该叫她同你去才是
'yuan'gai'yuan'yuan'de'cang'kai 原该远远的藏开
'yuan'gao'gu'shi'ding'yao 原告固是定要
'yuan'gao'zai'na'li 原稿在哪里
'yuan'he'bu'shi'yong'tuan'yuan 缘何不使永团圆
'yuan'ji'xian'ju'ba'fang 原籍现居八房
'yuan'jin'dao'lu'you'bu'zhi'dao 远近道路又不知道
'yuan'kan'de'ni'shi'ge'ren'wu 原看的你是个人物
'yuan'lai'bao'qin'ye'shi'zhe'ri 原来宝琴也是这日
'yuan'lai'bao'yu'ji'yu'yao'he'qin'zhong'xiang'yu 原来宝玉急于要和秦钟相遇
'yuan'lai'bao'yu'xin'li'you'jian'si'shi 原来宝玉心里有件私事
'yuan'lai'ben'fu'xin'sheng'de'tai'ye'xing'jia'ming'hua 原来本府新升的太爷姓贾名化
'yuan'lai'bu'shi'ri'guang 原来不是日光
'yuan'lai'bu'shi'zan'men'jia'de'bao'yu 原来不是咱们家的宝玉

'yuan'lai'dan'wei'zhe'ge 原来单为这个
'yuan'lai'er'ma'tong'cao 原来二马同槽

'yuan'lai'jia'mu'de'shi'jin 原来贾母的是金

'yuan'wei'de'shi'yi'shi'dang'jia'de'nai'nai 原为的是一时当家的奶奶

'yuan'wu'ke'ti'zhi'chu 原无可题之处

'yuan'xi'yi'zhong'qin'wang'lao'qian'sui'yao'de 原系义忠亲王老千岁要的
'yuan'xian'gai'zhe'yuan'zi 原先盖这园子
'yuan'xiao'deng'wu'na'xie'yu'ta'men'chi'qu 元宵等物拿些与他们吃去
'yuan'xiong'zi'ran'shi'na'bu'lai'de 原凶自然是拿不来的
'yuan'xiu'ri'yue'guang'hui'li 园修日月光辉里
'yuan'yang'bian'jiang'yuan'gu'shuo'le 鸳鸯便将原故说了
'yuan'yang'cui'le'yi'kou 鸳鸯啐了一口
'yuan'yang'da'ying'le 鸳鸯答应了
'yuan'yang'da'ying'zhe 鸳鸯答应着
'yuan'yang'deng'ye'dou'lai'jing 鸳鸯等也都来敬
'yuan'yang'fan'bu'zhi'yin'he 鸳鸯反不知因何

'zao'yi'yin'cheng'yi'lv 早已吟成一律
'zao'yi'yong'wan'le 早已用完了
'zao'yi'zhi'dao'le 早已知道了
'zao'you'da'ming'gong'zhang'gong'nei'xiang'dai'quan 早有大明宫掌宫内相戴权
'zao'you'ji'ge'po'zi'qiao'qiao'de'hui'le'ta 早有几个婆子悄悄的回了她
'zao'you'ji'ge'ren'da'qi'xing'hong'zhan'lian 早有几个人打起猩红毡帘
'zao'you'jia'mu'qian'ren'lai'wen 早有贾母遣人来问
'zao'you'jia'ren'jiang'zhong'zhuang'han'nian'jin 早有家人将众庄汉撵尽
'zao'you'jia'ren'tou'er'shuai'ling'jia'ren'deng'qing'an 早有家人头儿率领家人等请安
'zao'you'lang'xia'si'hou'de'lao'po'zi'da'qi'lian'zi 早有廊下伺侯的老婆子打起帘子
'zao'you'liang'ge'po'zi'zai'liang'bian'da'qi'lian'zi 早有两个婆子在两边打起帘子
'zao'you'nian'le'ji'qian'sheng'fo 早又念了几千声佛
'zao'you'ning'fu'kai'lu'chuan'shi'ren'kan'jian 早有宁府开路传事人看见
'zao'you'qian'mian'fa'gu'jin'nao 早有前面法鼓金铙
'zao'you'ren'duan'guo'yi'zhang'da'quan'yi'lai 早有人端过一张大圈椅来
'zao'you'ren'jiang'bei'yong'li'wu'da'dian'chu'wu'fen'lai 早有人将备用礼物打点出五份来
'zao'you'ren'peng'guo'shu'yu'cha'lu'lai 早有人捧过漱盂茶卤来
'zao'you'ren'qu'le'bi'yan 早有人取了笔砚
'zao'you'ren'you'peng'guo'shu'yu'lai 早有人又捧过漱盂来
'zao'you'xiao'ya'tou'zi'di'guo'yi'da'zi'xi'zhi 早有小丫头子递过一搭子细纸
'zao'you'xin'ruan'le 早又心软了
'zao'you'ya'huan'na'le'tian'huan'de'yi'shang'song'lai 早有丫鬟拿了添换的衣裳送来
'zao'you'ya'tou'qu'le 早有丫头去了
'zao'you'yi'wei'nv'zi'zai'nei 早有一位女子在内
'zao'you'you'ren'bie'chu'guan'dai'qu'le 早又有人别处管待去了
'zao'you'yu'cun'qian'ren'song'liang'feng'yin'zi 早有雨村遣人送两封银子
'zao'you'yuan'xiao'jiang'jin 早又元宵将近
'zao'you'zhong'qiu'jia'jie 早又中秋佳节
'zao'yu'bei'xia'shi'lai'pi'ma'zhuan'hou 早预备下十来匹马专候
'zao'yu'jian'xue'pan'zai'na'li'luan'rang'luan'jiao'shuo 早遇见薛蟠在那里乱嚷乱叫说
'zao'zai'zhe'tiao'jie'shang'deng'hou 早在这条街上等候
'zao'zao'er'tiao'suo'le'wo'qu 遭遭儿调唆了我去
'zao'zhi'dao'dou'shi'yao'qu'de 早知道都是要去的
'zao'zhi'dao'lai'yi'le 早知道来意了
'zao'zhi'gai'tian'tian'hao'dai'wen'xi'xie'de 早知该天天好歹温习些的
'zao'zhi'ri'hou'xian'zheng'qi 早知日后闲争气
'ze'bu'mian'yi'shi'you'qiu'quan'zhi'hui 则不免一时有求全之毁
'ze'bu'ru'yi'shi'chang'you 则不如意事常有
'ze'geng'jue'qin'mi 则更觉亲密
'ze'ji'ri'ying'qu'guo'men'deng'shi 择吉日迎娶过门等事
'ze'jian'chong'ge'wei'e 则见崇阁巍峨
'ze'jian'qing'xi'qian'zu 则见青溪前阻
'ze'jue'bu'shen'tuo 则觉不甚妥
'ze'kuai'zhi'xia'ci'shu 则快掷下此书
'ze'le'shi'si'de'ri'zi 择了十四的日子
'ze'qi'ji'chu'zui'xi'zhe'ci'ming 择其几处最喜者赐名
'ze'qing'xi'xie'xue 则清溪泻雪
'ze'ri'hou'ke'bao'yong'quan'le 则日后可保永全了
'ze'ri'shang'ren'qu'le 择日上任去了

'ze'shen'fu'wo'cong'qian'yi'fan'yi'qing'wu'dao 则深负我从前一番以情悟道
'ze'shen'wei'you'ju 则深为有据
'ze'si'lv'tai'guo 则思虑太过

'ze'wei'yi'shi'gao'ren 则为逸士高人

'ze'xue'wen'ke'yi'ri'jin'yi 则学问可以日进矣
'ze'yi'wei'da'ya'ke'guan 则以为大雅可观
'ze'ying'jie'er'sheng 则应劫而生
'ze'ying'yun'er'sheng 则应运而生
'ze'you'qian'bu'gong'chu'yi'tao 则又千部共出一套

'ze'yu'chu'si'ri'mao'shi'qing'ling'jiu'jin'cheng 择于初四日卯时请灵柩进城
'ze'yuan'bu'neng'ji 则远不能及
'ze'zai'wan'wan'ren'zhi'shang 则在万万人之上

'zei'shi'chang'jue'bu'ke'di 贼势猖獗不可敌
'zen'bu'da'zhe'zuo'nie'de 怎不打这作孽的

'zen'de'jing'guan'dong'fu 怎得经官动府

'zen'ge'li'hai'de'yang'zi 怎个利害的样子

'zhang'hua'yuan'wu'dan'wu'xin'gao'jia'jia'de 张华原无胆无心告贾家的
'zhang'jia'bu'zhi'dao'mei'gong'fu'guan'zhe'shi 张家不知道没工夫管这事
'zhang'jia'lian'qing'jia'xiao'shun'ye'dou'qing'yuan 张家连倾家孝顺也都情愿
'zhang'jia'ruo'tui'qin 张家若退亲
'zhang'jia'zheng'wu'ji'ce 张家正无计策
'zhang'kou'yi'qian'liang 张口一千两

'zhang'ru'gui'bian'jiang'ci'xin'gao'su'yu'cun 张如圭便将此信告诉雨村
'zhang'seng'yao'hua'yi'cheng'si 张僧繇画一乘寺
'zhang'tai'yi'lun'bing'xi'qiong'yuan 张太医论病细穷源
'zhang'zhe'lao'tai'tai 仗着老太太
'zhang'zhe'shi'ma'ma 仗着是妈妈
'zhang'zhe'su'ri'bi'bie'ren'qi'zhuang 仗着素日比别人气壮
'zhang'zhe'wo'zhe'bu'pa'sao'de'lian 仗着我这不怕臊的脸
'zhang'zhe'xing'fu'ren 仗着邢夫人
'zhang'zhe'zi'ji'feng'liu'biao'zhi 仗着自己风流标致
'zhang'zi'jia'dai'shan'xi'le'guan 长子贾代善袭了官
'zhang'zi'jia'she'xi'zhe'guan 长子贾赦袭着官
'zhang'zi'wu'shi'zhi 獐子五十只

'zhi'bing'ni'yu'pen 脂冰腻玉盆
'zhi'bu'ceng'chai'hui'le'yi'hong'yuan 只不曾拆毁了怡红院
'zhi'bu'ceng'nan'wei'zhe'ta 知不曾难为着他
'zhi'bu'da'he'wai'ren'de'shi 只不大合外人的式
'zhi'bu'gai'si'zi'chuan'song 只不该私自传送
'zhi'bu'gan'wang'feng'jie'chu'zi'shou 只不敢往凤姐处自首
'zhi'bu'gan'wang'rong'fu'qu'le 只不敢往荣府去了
'zhi'bu'gan'yu'feng'jie'kan'jian 只不敢与凤姐看见
'zhi'bu'gan'zuo'sheng 只不敢作声
'zhi'bu'guo'chuan'sou'xie 只不过喘嗽些
'zhi'bu'guo'jia'jun'zhi'mu'lou'shi 只不过贾菌之母娄氏
'zhi'bu'guo'jiang'xie'nv'si'shu 只不过将些女四书
'zhi'bu'guo'ling'qi'si'yang'ma'pi 只不过令其饲养马匹
'zhi'bu'guo'lue'lue'de'pu'chen'le 只不过略略的铺陈了
'zhi'bu'guo'mian'zi'qing'er'pa'ta 只不过面子情儿怕她
'zhi'bu'guo'pa'yi'ma'lao'ren'jia'sheng'qi'ba'le 只不过怕姨妈老人家生气罢了
'zhi'bu'guo'ru'ci 只不过如此
'zhi'bu'guo'shi'ge'su'ren'ba'le 只不过是个俗人罢了
'zhi'bu'guo'shi'yan'yu'an'jing 只不过是言语安静
'zhi'bu'guo'sui'mu'yi'shu'xing'li 只不过随母依叔行礼
'zhi'bu'guo'wo'zhe'yi'hui'zi'shu'le'ji'liang'yin'zi 只不过我这一会子输了几两银子
'zhi'bu'guo'zu'zhong'ren'yu'wang'xin'fu'fu 只不过族中人与王信夫妇
'zhi'bu'hao'shuo'de 只不好说的
'zhi'bu'jiao'bao'xiong'di'na'chu'qu'jiu'shi'le 只不叫宝兄弟拿出去就是了
'zhi'bu'ke'qiang'le 知不可强了
'zhi'bu'neng'ru'shou 只不能入手
'zhi'bu'shuo'shi'ta'zi'ji'de'zhu'yi 只不说是他自己的主意
'zhi'bu'shuo'you'san'jie'zi'ze'zhi'yu 只不说尤三姐自择之语
'zhi'bu'xu'yong'na'xie 只不许用那些
'zhi'bu'xu'zai'dui'ren'yan'jiang 只不许再对人言讲
'zhi'bu'yao'guo'duo'le'jiu'shi'le 只不要过多了就是了
'zhi'bu'yao'wang'le'wo'er'ren 只不要忘了我二人
'zhi'bu'zhi'ni'er'yi'xin'zhong'yuan'yi'bu'yuan'yi 只不知你二姨心中愿意不愿意
'zhi'bu'zhi'ni'xie'wo'duo'shao 只不知你谢我多少
'zhi'bu'zhi'shi'shui 只不知是谁
'zhi'bu'zuo'yi'sheng 只不作一声
'zhi'cha'le'tu'lian 只差了涂脸
'zhi'chi'kui'le'yi'jian 只吃亏了一件
'zhi'chi'xie'mi'tang'jing'yang 只吃些米汤静养
'zhi'chou'wo'ren'ren'gen'qian'shi'yu'ying'hou'ba'le 只愁我人人跟前失于应候罢了
'zhi'chou'zhe'zhu'zi'fa'le'yi'hui'dai 只瞅着竹子发了一回呆
'zhi'chu'jia'rong'zhi'qi'shi'ya'tou'men'zhen'de 只除贾蓉之妻是丫头们斟的
'zhi'chu'qu'jiu'lai 只出去就来
'zhi'chuan'jia'rong'dui'ci 只传贾蓉对词
'zhi'chuan'yi'jian'qie'se'duo'luo'ne'hu'pi'ao'zi 只穿一件茄色哆罗呢狐皮袄子
'zhi'chuan'zhi'gong'zhuo'qian 直传至供桌前
'zhi'chuan'zhu'xiao'ao 只穿著小袄
'zhi'chuan'zhu'yi'jian'song'hua'ling'zi'jia'ao 只穿著一件松花绫子夹袄
'zhi'chuang'xia'qian'ting 至窗下潜听
'zhi'ci'ri'fan'shi'qian'hou 至次日饭时前后
'zhi'ci'ri'jian'le'yuan'yang 至次日见了鸳鸯
'zhi'ci'ri'qi'lai 至次日起来
'zhi'ci'ri'qing'chen 至次日清晨
'zhi'ci'ri'qing'chen'qi'lai 至次日清晨起来
'zhi'ci'ri'reng'fu'yao'tiao'li 至次日仍服药调理
'zhi'ci'ri'wu'geng'tian 至次日五更天
'zhi'ci'ri'wu'gu 至次日五鼓
'zhi'ci'ri'wu'hou 至次日午后
'zhi'ci'ri'yi'zao 至次日一早
'zhi'cong'shang'yue'xing'le'jing'zhi'hou 只从上月行了经之后
'zhi'cong'wo'chu'qu'le 只从我出去了
'zhi'cong'wo'lai'zhe'ji'nian 只从我来这几年
'zhi'cong'you'le'ni 只从有了你
'zhi'cu'chai'hu'ba'fen 制醋柴胡八分
'zhi'da'bi'zhi'qi 至大比之期
'zhi'da'fa'ge'ma'ma'song'lai 只打发个妈妈送来
'zhi'dai'dai'de'zuo'zhe 只呆呆的坐着
'zhi'dai'fen'pai'song'ren 只待分派送人
'zhi'dai'jia'lian'qian'jiao'zou'le 只待贾琏前脚走了
'zhi'dai'le'ping'er 只带了平儿
'zhi'dai'le'wu'liu'dun'fan'gong'fu 直呆了五六顿饭工夫
'zhi'dai'qing'ming'fang'ke 直待请名方可
'zhi'dai'yi'ge'tie'ji'de'xiao'ya'tou'zou'lai 只带一个贴己的小丫头走来
'zhi'dai'zhe'wang'hou'jiao'men'chu'qu'le 直带着往后角门出去了
'zhi'dai'zhong'ren'san'le'fang'hui'de 直待众人散了方回的
'zhi'dan'dan'sheng'le'yi'kuai'wei'yong 只单单剩了一块未用
'zhi'dang'hui'le'jia'xiang'yi'tang'de 只当回了家乡一趟的
'zhi'dang'hui'xiang'guo'lai 只当回想过来
'zhi'dang'mei'you'zhe'shi 只当没有这事
'zhi'dang'ni'hai'wo'yi'yang 只当你还我一样
'zhi'dang'ni'mei'qu 只当你没去
'zhi'dang'ni'xin'li'cang'jian 只当你心里藏奸
'zhi'dang'ren'dou'shi'xia'zi 只当人都是瞎子
'zhi'dang'shi'mei'you 只当是没有
'zhi'dang'shi'ta'you'shou'le'dai'yu'de'wei'qu 只当是他又受了黛玉的委屈
'zhi'dang'shi'yang'hu'ne 只当是阳虎呢
'zhi'dang'shi'zhen'shi 只当是真事
'zhi'dang'ta'de'zui'le'bao'yu 只当她得罪了宝玉
'zhi'dang'ta'men'xin'li'ming'bai 只当他们心里明白
'zhi'dang'ta'shou'le'zhe'ban'ri'de'zhe'mo 只当他受了这半日的折磨
'zhi'dang'ta'wai'tou'zi'bian'jiu'lai 只当她外头自便就来
'zhi'dang'teng'wo'men'ba 只当疼我们罢
'zhi'dang'wo'mei'kan'jian 只当我没看见
'zhi'dang'yuan'yang'yi'kan'jian'ta'de'shou'wei'le 只当鸳鸯已看见她的首尾了
'zhi'dang'zhe'jia'zheng'bu'gan'zao'ci 只当着贾政不敢造次
'zhi'dao'bao'yu'chu'men 知道宝玉出门
'zhi'dao'bi'you'yi'shi 知道必有异事
'zhi'dao'de'shuo'shi'wan 知道的说是玩
'zhi'dao'de'shuo'xiao'hai'zi'men'tao'qi 知道的说小孩子们淘气
'zhi'dao'gang'cai'de'hua'yi'jing'zou'le'feng'le 知道刚才的话已经走了风了
'zhi'dao'guan'xi'fei'chang 知道关系非常
'zhi'dao'hai'dei'xiang'jin'er'zhe'yang'bu'de'liao 知道还得像今儿这样不得了
'zhi'dao'hai'neng'jian'ta'yi'mian'liang'mian'bu'neng'le 知道还能见她一面两面不能了
'zhi'dao'ji'nian'cai'lai 知道几年才来
'zhi'dao'le'jie'xia 只到了阶下
'zhi'dao'le'ren'shi 知道了人事
'zhi'dao'mei'mei'bu'guo'zhe'liang'ri'dao'de 知道妹妹不过这两日到的
'zhi'dao'nan'nv'de'shi'le 知道男女的事了
'zhi'dao'ni'men'dou'zai'zhe'li 知道你们都在这里
'zhi'dao'ni'tian'tian'ping'zong'lang'ji 知道你天天萍踪浪迹
'zhi'dao'shen'me'qing'zhong 知道什么轻重
'zhi'dao'shen'me'shi 知道什么是
'zhi'dao'shi'shui'fang'hui'qi'de 知道是谁放晦气的
'zhi'dao'shi'yue'jiang'jin 直到十月将尽
'zhi'dao'shui'si'shui'huo 知道谁死谁活
'zhi'dao'si'geng'jiang'lan 直到四更将阑
'zhi'dao'ta'ru'jin'shi'zen'yang 知道他如今是怎样
'zhi'dao'ta'shi'ge'ben'jia 知道他是个笨家
'zhi'dao'tian'le'ta'liang'ge 知道添了她两个
'zhi'dao'ting'shang'xing'li 只到厅上行礼
'zhi'dao'wo'zui'pa'zhe'xie'su'tao'zi 知道我最怕这些俗套子
'zhi'dao'xiang'ling'fang'zhi'le'yi'ge 直到香菱方掷了一个
'zhi'dao'xie'le'zhong'tai 直到歇了中台
'zhi'dao'ya'huan'men'fang'zhong'yi'yi'de'sou'le'yi'bian 只到丫鬟们房中一一的搜了一遍
'zhi'dao'you'shi'zen'me'ge'guang'jing 知道又是怎么个光景
'zhi'dao'you'yuan'gu'le 知道有原故了
'zhi'dao'zai'li'bian'qu'le 只道在里边去了
'zhi'dao'zai'na'ge'li'tou'ne 知道在哪个里头呢
'zhi'dao'zhe'shi'hai'shi'xiao'shi 知道这事还是小事
'zhi'dao'zheng'tang'lang'xia 直到正堂廊下
'zhi'de'bian'hui'shen'chu'yuan'qu 只得便回身出园去
'zhi'de'bing'zhi'bu'de'ming 治得病治不得命
'zhi'de'chao'yi'chao 值得吵一吵
'zhi'de'chi'le'jiu 只得吃了酒
'zhi'de'chui'le'deng 只得吹了灯
'zhi'de'da'ying'le 只得答应了
'zhi'de'dai'le'chu'lai 只得带了出来
'zhi'de'dai'le'ni'zhi'er'ben'le'ni'lao'lai 只得带了你侄儿奔了你老来
'zhi'de'dai'zhe'li'wen 只得带着李纹
'zhi'de'dao'le'yi'wan'cha'lai 只得倒了一碗茶来
'zhi'de'deng'chao'wan'le 只得等吵完了
'zhi'de'dun'zai'na'li 只得蹲在那里
'zhi'de'duo'dao'xiao'xiang'guan 只得踱到潇湘馆

'zhi'de'er'shi'liang 只得二十两
'zhi'de'fan'shen'jin'lai 只得翻身进来
'zhi'de'fang'xia'qian'lai 只得放下钱来
'zhi'de'fen'fu'ren'fu'yi'lu'ben'rong'guo'fu'lai 只得吩咐人夫一路奔荣国府来
'zhi'de'fu'shen'jin'ru'yuan'zhong 只得复身进入园中
'zhi'de'fu'shi'ta'shu'xi 只得服侍他梳洗

'zhi'de'fu'yu'wu'ke'nai'he 只得付于无可奈何
'zhi'de'gao'ci'xie'en'hui'lai 只得告辞谢恩回来
'zhi'de'gen'le'chu'lai 只得跟了出来
'zhi'de'han'lei'er'bie 只得含泪而别
'zhi'de'han'lei'yu'ying'chun'ke'tou 只得含泪与迎春磕头

'zhi'de'he'le'liang'kou 只得喝了两口
'zhi'de'he'le'liang'zhong 只得喝了两钟
'zhi'de'he'zhe'xiao'ya'tou'zi'zou'lai 只得和这小丫头子走来
'zhi'de'he'zhong'ren'qie'qu'chi'xie'jiu'shui 只得和众人且去吃些酒水
'zhi'de'hu'luan'shui'le'yi'ye 只得胡乱睡了一夜
'zhi'de'hu'luan'shui'xia 只得胡乱睡下
'zhi'de'hui'fang'qu'le 只得回房去了
'zhi'de'hui'fang'qu'ling'zhuang'shi'le'qi'lai 只得回房去另妆饰了起来
'zhi'de'hui'lai'qiao'feng'jie 只得回来瞧凤姐
'zhi'de'hui'tan'chun 只得回探春
'zhi'de'hui'zhi'fang'zhong 只得回至房中
'zhi'de'ji'mang'geng'yi'ru'chao 只得急忙更衣入朝
'zhi'de'jiang'qin'hun'fang'hui 只得将秦魂放回
'zhi'de'jiang'xie'zha'mo'pao'xu'cou'le'ji'qian 只得将些渣末泡须凑了几钱
'zhi'de'jiao'yu'feng'jie'bian'hui'lai'le 只得交与凤姐便回来了
'zhi'de'jin'jin'gen'zhe 只得紧紧跟着
'zhi'de'jin'qian'lai'yu'qin'zhong'ke'tou 只得进前来与秦钟磕头
'zhi'de'kai'le'you'shi'xiang'gui 只得开了尤氏箱柜
'zhi'de'lai'jia'pei'zui 只得来家赔罪
'zhi'de'ling'ren'qu'hui'xing'fu'ren 只得令人去回邢夫人
'zhi'de'mang'mang'de'chuan'yi 只得忙忙的穿衣
'zhi'de'mang'mang'de'da'dian'dai'yu'qi'shen 只得忙忙的打点黛玉起身
'zhi'de'mang'mang'de'qian'lai 只得忙忙的前来
'zhi'de'mang'xie'le'zhuang'shi 只得忙卸了妆饰
'zhi'de'mei'jing'da'cai 只得没精打彩
'zhi'de'mian'qiang'chu'lai 只得勉强出来
'zhi'de'mian'qiang'gao'dao 只得勉强告道
'zhi'de'mian'qiang'guo'lai 只得勉强过来

'zhi'de'ming'jiang'zhang'zi'xian'qi'yi'feng 只得命将帐子掀起一缝
'zhi'de'ming'zi'juan'shou'zhe'ta 只得命紫鹃守着他
'zhi'de'nuo'nuo'de'hui'shuo 只得诺诺的回说
'zhi'de'pei'xiao'dao 只得陪笑道
'zhi'de'qi'lai'dao 只得起来道
'zhi'de'qi'shen'rang'zuo 只得起身让坐
'zhi'de'qian'ren'qu'jia'fu'chuan'wang'er'lai'dui'ci 只得遣人去贾府传旺儿来对词
'zhi'de'qiao'qiao'de'chu'lai 只得悄悄的出来
'zhi'de'qin'zi'guo'lai'qing'wen'jia'mu 只得亲自过来请问贾母
'zhi'de'qing'qing'qi'lai 只得轻轻起来

'zhi'de'qu'chuan'jia'rong 只得去传贾蓉
'zhi'de'qu'yi'fu'jiu 只得曲意附就
'zhi'de'ren'chi'shuo'dao 只得忍耻说道
'zhi'de'ren'le'you'ren 只得忍了又忍

'zhi'de'sui'ta'ta'qu'le 只得随他她去了

'zhi'de'ting'le'shou 只得停了手

'zhi'de'tui'ta'shang'qu 只得推她上去
'zhi'de'wang'rong'fu'lai'xun 只得往荣府来寻
'zhi'de'wang'yuan'nei'xun'zhong'gu'sao'xian'tan 只得往园内寻众姑嫂闲谈
'zhi'de'wei'qu'zhe'lai'yang'gao'qin'zhong 只得委曲着来央告秦钟

'zhi'de'ye'cong'shu'hou'pa'chu'lai 只得也从树后爬出来

'zhi'de'yi'bian'zhan'le 只得一边站了

'zhi'de'yi'zhong'cha 只得一钟茶
'zhi'de'yin'le'jiu 只得饮了酒
'zhi'de'ying'shang'lai'yu'you'lao'niang 只得迎上来与尤老娘
'zhi'de'you'ge'chu'qian'ren'gou'qiu'xun'mi 只得又各处遣人购求寻觅
'zhi'de'you'ge'chu'qu'zhao 只得又各处去找
'zhi'de'you'he'shi'jue'shuo'le 只得又和时觉说了
'zhi'de'you'mian'qiang'ren'zhe 只得又勉强忍着
'zhi'de'you'shuo'yuan'gu 只得又说原故
'zhi'de'you'ta'men'qu'le 只得由她们去了
'zhi'de'you'zhuan'guo'le'yi'fu'xing'rong'yan'tan'lai 只得又转过了一副形容言谈来
'zhi'de'yu'fu'qin'shang'yi 只得与父亲商议
'zhi'de'yu'qi'zi'shang'yi 只得与妻子商议
'zhi'de'yu'qin'zhong'zuo'le'yi 只得与秦钟作了揖
'zhi'de'yu'ta'liu'xia 只得与他留下
'zhi'de'zai'ci'zan'hou 只得在此暂候
'zhi'de'zan'qie'zhu'xia 只得暂且住下
'zhi'de'zan'shi'zai'jia'wen'xi'jiu'ke 只得暂时在家温习旧课
'zhi'de'zha'zhe'dan'zi'jin'lai 只得乍着胆子进来
'zhi'de'zhe'ren'shang'jing'lai'xun'men'lu 只得着人上京来寻门路
'zhi'de'zhu'le'yi'zhi'zhang 只得拄了一支杖
'zhi'de'zhu'zai'xia'chu'deng'hou 只得住在下处等候
'zhi'de'zhuo'shang'qu'na'le'yi'ge'wan 只得桌上去拿了一个碗

'zhi'liang'yue'zhi'hou 至两月之后
'zhi'liao'ding'ta'zai'wai'fei'yin'ji'du 只料定他在外非饮即赌
'zhi'ling'qi'jiao'xi'men'zi'qu'ye'ba'le 只令其教习们自去也罢了
'zhi'ling'shang'xia'er'jia'ge'yin'yi'bei 只令上下二家各饮一杯
'zhi'liu'liang'ge'xin'fu'xiao'tong'qian'ma 只留两个心腹小童牵马
'zhi'liu'men'zi'yi'ren'fu'shi 只留门子一人服侍
'zhi'liu'san'si'ge'xiao'tai'jian'da'ying 只留三四个小太监答应
'zhi'liu'xia'xiao'hai'zi'men 只留下小孩子们
'zhi'liu'xia'yi'ju'qi'yan'dui'lian 只留下一句七言对联
'zhi'liu'xin'zhen'zhi'jia'ji'deng'shi 只留心针黹家计等事
'zhi'liu'zai'zi'ji'zhe'bian 只留在自己这边
'zhi'lu'fang'weng'yong'le'yi'ge 只陆放翁用了一个
'zhi'lue'xie'xie'er 只略歇歇儿
'zhi'lue'zuo'le'yi'zuo 只略坐了一坐
'zhi'lun'di'xiong'peng'you'jiu'shi'le 只论弟兄朋友就是了
'zhi'lun'hao'de'ri'zi'wo'shi'zen'me'ge'xing'jing 只论好的日子我是怎么个形景
'zhi'mai'zhi'liao'hu'biao 支买纸料糊裱
'zhi'mei'you'li'wan'de'yi'fen 只没有李纨的一份
'zhi'min'zhe'zui'xiao 只抿着嘴笑
'zhi'ming'ping'er'ba'zuo'er'na'bao'yin'zi'na'lai 只命平儿把昨儿那包银子拿来
'zhi'ming'qin'zhong'deng'dai'an'ling'ba'le 只命秦钟等待安灵罢了
'zhi'ming'qu'jian'tan'chun 只命去见探春
'zhi'ming'ren'dai'xin 只命人带信
'zhi'mo'mo'de'wai'zai'chuang'shang 只默默的歪在床上
'zhi'mu'jin'zhe'guan'si 只目今这官司
'zhi'na'cha'pao'le'yi'wan'fan 只拿茶泡了一碗饭
'zhi'na'han'ta'jia'zen'me'jiu'zhe'me'fu'gui'ne 只纳罕他家怎么就这么富贵呢
'zhi'na'yan'kan'xiang'lian 只拿眼看湘莲
'zhi'na'zhe'ruan'de'zuo'bi'zi'tou 只拿着软的作鼻子头
'zhi'nai'de'san'liang'ri 只耐得三两日
'zhi'nao'dao'wu'geng'tian'cai'shui'xia 直闹到五更天才睡下
'zhi'nao'le'yi'ye 直闹了一夜
'zhi'neng'er'min'zui'xiao'dao 智能儿抿嘴笑道
'zhi'neng'er'yao'tou'shuo 智能儿摇头说
'zhi'neng'ji'de'duo'jiao'shuo 智能急得跺脚说
'zhi'neng'ke'duo'gei'ta'qian'wei'shi 只能可多给他钱为是
'zhi'neng'liang'ge'tu'di'chu'lai'ying'jie 智能两个徒弟出来迎接
'zhi'neng'shu'bu'chuan'cuo 只能书不舛错
'zhi'ni'wo'jiu'you'xu'duo'bu'sui'xin'de'shi 只你我就有许多不遂心的事
'zhi'nian'liu'xiang'lian'zao'zao'hui'lai 只念柳湘莲早早回来
'zhi'nian'si'cheng'mou'ren 值年寺丞某人
'zhi'ning'fu'zuo'xi 至宁府坐席
'zhi'nuan'ge'qian'shang'le'jiao 至暖阁前上了轿
'zhi'nuan'xiang'wu'zhong 至暖香坞中
'zhi'pa'bao'lin'liang'ge'bu'ken'lai 只怕宝林两个不肯来
'zhi'pa'bi'zai'jia'li'sheng'le'shi'ye'wei'ke'zhi 只怕比在家里省了事也未可知

'zhi'pa'bu'xi'han 只怕不希罕
'zhi'pa'ci'shi'yi'qu'le 只怕此时已去了

'zhi'pa'dan'wu'le'shi'guang 只怕耽误了时光

'zhi'pa'guan'yuan'men'le 只怕关园门了
'zhi'pa'guang'ni'le'de'ri'zi'hai'you'ne 只怕逛腻了的日子还有呢

'zhi'pa'hai'hao'xie 只怕还好些
'zhi'pa'hai'ke'hun'de'guo'qu 只怕还可混得过去

'zhi'pa'lao'tai'tai'gao'xing'yao'qu 只怕老太太高兴要去
'zhi'pa'lao'tai'tai'he'feng'jie'jie'shuo'le 只怕老太太和凤姐姐说了

'zhi'pa'lian'mao'er'gou'er'dou'bu'gan'jing 只怕连猫儿狗儿都不干净

'zhi'pa'lian'xing'ming'hai'bao'bu'cheng'ne 只怕连性命还保不成呢
'zhi'pa'ming'nian'duan'yang'you'le 只怕明年端阳有了
'zhi'pa'na'ge'hai'gao'xie'ne 只怕那个还高些呢
'zhi'pa'ni'fan'le 只怕你烦了
'zhi'pa'ni'shang'gan'bu'le'ne 只怕你伤感不了呢
'zhi'pa'ni'shen'zi'bu'yi 只怕你婶子不依
'zhi'pa'qian'qiang'bu'neng'ya'yun'ne 只怕牵强不能押韵呢
'zhi'pa'ru'jin'ping'kong'zai'sheng'chu'yi'liang'jian'shi'lai 只怕如今平空再生出一两件事来
'zhi'pa'san'yi'de'zhe'zhang'zui'hai'shuo'ta'bu'guo 只怕三姨的这张嘴还说她不过
'zhi'pa'she'bu'de'qu 只怕舍不得去
'zhi'pa'shi'cai'gang'ti'ta'men'tao'lu'yan'zhi'gao'zi 只怕是才刚替她们淘漉胭脂膏子

'zhi'pa'xiao'hai'zi'jia'mei'jian'guo 只怕小孩子家没见过

'zhi'san'yue'xia'xun 至三月下旬

'zhi'sha'zhi'zei'ying 直杀至贼营

'zhi'shang'zi'you'ben'lai'cui'ye'man'bu 枝上自有本来翠叶满布

'zhi'shao'hai'dei'san'er'qian'liang'yin'zi'yong 至少还得三二千两银子用

'zhi'shi'bu'xiang'na'xiao'ti'zi'zui'qiao 只是不像那小蹄子嘴巧
'zhi'shi'bu'zhi'zen'me'ge'bian'fa 只是不知怎么个变法
'zhi'shi'chang'xu'duan'tan'wu'jing'da'cai'de 只是长吁短叹无精打彩的
'zhi'shi'chi'de'xie'yin'shi'jiu'bu'pa'le 只是吃得些饮食就不怕了

'zhi'shi'chi'xie'ri'zi 只是迟些日子

'zhi'shi'ci'shi'wu'zhi'bi 只是此时无纸笔
'zhi'shi'cuo'ci'bu'ya 只是措词不雅

'zhi'shi'dai'yu'jie'ci'xi'luo'ta 知是黛玉借此奚落他
'zhi'shi'dan'le'xu'ming 只是担了虚名
'zhi'shi'dao'bu'de'yi'shi 只是到不得意时
'zhi'shi'dao'ta'na'bian 只是到他那边
'zhi'shi'deng'lang'hu'yao 枳实等狼虎药
'zhi'shi'di'fang'duo'shi 致使地方多事
'zhi'shi'di'xia'zhe'ju'you'shuo'shu'hua'le 只是底下这句又说熟话了
'zhi'shi'dou'ju'xue'pan'de'wei'shi 只是都惧薛蟠的威势
'zhi'shi'er'wei'mei'mei'zai'wo'men'jia'li'shou'wei'qu 只是二位妹妹在我们家里受委屈
'zhi'shi'er'wei'tai'tai'mei'wei'shi'liu'liang 只是二位太太每位十六两
'zhi'shi'fan'le'zheng'ming'cun'ming 只是犯了正名村名
'zhi'shi'fang'cai'wo'ting'jian'zhe'yi'shou'zhong 只是方才我听见这一首中
'zhi'shi'fang'guan'shang'xiao 只是芳官尚小
'zhi'shi'fang'shang'guo'mei'you'zhi'shi 只是方上果没有枳实
'zhi'shi'fu'li'jia'ren'bu'gan'shan'dong 只是府里家人不敢擅动
'zhi'shi'fu'qin'ju'shu'yan'mi 只是父亲拘束严密
'zhi'shi'fu'qin'shu'bai'xiong'di'zhong 只是父亲叔伯兄弟中
'zhi'shi'geng'ke'xian'zhe 只是更可羡者
'zhi'shi'guan'zhao'san'bu'zhao'liang'de 只是管着三不着两的
'zhi'shi'guo'yu'tui'bai'qi'chu 只是过于颓败凄楚
'zhi'shi'hai'bu'hao 只是还不好
'zhi'shi'hai'shao'yi'ge'jiu'huang 只是还少一个酒幌

'zhi'shi'jia'zhai'ren'yuan'he'chu'tui 指示贾宅人员何处退
'zhi'shi'jia'zhen'de 知是贾珍的

'zhi'ting'wai'mian'da'ying'le'liang'sheng 只听外面答应了两声
'zhi'ting'wai'mian'ji'ji'gua'gua 只听外面咭咭呱呱

'zhi'ting'wai'mian'yi'zhen'jiao'bu'xiang 只听外面一阵脚步响

'zhi'ting'wo'fen'pai'ni'men'jiu'zuo'cai'hao 只听我分派你们就坐才好

'zhi'ting'xiang'yun'xiao'wen 只听湘云笑问

'zhi'tong'zhe'na'bian'ou'xiang'xie'de'lu'jing 直通着那边藕香榭的路径
'zhi'tu'jie'jiao'xie'qi'di 只图结交些契弟
'zhi'tu'tao'ni'de'hao'er 只图讨你的好儿
'zhi'wan'bian'bu'hui'jia'le 至晚便不回家了
'zhi'wan'fan'hou'zhang'deng'fang'qu 至晚饭后掌灯方去
'zhi'wan'fang'hui'qu 至晚方回去
'zhi'wan'jian'you'fu'er'he 至晚间又服二和
'zhi'wan'yao'peng'zhe 只弯腰捧着
'zhi'wan'ye'jiu'hao'le 至晚也就好了
'zhi'wang'fang'nei'lai'zhao'bao'yu 直往房内来找宝玉
'zhi'wang'fu'ren'hui'fang'san 至王夫人回方散
'zhi'wang'na'jia'dao'zhong'wu'zi'li'lai'deng'zhe 直往那夹道中屋子里来等着

'zhi'wen'bie'de'ya'tou'men 只问别的丫头们
'zhi'wen'de'yi'gu'you'xiang 只闻得一股幽香

'zuo'ye'de'yue'zui'hao 昨夜的月最好
'zuo'ye'du'du'nong'nong 昨夜嘟嘟哝哝
'zuo'ye'ting'jian'yi'ye'de'bei'feng 昨夜听见一夜的北风
'zuo'ye'zhu'lou'meng 昨夜朱楼梦
'zuo'yi'zuo'jiu'hui'qu'ba 坐一坐就回去罢
'zuo'yin'feng'da'ye'shi'zhi 昨因冯大爷示知
'zuo'you'cai'jie'bu'lai 左右猜解不来
'zuo'you'dou'mai'fu'xia'le 左右都埋伏下了
'zuo'you'liang'pang'she'xia'jiao'yi 左右两旁设下交椅
'zuo'you'mei'you'zhu'xing'de'ren 左右没有助兴的人
'zuo'you'qian'hou'luan'zhao'le'yi'fan 左右前后乱找了一番
'zuo'you'ye'bu'guo'shi'zhe'yang 左右也不过是这样
'zuo'zai'chuang'yan'shang'fa'men 坐在床沿上发闷
'zuo'zai'ci'jian'kan'zhe 坐在此间看着
'zuo'zai'da'deng'shang 坐在大凳上
'zuo'zai'dui'mian'yi'zi'shang 坐在对面椅子上
'zuo'zai'hua'cao'dui'zhong'dou'cao 坐在花草堆中斗草
'zuo'zai'kang'li'bian 坐在炕里边
'zuo'zai'na'li'ku'ne 坐在那里哭呢
'zuo'zai'xia'mian'yi'zi'shang 坐在下面椅子上
'zuo'zai'yi'kuai'shi'shang 坐在一块石上
'zuo'zai'zhe'li'zuo'shen'me 坐在这里作什么
'zuo'zhe'ji'ge'chuan'hong'zhuo'lv'de'ya'tou'huan 坐着几个穿红着绿的丫头鬟
'zuo'zhe'xiao'zhu'jiao 坐着小竹轿
'zuo'zhe'xie'shi'chu'lai 做这些事出来
'zuo'zhe'xie'shi'wu'ai 作这些事无碍
'zuo'zhong'tong'geng'zhe'pei'yi'zhan 坐中同庚者陪一盏
'zuo'zuo'ye'gai'xie'le 坐坐也该歇了
